Úvodná stránkaHľadanie práceAdobe Senior Consultant 
                                Define your career today.
                                Explore opportunities now.
                                Primary job category
                            Consultant, IT Specialist, Software Development & Support, Technical Services
                                Place of work
                            Bratislava, Banská Bystrica, Košice
                                Contract type
                            full-time
                                Salary (gross)
2 800 - 3 800 EUR/monthSalary starting from 2800 – 3800 EUR gross, depending on relevant experience  and language proficiency
Adobe Senior Consultant
        As a consultant, you will use your consulting skills, business, and technical knowledge to effectively integrate comprehensive technology into the business environment of our clients and to achieve the best possible business results.
Don't know Adobe? Never mind, we'll introduce it to you!
Adobe has historically specialized in software for the creation and publication of a wide range of content, including graphics, photography, illustration, animation, multimedia/video, motion pictures, and print. Adobe offered a bundled solution of its products named Adobe Creative Suite, which evolved into a subscription software as a service (SaaS) offering named Adobe Creative Cloud. The company also expanded into digital marketing software and in 2021 was considered one of the top global leaders in Customer Experience Management (CXM). 
Our Adobe team at IBM is responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining complex application components and integrating software packages using a variety of tools. That is why we are looking for a new colleague who is ready to deal with various challenges and thus meet the requirements of our customers.
You can work from one of our offices - our center is located in Bratislava, Banská Bystrica, and Košice, so you can choose where it suits you best.
What would be your responsibilities?
•	Collection and analysis of business requirements
•	Design, development and implementation of business solutions in cooperation with developers
•	Coordination and documentation of project work
•	Regular communication with clients and building of relationships 
•	Active communication with customers, business analysts and other service teams to perform common operational tasks and troubleshoot applications
What do you need for your success?
•	Fluent English
•	Advanced knowledge of HTML / CSS
•	Communication and presentation skills (written and oral)
•	Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills
•	IT related education
•	Experience in a similar job position is a plus (IT consultant)
•	Ability to work independently as well as a team player
•	Experience in Adobe AEM 
What can you expect of us?
•	Salary starting from 2800 – 3800 EUR gross, depending on relevant experience  and language proficiency
•	Additional Days Off
•	Flexible Working Conditions
•	100% Paid Sick Leave
•	Critical Illness Insurance, Life & Disability insurance, Medical Center
•	Personal & Career Development
•	And many more: ibm.biz/benefits2021
Additional information
            IBM is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or veteran status.

Úvodná stránkaHľadanie práceAdobe Developer 
                                Define your career today.
                                Explore opportunities now.
                                Primary job category
                            Consultant, IT Specialist, Software Development & Support, Technical Services
                                Place of work
                            Bratislava, Banská Bystrica, Košice
                                Contract type
                            full-time
                                Salary (gross)
1 900 - 2 500 EUR/monthSalary starting from 1900-2500 EUR gross, depending on relevant experience  and language proficiency
Adobe Developer
        Adobe has historically specialized in software for the creation and publication of a wide range of content, including graphics, photography, illustration, animation, multimedia/video, motion pictures, and print. Adobe offered a bundled solution of its products named Adobe Creative Suite, which evolved into a subscription software as a service (SaaS) offering named Adobe Creative Cloud. The company also expanded into digital marketing software and in 2021 was considered one of the top global leaders in Customer Experience Management (CXM). 
Are you a programmer and looking for new challenges? Do you have experience with Java or JavaScript? We will be happy to introduce Adobe to you!
As a Adobe developer at IBM, you will develop world-class solutions that help our clients move their business forward in a variety of areas - from aircraft refueling, through globally integrated ordering systems, to customer portals with loyalty programs. You will be involved in all phases of the application lifecycle, from design, coding, testing to the management of complex solutions. You will use the latest tools for application development, we will show you our best practices and you will work with internal and external colleagues.
You can work from one of our offices - our center is located in Bratislava, Banská Bystrica, and Košice, so you can choose where it suits you best.
What would be your responsibilities?
•	Gathering and analysis of requests from clients
•	Configuration, development, and implementation of business solutions based on the Adobe platform
•	Testing and troubleshooting
•	Technical documentation
•	Regular communication with the clients and consultants
What do you need for your success?
•	Fluent English
•	IT-related education
•	Experience in a similar position (application developer, programmer…)
•	Experience with one or more of the following programming languages:
-	Web development (HTML, PHP, JavaScript and CSS)
-	Software development using OOP (Apex, Java, Eclipse, .NET or similar)
•	Experience with Adobe AEM is plus
•	Ability to work independently and as a team player
What can you expect of us?
•	Salary starting from 1900-2500 EUR gross, depending on relevant experience  and language proficiency
•	Additional Days Off
•	Flexible Working Conditions
•	100% Paid Sick Leave
•	Critical Illness Insurance, Life & Disability insurance, Medical Center
•	Personal & Career Development
•	And many more: ibm.biz/benefits2021
Additional information
            IBM is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or veteran status.

                                Define your career today.
                                Explore opportunities now.
                                Primary job category
                            Consultant, IT Specialist, Software Development & Support
                                Place of work
                            Bratislava, Banská Bystrica, Košice
                                Contract type
                            full-time
                                Salary (gross)
1 600 - 1 800 EUR/monthSalary starting from 1600-1800 EUR gross, depending on relevant experience and language proficiency
Start your career with Adobe!
Did you just finish university? Do you want to start your career in a friendly team that does not know stereotypes? If you answer 'yes', you should continue reading and meet our team at IBM!
Adobe has historically specialized in software for the creation and publication of a wide range of content, including graphics, photography, illustration, animation, multimedia/video, motion pictures, and print. Adobe offered a bundled solution of its products named Adobe Creative Suite, which evolved into a subscription software as a service (SaaS) offering named Adobe Creative Cloud. The company also expanded into digital marketing software and in 2021 was considered one of the top global leaders in Customer Experience Management (CXM). 
As a Adobe Package Consultant at IBM you will use the newest tools and technology while working on challenging projects that include designing, developing, and re-engineering highly complex application components and integrating software packages. Out new colleague needs a mix of consultative skills, business knowledge, and technical expertise to effectively integrate packaged technology into our clients’ business environment and achieve business results. Moreover, when achieving goals, we guarantee you a promotion after one year of work.
This position is located in Bratislava, Banska Bystrica or Kosice.
What would be your responsibilities?
•	Gathering and analysis of requirements
•	Configuration and development of business solutions based on the Adobe platform
•	Test, documentation and deployment
•	Support and maintenance
•	Active communication with the customers, business analysts and other service delivery teams in order to perform regular operations tasks as well as solve the application issues
What do you need for your success?
•	IT related education / IT Background (Application developer, IT Consultant role)
•	Communication and presentation skills, written and verbal
•	Fluent English
•	Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills
•	Ability to work independently and as a team player
What can you expect of us?
•	Salary starting from 1600-1800 EUR gross, depending on relevant experience and language proficiency
•	Annual performance bonus payment
•	Performance evaluation on regular basis
•	Subsidized meal-tickets
•	Flexible working time and home office
•	Three additional vacation days
•	Up to three self-recovery days
•	100% sick leave compensation
•	Life insurance and supplementary pension savings program
•	Private medical sanatorium
•	Long term career development and possibility of internal rotation
•	Classroom based trainings and 5000 e-learning courses – both internal and external
•	Recommend-a-Friend – get a bonus in the employee referral program
•	MultiSport card
•	Special IBM discounts
Additional information
            IBM is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or veteran status.

Quantum computing developer /engineer (part-time student)
                                Place of work
                            Bratislava, Slovakia (Job with occasional home office)
                                Contract type
                            part-time
POSITIONDESCRIPTIONClient Innovation Studio at Accenture Advanced Technology center is looking for technology enthusiasts and innovators ready for a challenging IT career with focus on quantum technology incubation, quantum computing (QC) solutions development, and solutions maintenance providing practical programming and technology implementation for business.As Quantum computing developer/engineer you will work with leading computing technologies e.g.: quantum technologies, algorithms to solve NP computing problems, pushing QC frontiers, leverage it in practical solutions and many more within our Liquid Innovation Team under Client Innovation Studio and participate on interesting prototypes, proof of concepts and projects focused on addressing the newest business challenges. WHAT WILLYOU DO• Actively participate in on-the-job training leading by senior QC developers to understand requirements and create together the technical designs for software projects• Work with state-of-the-art technologies and from every aspect from development through deployment to operations and monitoring• Writing high quality code to meet the requirements• Support and Maintenance of existing applications (analyzing and participating in resolution of faults in existing functionality)• Be part of a community focusing on Agile delivery and principles WHAT WEEXPECT• Interested in and keen to learn technologies and platforms like: Python, Jupyter Notebook, QC libraries, QC algorithm, cloud computing• At least basic knowledge of quantum programing, linear, quadratic programing like QUBO, optimization methods like simulated annealing, mathematical modeling. Possessing at least basic knowledge of SQL and are familiar with database concepts• Familiar with Software testing• Good analytical and creative problem-solving skills• Can proactively share your ideas with our team members• Can communicate in English with ease, both verbally and in writing WHAT WEOFFERSalary5,7 EUR/hourAccenture offers a competitive compensation package. As required by the Slovak law we state, that the legal hourly minimum gross base pay starting from 5.70€ depending on your professional and personal qualifications in the required areas.Flexibility: • Flexible working arrangements (Flex-work, Home Office)Future: • Wide range of leading-edge trainings (including various language course)• Teambuilding activities• Regular performance management and evaluation process• Ongoing career guidance and mentoring Interested?Apply for this job

POSITIONDESCRIPTIONAccenture Advanced Technology center is looking for technology enthusiasts ready for a challenging IT career and focus on application development.You could have the opportunity to help clients develop applications with a cloud-first, digital- first mindset, generate the next wave of innovative technology in our state-of-the-art Accenture Labs, and provide end-to-end service and project delivery across all our Accenture Delivery Center engagements using rapid development principles such as Agile and DevOps to make software faster, flexible and more liquid.Your talent – new challenge – new skill. Apply now! WHAT WILLYOU DOWHAT WILL YOU DOAs developer you will be helping our national and international projects realize their digital strategies by developing next-gen web, mobile-enabled responsive front-end and web applications.• Designing, coding and testing software modules/ applications that meet design specifications;• Creating, executing and documenting the tests necessary to ensure that an application or technical environment meets performance requirements (technical, functional and user interface);• Participating in identifying configuration changes to applications so that they meet business process requirements;• Integrating technical and application components• Maintaining, tuning and repairing applications in order to keep them performing according to technical and functional specifications• Be part of a community focusing on Agile delivery and principles WHAT WEEXPECT• 4+ years experience with semantic HTML, CSS, JavaScript (ES/TS); AngularJS• Understanding modern web development• Comfortable with design patterns and JavaScript best practices, OOP, FP, MVC, MVVM• Experience with modern web development toolkit; Git, Webpack, etc.• Experience with agile delivery• Good understanding of UX principles and best practices• SQL, NoSQL databases experience• Comfortable with *NIX and using the command line WHAT WEOFFERSalary1 800 - 3 000 EUR/monthAccenture offers a competitive compensation package. As required by the Slovak law we state, that the legal monthly minimum gross base pay starting from 1 800 € to 3 000 € depending on your professional and personal qualifications in the required areas.Recognition: • Guaranteed paid overtime or overtime vacation• German language bonus up to 400€ monthly/gross depending on language proficiency and level of seniority• Flexible Benefit System - budget to be spent on services of your choice• Competitive bonus structure• Refer-a-Friend – get a bonus in the employee referral program• Loyalty rewardsFlexibility: • Flexible working arrangements (time & place of work)Future: • Wide range of trainings and expert lectures• Regular performance review and career growth possibilities• Ongoing career guidance and mentoring (Global Mentoring Program, Lean In)• Employee share purchase planFamily & Health: • 3 extra days off• Sick leave salary compensation (up to 100%)• Home-office equipment• Family oriented benefits (Wedding, Parental and Baby days-off and bonuses)• Employee assistance services (professional psychological, financial and legal help)• Multisport card( Candidates with more related experience can be considered as senior position )  Interested?Apply for this job

Úvodná stránkaHľadanie práceJAVA Developer (Remote) 
JAVA Developer (Remote)ACEQES, s.r.o.
Miesto práce
Práca z domu
Druh pracovného pomeru
plný úväzok, skrátený úväzok, na dohodu (brigády), živnosť
Termín nástupu
Ihneď alebo dohodou
Mzdové podmienky (brutto)
10 - 35 EUR/hod.Výška odmeny je závislá na skúsenostiach uchádzača a na konkrétnom projekte.
Informácie o pracovnom mieste Náplň práce, právomoci a zodpovednostiSpoločnosť ACEQES hľadá skúseného JAVA developera, ideálne FULL-TIME (po dohode možnosť 75%, 50% alebo projektového úväzku). Práca v tíme, dlhodobá spolupráca.
Aktuálne máme otvorených niekoľko pozícii a projektov. Preferujeme programátorov s projektovými skúsenosťami s jedným alebo s viacerými z nasledujúcich technológii:
- Java 8/11/+
- Spring / Spring Boot
- Java EE
- veľkou výhodou znalosť ľubovoľného frontend frameworku (Vue, React, Angular)
- výhodou znalosť PHP
Projekty sú rôzneho zamerania - fintech / krypto, automotive, telekom a iné. K jednotlivým projektom radi poskytneme bližšie informácie e-mailom či telefonicky.
Vyžadujú sa:
- ideálne aspoň 2-3 roky komerčnej praxe na projektoch s JAVA a príslušnými technológiami
- otvorená komunikácia & spoľahlivosť
Výhodou je predchádzajúca skúsenosť s prácou v tíme, skúsenosti s prácou remote. Zamestnanecké výhody, benefityPonúkame:
- spolupráca na zaujímavých projektoch - interných, alebo ako súčasť tímu klienta
- možnosť 100%-nej spolupráce na diaľku
- IČO alebo iná forma spolupráce
- hradené vzdelávanie / kurzy (podľa projektu, aj podľa vlastného výberu)
- flexibilné pracovné podmienky, pohyblivá pracovná doba
- technologický a kariérny rast
- v prípade záujmu možnosť presunov na pozíciách v rámci projektu alebo na iný projekt Informácie o výberovom konaníV prípade záujmu zašlite prosím svoje aktuálne CV/portfólio na [email protected] spolu s nasledujúcimi informáciami:
- Vaša očakávaná mzda alebo hodinová sadzba
- preferovaný spôsob spolupráce (IČO / dohoda / iné)
- Vaša časová dostupnosť / možný termín nástupu

Úvodná stránkaHľadanie práceScrum Master 
Scrum Mastercargo-partner SR, s.r.o.
Place of work
Kopčianska 92, Petržalka, Slovakia, Bratislava (Job with occasional home office)
Contract type
full-time
Start date
01.02.2023
Wage (gross)
3 000 EUR/month
Information about the position Job description, responsibilities and dutiesHence we are looking for a team member to make sure agile methodology is applied and adhered to, facilitating daily meetings, planning, reviews, and retrospectives. Cooperate with a strong, independent technology group, where you will be viewed as a trusted partner, with shared goals! Play a key role in performance optimization, resolution of conflicts and mentoring of agile processes to ensure continuous improvement and service delivery.Sounds like your cup of tea? Read on!Here’s what your work will be focused on:Help the development team to create high value products: train, mentor, and support scrum teams to follow agile values, principles, and practicesSchedule & facilitate Agile events, meetings, and decision-making processes as requested or neededEnsure the proper use of collaborative processes and remove impediments and clear blocking issuesAssess progress and performance and help teams to bring improvements: provide status reporting to stakeholdersSupport the Product Owner in finding techniques for effective product backlog management and monitor objectives fulfilmentFollow up testing activity, ensuring that releases are deployed successfullyTrack project plans and ensure you meet deliverablesHere's what you'll need:3+ years of professional experience as a Scrum Master: working knowledge of agile methodology, techniques, and frameworks to deliver solutionsFamiliarity with software development (or university degree in Computer Science/Information Systems or equivalent)Excellent organizational skills and the ability to balance complex information with accuracyPositive “can-do” attitude, and good presentation and communication skillsStrong people and project management skills: ability to develop and maintain respectful and trusting relationship Employee perks, benefitsCareer plan and professional growth opportunities? We guarantee an individual path of professional development. We give development opportunities in various projects.Stability of employment? Dynamic work in a stable international company with a leading position in the air and sea freight market. We focus on long-term cooperation. After the project is over, we talk, listen and provide further challenges.Benefits? We provide technical and personal trainings, eLearning, co-financing of language courses and more Requirements for the employee Candidates with education suit the positionUniversity education (Bachelor's degree)
University education (Master's degree)Language skillsEnglish - Upper intermediate (B2)Number of years of experience3 Advertiser Brief description of the companycargo-partner is a leading multinational freight forwarder and integrated logistics provider with a particular strength in international transport solutions. Based in Austria, cargo-partner is present in over 30 countries with more than 3000 employees and continues to grow and expand across the world.
Our employees are highly motivated professionals with diverse cultural backgrounds who share a common passion for their work, excellent communication skills and a strong entrepreneurial approach.
We offer an interesting career kick-start for talented people without experience as well as rewarding opportunities for accomplished logistics and business professionals. We believe in establishing long-term relationships with our partners and in the continuous development of our employees. Number of employees200-249 employees

Úvodná stránkaHľadanie práceWeb Application Developer 
Web Application Developer
Miesto práce
Žilina
Druh pracovného pomeru
plný úväzok
Platové ohodnotenie
1 500 EUR/mesiac+ variabilná odmenaPracovné skúsenosti, prax v odbore a technická odbornosť (seniorita) budú zohľadnené v ponuke.
O nás
Siemens MobilitySpoločnosť Siemens Mobility poskytuje riešenia v oblasti integrovanej dopravy a logistiky, ako aj nízkonákladovej a ekologicky šetrnej dopravy.Popis pracovnej pozicie a zodpovednostiČo majú spoločné metrá vo Viedni, v Kodani, v Istanbule či v Buenos Aires?Sme to práve my!Inžinierske centrum Siemens Mobility v Žiline vzniklo v roku 2003 s pár ľuďmi na palube. Dnes nás je už viac ako 700 a každý rok rastieme. Pracujeme na projektoch po celom svete a za našou prácou môžeme vidieť reálne výsledky – napr. najmodernejšie vlakové linky a metrá v najvyspelejších štátoch sveta. Staňte sa aj Vy súčasťou inovácií v doprave a projektujte s nami pre celý svet! Do nášho svetovo úspešného Inžinierskeho centra v Žiline hľadáme kolegu, ktorý bude pracovať  na vývoji webových aplikácií a riešení pre široké použitie v oblasti mobility. Ak je Vám blízka téma udržateľnosti a moderných riešení ste našim človekom! Zistite viac o našej práci a projektoch na: https://www.mobility.siemens.com/sk/sk/spolocnost/kariera/zilina.htmlČo bude Vašou úlohou?Na oddelenie softvérového vývoja hľadáme nových kolegov na vývoj webových aplikácií a riešení pre široké použitie v oblasti mobility.•	Vytváranie funkčných, dizajnových a testovacích špecifikácií pre rôzne webové aplikácie•	Implementácia pomocou technológií HTML, JavaScript, Angular, NodeJS, Coldfusion, .NET(C#)•	Implementácia natívnych mobilných aplikácií (Android / iOS)•	Spolupráca s členmi tímu a podpora tímu počas celého vývojového cyklu projektuPozrite si krátky rozhovor s našou kolegyňou o jej práci u nás: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Rmgjrrf5ZVE
Potrebné vzdelanie, zručnosti a osobnostné predpoklady
Vzdelaniestredoškolské s maturitou
nadstavbové/vyššie odborné vzdelanie
vysokoškolské I. stupňa
vysokoškolské II. stupňa
vysokoškolské III. stupňa

Osobnostné predpoklady a zručnosti
                Technické znalosti
•	Návrh a implementácia webových aplikácií
•	Návrh a implementácia dátového modelu
•	Znalosť webových frameworkov: Angular, React, znalosť Coldfusion a/alebo .NET je výhodou
•	Znalosť technológií: Java, NodeJS, znalosť C# 
•	Znalosť databáz: MS SQL, PostgreSQL
•	Znalosť cloudových platforiem AWS a Microsoft Azure je výhodou
Osobnostné predpoklady:
•	 Analytické a logické myslenie
•	 Chuť a schopnosť učiť sa nové technológie a postupy
•	 Schopnosť práce v tíme a spolupráce naprieč viacerými tímami
•	 Zodpovednosť, samostatnosť a iniciatívnosť
Čo ponúkame
                •	Tréningový a rozvojový program (business a produktové školenia, e-learning, jazykové kurzy, soft skills tréningy,…)•	Program pre zdravie (wellness, športové aktivity, fitness, doplatok ušlej mzdy pri PN a OČR)•	Flexibilný pracovný čas - balans medzi pracovným a súkromným životom•	Skvelý team a teambuildingy•	Extra voľné dni (bridge days, sick days)•	Rodinný program (príspevok pri narodení dieťaťa, odchode na materskú dovolenku, príspevok na škôlku)•	Retention program (príspevok pri pracovnom výročí, životnom jubileu, doplnkové dôchodkové sporenie, zamestnanecké pôžičky)Nemáte pripravený životopis? plný úväzok
Platové ohodnotenie
1 500 EUR/mesiac+ variabilná odmenaKandidátom s vyššou úrovňou skúseností bude seniorita zohľadnená v ponuke.
O nás
Siemens MobilitySpoločnosť Siemens Mobility poskytuje riešenia v oblasti integrovanej dopravy a logistiky, ako aj nízkonákladovej a ekologicky šetrnej dopravy.Popis pracovnej pozicie a zodpovednostiČo majú spoločné metrá vo Viedni, v Kodani, v Istanbule či v Buenos Aires?Sme to práve my! Inžinierske centrum Siemens Mobility v Žiline vzniklo v roku 2003 s pár ľuďmi na palube. Dnes nás je už viac ako 700 a každý rok rastieme. Pracujeme na projektoch po celom svete a za našou prácou môžeme vidieť reálne výsledky – napr. najmodernejšie vlakové linky a metrá v najvyspelejších štátoch sveta. Staňte sa aj Vy súčasťou inovácií v doprave a projektujte s nami pre celý svet!Do nášho svetovo úspešného Inžinierskeho centra v Žiline,do nášho tímu, ktorý sa zaoberá komunikačnými a informačnými systémami v oblasti železničnej dopravy, hľadáme nových kolegov na pozíciu softvérového vývojára pre rádiové systémy. Vyvíjame inovatívne aplikácie a systémy na komunikáciu medzi vlakmi a traťovými systémami pre bezpečnejšiu a efektívnejšiu železničnú dopravu.Ak je Vám blízka téma udržateľnosti a moderných riešení ste našim človekom! Zistite viac o našej práci a projektoch na: https://www.mobility.siemens.com/sk/sk/spolocnost/kariera/zilina.htmlČo bude Vašou úlohou?•	Analýza funkčných požiadaviek kladených na systém•	Verifikácia softvérovej implementácie voči požiadavkám kladeným na systém•	Testovanie softvéru a analýza chýb•	Implementácia automatických testovacích scenárov v jazyku Python•	Spolupráca v rámci medzinárodného tímuPozrite si krátky rozhovor s našim kolegom o jeho práci u nás: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9JxttA0k8Ms

Vzdelanievysokoškolské I. stupňa
vysokoškolské II. stupňa
vysokoškolské III. stupňa
Vzdelanie v odbore
                Informatika, softvérové inžinierstvo, elektrotechnika, telekomunikácie alebo prírodné vedyJazykové znalostiAnglický jazyk - Stredne pokročilý (B2)
Osobnostné predpoklady a zručnosti
                Technické znalosti:
•	Základné znalosti v oblasti vývoja, testovania alebo validácie softvéru
•	Znalosť programovacieho jazyka Python
•	Znalosť nemeckého jazyka je výhodou 
Osobnostné predpoklady:
•	Analytické a logické myslenie
•	Chuť a schopnosť učiť sa nové technológie a postupy
•	Schopnosť práce v tíme a spolupráce naprieč viacerými tímami
•	Zodpovednosť, samostatnosť a iniciatívnosť
Čo ponúkame
                •	Tréningový a rozvojový program (business a produktové školenia, e-learning, jazykové kurzy, soft skills tréningy,…)•	Program pre zdravie (wellness, športové aktivity, fitness, doplatok ušlej mzdy pri PN a OČR)•	Flexibilný pracovný čas - balans medzi pracovným a súkromným životom•	Skvelý team a teambuildingy•	Extra voľné dni (bridge days, sick days)•	Rodinný program (príspevok pri narodení dieťaťa, odchode na materskú dovolenku, príspevok na škôlku)•	Retention program (príspevok pri pracovnom výročí, životnom jubileu, doplnkové dôchodkové sporenie, zamestnanecké pôžičky)Nemáte pripravený životopis? Úvodná stránkaHľadanie práceJunior C++ Developer ETCS OBU 
Junior C++ Developer ETCS OBU
Miesto práce
Žilina
Termín nástupu
ASAP
Druh pracovného pomeru
plný úväzok
Platové ohodnotenie
1 600 EUR/mesiac+ variabilná odmenaPracovné skúsenosti, prax v odbore a technická odbornosť (seniorita) budú zohľadnené v ponuke.
O nás
Siemens MobilitySpoločnosť Siemens Mobility poskytuje riešenia v oblasti integrovanej dopravy a logistiky, ako aj nízkonákladovej a ekologicky šetrnej dopravy.Popis pracovnej pozicie a zodpovednostiČo majú spoločné metrá vo Viedni, v Kodani, v Istanbule či v Buenos Aires?Sme to práve my! Inžinierske centrum Siemens Mobility v Žiline vzniklo v roku 2003 s pár ľuďmi na palube. Dnes nás je už viac ako 700 a každý rok rastieme. Pracujeme na  projektoch po celom svete a za našou prácou môžeme vidieť reálne výsledky – napr. najmodernejšie vlakové linky a metrá v najvyspelejších štátoch sveta. Staňte sa aj Vy súčasťou inovácií v doprave a projektujte s nami pre celý svet!Do nášho svetovo úspešného Inžinierskeho centra v Žiline, na oddelenie softvérového vývoja, hľadáme nových kolegov na vývoj vlakovej časti (OnBoard Unit) zabezpečovacieho systému ETCS (European Train Control System). Jedná sa o vývoj komplexného bezpečnostne relevantného softvéru, ktorý musí spĺňať požiadavky definované normou EN50128 na úrovni SIL4.Ak je Vám blízka téma udržateľnosti a moderných riešení ste našim človekom! Zistite viac o našej práci a projektoch na: https://www.mobility.siemens.com/sk/sk/spolocnost/kariera/zilina.htmlČo bude Vašou úlohou?•	Analýza funkčných požiadaviek kladených na systém•	Objektovo orientovaný design a implementácia softvéru v jazyku C++ podľa štandardov CENELEC a UNISIG•	Spolupráca s medzinárodnými tímami v agilnom prostredí (SCRUM)•	Podieľanie sa na odhadoch pracnosti a plánovaní úloh v spolupráci s ostatnými členmi tímu•	Review a vytváranie programátorskej a technickej dokumentácie•	Analýza chýb a ich dopad na systém, následne ich korekciaPozrite si krátky rozhovor s našou kolegyňou o jej práci u nás: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Rmgjrrf5ZVE
Potrebné vzdelanie, zručnosti a osobnostné predpoklady
Vzdelanievysokoškolské I. stupňa
vysokoškolské II. stupňa
vysokoškolské III. stupňa
Vzdelanie v odbore
                Technického smeru (informatika, softvérové inžinierstvo, elektrotechnika, telekomunikácie a prírodné vedy)Jazykové znalostiAnglický jazyk - Stredne pokročilý (B2)
Osobnostné predpoklady a zručnosti
                Technické znalosti:
•	Znalosť objektovo orientovaného programovania a SOLID princípov
•	Skúsenosť s programovaním v jazyku C++
•	Znalosť základných Design patterns
•	Skúsenosť s nástrojmi na riadenie zdrojového kódu (Git, SVN, Clear Case a pod.)
•	Skúsenosti s agilnými metódami projektového riadenia
•	Znalosť nemeckého jazyka je výhodou 
Osobnostné predpoklady:
•	Analytické a logické myslenie
•	Chuť a schopnosť učiť sa nové technológie a postupy
•	Schopnosť práce v tíme a spolupráce naprieč viacerými tímami
•	Zodpovednosť, samostatnosť a iniciatívnosť

Úvodná stránkaHľadanie práceMedior Azure Data Engineer Kosice  Можливість для людей з України
We harness the power of tech to increase sustainability.
How do you want to use technology?
 Medior Azure Data Engineer Kosice
                                Place of work
                            Košice, Slovakia (Job with occasional home office)
                                Contract type
                            full-time, part-time
POSITIONDESCRIPTIONAccenture Advanced Technology Center is looking for Data Engineers who are ready for a challenging IT career.You have the opportunity to grow as Data Engineer under Accenture’s wing and help our clients develop applications and generate the next wave of innovative solutions for the most decisive players of different industries. WHAT WILLYOU DOAs a Medior Azure Data Engineer, you are helping our projects with realizing their digital strategies.•	Developing new capabilities for our clients across multiple industries and regions•	As part of our data engineering team you will be trained and get the opportunity to work on enterprise next-generation data cloud-based solutions for our enterprise clients•	Collaborate on various projects for the development of new data warehouses, ETL or BI solutions•	Integrating the New Solutions with other existing components in the applications•	Be part of a community focusing on Agile delivery and applying agile principles in day to day work•	Co-operate and communicate with client teams to follow up on business requirements WHAT WEEXPECT•	Knowledge of Cloud services: AWS, Azure.•	Familiar with the concepts of relational and non-relational data, and different types of data workloads such as transactional or analytical.•	Experience with technologies in the Cloud Environment (like S3, Databricks, RDS or Blob , Azure SQL database)•	Hands-on experience with the following: Informatica PowerCenter, Informatica BDM or ICS•	Ability to write scripts in Python (using Pyspark, pandas …), SCALA is an advantage•	Ability to adapt to various data systems•	Experience with delivering projects within an agile environment WHAT WEOFFERSalary1 800 EUR/monthAccenture offers a competitive compensation package. As required by the Slovak law we hereby state, that the legal monthly minimum gross base pay starting from 1 800 € to 3 000 €  depending on your professional and personal qualifications in the required areas.Recognition: • Guaranteed paid overtime or overtime vacation• German language bonus up to 400€ monthly/gross depending on language proficiency and level of seniority• Flexible Benefit System - budget to be spent on services of your choice• Competitive bonus structure• Refer-a-Friend – get a bonus in the employee referral program• Loyalty rewardsFlexibility: • Flexible working arrangements (time & place of work)Future: • Wide range of trainings and expert lectures• Regular performance review and career growth possibilities• Ongoing career guidance and mentoring (Global Mentoring Program, Lean In)• Employee share purchase planFamily & Health: • 3 extra days off• Sick leave salary compensation (up to 100%)• Home-office equipment• Family oriented benefits (Wedding, Parental and Baby days-off and bonuses)• Employee assistance services (professional psychological, financial and legal help)• Multisport card Interested?Apply for this job

Supporting Data Architects with technical questions and decisions Being a Subject Matter Expert for specific areas and support others in these areas Building BI solutions using existing cloud provided services WHAT WEEXPECT•	Strong knowledge of Cloud services: AWS, Azure.•	Familiar with the concepts of relational and non-relational data, and different types of data workloads such as transactional or analytical.•	Experience with technologies in the Cloud Environment (like S3, Databricks, RDS or Blob , Azure SQL database)•	Hands-on experience with the following: Informatica PowerCenter, Informatica BDM or ICS•	Ability to write scripts in Python (using Pyspark, pandas …), SCALA is an advantage•	Ability to adapt to various data systems•	Experience with delivering projects within an agile environment WHAT WEOFFERSalaryFrom 2 800 EUR/monthAccenture offers a competitive compensation package. Úvodná stránkaHľadanie práceSenior Embedded C++ Software developer 
Senior Embedded C++ Software developer
Place of work
Lamačská cesta, 841 01 Bratislava, Slovakia (Job with occasional home office)
Start date
asap or by agreement
Contract type
full-time, trade licence
Salary
2 500 EUR/monthFrom 2500€  brutto/month + variable bonus*We are required by law to disclose basic wage component (minimum salary) for the advertised positions. We carefully consider your professional qualifications and experience in our compensation package and/or when offering you other positions. Our goal is to pay our employee's fairly, with regard to the market situation and we are ready to welcome high-quality candidates in our team.
About us
SiemensWe are a technology company focused on industry, infrastructure, transport, and healthcare. By combining the real and the digital worlds, we empower our customers to transform their industries and markets, helping them to transform the everyday for billions of people.Job description, responsibilities and dutiesWe are looking for a Senior embedded software developer for a project aimed at developing a future generation of a building automation system. You will build Eco System with cloud, edge device with wired and wireless device integration in a Scrum (SAFe) team.We expect:• 5+ years of professional experience with modern C++ for Embedded Systems• Expertise in system architecture (framework) development• OSS concepts and frameworks (edge, container, microservices)• Quality awareness with focus to automated CI/CD (GitLab runner, Lava) and configuration management (CMake)• Using, collaboration and contribution of Open- and Inner Source components/frameworks with focusing on upstream• Good knowledge of EnglishNice to have skills:• Network concept (IPV6, 6LoWPAN, thread) and implementation with strong focus to solution security• IoT standards (W3C, Building Topology Ontology, thing description)• Scripting Languages (Python)• German
            Required education, skills and personality requirements
Required educationFollow-up/Higher Professional EducationLanguage skillsEnglish - Upper intermediate (B2)Other knowledgeEmbedded C++ - AdvancedLinux - AdvancedIoT - BasicYocto Project - Basic
Number of years of experience
                5
We offer
                •	Work-life balance - flexible working hours and hybrid working model•	Free pool parking•	Bridge days (generally 5 days /year), Sick days (3 days /year), additional paid leave•	Sick leave compensation (up to 100% of salary, generally 20 days/year)•	Working with newest technologies + all projects run in agile methodology (we use SAFe)•	You can attend various international conferences (e.g., AWS)•	Cafeteria system – BenefitPlus generally 300 points/€•	Financial benefits –employee refferal bonus (up to 2 000€), childbirth bonus, contribution for attending a preschool facility (within Cafeteria system - BenefitPlus), payment of entry fee of representative sports activities•	Discounts for employees (banking services, electronics, computer technology, language courses, vacation stays)•	Contribution to 3rd pillar pension - progressive with length of employment (up to 3%)•	Share Matching program - after the employment trial period - opportunity to invest in the purchase of Siemens shares•	HEALTHY BACK PROGRAM = we offer ergonomic workplace (an electrically operated sit-stand desk, ergonomic chairs)•	Wellbeing program, Health Day , team-building program•	Employee loans - for employees with an employment relationship of more than 3 years•	2 SIM cards with discounted employee flat rate also for family members•	Work in a socially responsible company with the opportunity to participate in charitable projects•	We will support you! (Trainings, certificates, development internally and externally with individual approach based on your needs and request)•	Work anniversary present and life anniversary contribution•	Valuable gift on the occasion of retirement

About us

Úvodná stránkaHľadanie práceExperienced ServiceNow Consultant / Developer (permanent home office possible)  Можливість для людей з України
We harness the power of tech to increase sustainability.
How do you want to use technology?
 Experienced ServiceNow Consultant / Developer (permanent home office possible)
                                Place of work
                            Košice, Slovakia (Job with occasional home office)
                                Contract type
                            full-time
POSITIONDESCRIPTIONWe are looking for highly motivated individuals to work in this expanding environment. The successful candidate will form part of a core team accountable for the successful customization, rollout and maintenance of the Client ServiceNow platform. Delivering and establishing projects related implementation and innovation for multiple clients, ensuring high quality standards and following best practices.Accenture is expert in Intelligent Cloud & Infrastructure (IC&I) Services, collaborating seamlessly across our Global Advanced Technology Centers. IC&I Advanced Technology Center in Kosice is delivering the complete Lifecycle of Analysis, Design, Build and Run for IC&I Services and Service Management excellence. We engage and position ourselves for growth in emerging Technologies, Cloud, intelligent Automation and Artificial Intelligence. Accenture is ServiceNow’s largest professional services partner with over 5.500+ resources, and over 5000+ ServiceNow certifications and accreditations. WHAT WILLYOU DO• Contribute to ServiceNow Solution implementation, according to your role in a project, which could include such activities as: system configuration, development of custom features on client and server side, technical consulting, technical specifications preparation, testing support, rollout support and others.• Follow implementation standards and technical best practices.• Provide expertise on technical questions, related to ServiceNow platform.• Understand the business needs and the needs to standardize processes, and build this into the design and deliverables. WHAT WEEXPECTThis is what you already have:• Preferably university or equivalent degree in an IT-related field.• Proven track of records in client/server and Web applications implementation projects.• Working knowledge of JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Web development technologies and tools.• Working experience in agile software development environment (Scrum, Kanban).• Self-motivation and ability to work in self-organized teams.• Strong communication, presentation and technical writing skills.• Working proficiency in English.This is what would be advantage for you:• Previous ServiceNow experience in System Administrator or Application Developer roles. ServiceNow Certified Administrator and/or Application Developer certificate(s) is big advantage.• Understanding of technical and functional design best practices, related to ServiceNow.• Experience with other ITSM software (BMC, Landesk, Cherwell, Heat, Axios, HP,etc.).• Knowledge of AngularJS, Bootstrap, jQuery.• System integration experience using web services and other web based technologies such as XML, HTML, AJAX, CSS, HTTP, REST/SOAP.• Experience with relational databases (e.g. MySQL, Oracle).• Knowledge of IT Service Management and Operations. ITIL Service Delivery processes and ITIL Certifications is big advantage.• Experience in Web Applications development.• Strong communication and interpersonal skills including an ability to convey technical information using non-technical language.• Excellent troubleshooting skills with ability to demonstrate influence in a consultative fashion to stakeholders and other team members.•  Active knowledge of German language is an advantage for you. WHAT WEOFFERSalary2 800 - 4 300 EUR/monthAccenture offers a competitive compensation package. As required by the Slovak law we hereby state, that the legal monthly minimum gross base pay ranges from 2 800 € to 4 300 € depending on your professional and personal qualifications in the required areas.Recognition: • Guaranteed paid overtime or overtime vacation• German language bonus up to 400€ monthly/gross depending on language proficiency and level of seniority• Flexible Benefit System - budget to be spent on services of your choice• Competitive bonus structure• Refer-a-Friend – get a bonus in the employee referral program• Loyalty rewardsFlexibility: • Flexible working arrangements (time & place of work)Future: • Wide range of trainings and expert lectures• Regular performance review and career growth possibilities• Ongoing career guidance and mentoring (Global Mentoring Program, Lean In)• Employee share purchase planFamily & Health: • 3 extra days off• Sick leave salary compensation (up to 100%)• Home-office equipment• Family oriented benefits (Wedding, Parental and Baby days-off and bonuses)• Employee assistance services (professional psychological, financial and legal help)• Multisport card Interested?Apply for this job

Wage (gross)
From 2 000 EUR/monthOur final offer to you will be set up fairly, considering the skills and experience that you bring to the Swiss Re Group. You can look forward to extra rewards and benefits including an attractive performance-based bonus.
Information about the position Job description, responsibilities and dutiesAbout the Role
This role is a key innovative position within the New Propositions & Digital Partnerships team within Group Digital & Technology, with a focus on driving SwissRe to become a Risk, Knowledge and Data company through innovation and prototyping. The team and technology play a key role in helping to encourage a culture of technology excellence, automation, digitisation and better exploitation of data. We are looking for a Senior Developer with strong tech experience that can deliver quality code during innovation sprints, high quality code for reuse while also helping to drive agile working practices and focused delivery within engineering teams implementing market services.
Role Accountabilities:
•    To design and develop high quality reusable code as well as innovative prototypes
•    To work closely with internal and external technology colleagues to find, design and implement creative solutions to increase delivery velocity
•    To work alongside and within existing engineering teams in various initiatives running across the digital transformation unit
•    To create prototypes hands-on in hothouse cases
•    To share code, knowledge and best practices with other teams involved in delivery of the Platform to our customers.
•    To support define and implement technology best practice across SwissRe while being a role model of technical and behavioural excellence
Key Responsibilities:
•    To create robust, changeable and scalable technology applications – from ideation, to prototyping to production delivery, across a mix of green-field and existing modern applications
•    To help build and shape an increased engineering and delivery team culture, responsible for designing and implementing products across our technology platform with a quick iterative approach and focusing on ability to scale features and business processes
•    To promote engineering excellence, focusing on effective cross-function collaboration and end-to-end responsibility, from rapid prototyping/proof of concepts to delivery, ensuring simplicity, maintainability and scalability of the implementations
•    Form part of an engineering community, within which you are keen to ensure techniques and approaches seek to continuously improve
•    To be aware of and able to innovatively respond to the differing compliance, risk and regulatory controls
•    To help drive continued learning by investigating and applying new technologies and practices to the digital transformation approaches
About the Team
New Propositions & Digital Partnerships is a multi-disciplined team with capabilities to embed innovation culture within SwissRe and has a focus on creating and building digital capabilities to explore new opportunities within the insurance market.
As part of SwissRe, New Propositions & Digital Partnerships collaborates with various other areas of the organisation to support them in achieving their commercial goals by delivering innovative and effective digital capability for their clients and partners. Information about the selection processThis job offer is suitable for people who have been impacted by the invasion of Ukraine.
We provide feedback to all candidates via email. If you have not heard back from us, please check your spam folder. Requirements for the employee Candidates with education suit the positionUniversity education (Bachelor's degree)
University education (Master's degree)Language skillsEnglish - Upper intermediate (B2)Personality requirements and skillsAbout You
You…
•    enjoy the challenge of delivering at pace
•    like experimenting with new technologies and testing how well they suit real needs
•    are team focused, able to work in an environment of high levels of change and complexity
•    think that long-term is built step by step, and aren’t bothered by the uncertainty of walking new paths
And have a University degree (Master's equivalent) in Computer Science, Engineering, or Mathematics or can demonstrate equivalent knowledge, we’d be delighted to hear from you!
Professional Experience:
•    5+ years of broad engineering experience, including working with practices such as continuous integration & deployment, TDD, DevSecOps and Agile approaches
•    Proficient in at least one major programming language (e.g. Golang, Java, C#, C++, Rust) and willingness to use a different one if required
•    Hands-on experience with modern web development frameworks (e.g. React, Vue, Angular, Svelte, Astro, Qwik)
•    Hands-on experience with designing and building modern applications and infrastructure in public cloud environments, NoSQL databases, MQ/streaming services, containerization, application moniotring, CI/CD tooling
•    Kowledge of emerging technologies (e.g. AI/ML, AR/VR) is desirable
•    Awareness of IT security topics and trends, vulnerabilities and their remediation is desirable
Leadership Qualities:
•    Ability to introduce & encourage new ideas and enthuse the team to implementing these
•    Communicates effectively and influences across the technology community
•    Thinks practically in defining solutions balancing business needs with technical
•    Establishes, maintains and develops strong relationship within the wider SwissRe development community
Soft Skills:
•    Effectively explores opportunities, shaping up new initiatives working with team members from various areas of the organisation
•    Effectively share ideas
•    Good listener but can speak up if and when required
•    Actively network and build relationships across teams with different cultures and working environments
•    Results-oriented and ambitious with a positive attitude
•    Ability to operate in a team in a rapidly-changing insurance environment
•    Highly proactive, and motivated with a positive can-do attitude
•    Willingness to work "virtually" with the opportunity for travel to other SwissRe locations Advertiser Brief description of the companyAs the world's leading and most diversified global reinsurer, we offer as our core business financial services products that enable risk taking essential to enterprise and progress. Our company was founded in Zurich, Switzerland in 1863, and operates in more than 25 countries and provides its expertise and services to clients throughout the world. We combine financial strengths with experience, knowledge and creative thought to explore new opportunities in the interests of our clients, staff and shareholders. Number of employees1700 and more employees Company addressLearn more about working in Swiss Re Slovakia. ContactContact person: Magdalena Lendvorska

Úvodná stránkaHľadanie práceBusiness Solution Architect 
O SPOLOČNOSTI
NAŠE SLUŽBY
PRE KANDIDÁTOV
KONTAKT
Business Solution ArchitectInformácie o pracovnom miesteMiesto práce: Bratislava, Slovensko (Pozícia umožňuje občasnú prácu z domu)Mzdové podmienky (brutto): Od 4 700 EUR/mesiac(finálna úroveň základnej zložky mzdy závisí od skúseností a znalostí kandidáta)*Termín nástupu: dohodou, ihneď výhodaDruh pracovného pomeru: plný úväzokNáplň práce, právomoci a zodpovednostiArchitect je zodpovedný za celkové smerovanie SW/HW produktov,  definovanie technológií a riadenie high-level designu v rámci projektov spoločnosti. Jeho práca sa týka celého cyklu projektov od posúdenia SW produktu z pohľadu celkovej architektúry až po jeho návrh a delivery. Koordinuje 3 Architektov (System&Software design), ktorí pracujú na jednotlivých SW komponentoch/produktoch.
Rozsah tejto pozície spočíva vo vývoji, návrhu, adaptácii a implementácii procesov pre definovanie technickej architektúry.
- Celkový Project Technical Architecture Management
- Celkový Integračný Management
- Zodpovednosť za rozvoj produktov, inovácie
- Definovanie technológií v rámci projektov.
- Dohľad nad Architektúrou v projektoch a Product Quality Management - hodnotením kvality projektu z pohľadu nákladov, časového hľadiska, zdrojov, kvality kódu a celkovej architektúry. 
°	Process Design a technické špecifikácie (EA, C4 Model) 
°	Definovanie architektúry (design Patterns, microservices, Cloud, web aplikácií a mobile aplikácií) 
°	interná komunikácia všetkých projektových procesov a projektovej dokumentácie v oblasti high-level design, low-designu.
°	podpora produktového vývoja a spolupráca s projektovými manžérmi. Iné výhody- zázemie silnej technologickej spoločnosti
- zaujímavé technológie a dlhodobé projekty Spoločnosť, pre ktorú je pozícia obsadzovanáInformačné technológieSpoločnosť pôsobiaca na medzinárodnom trhu a poskytujúca špecifické produkty a SW riešenia svojim klientom. Požiadavky na zamestnanca Požadované vzdelaniestredoškolské s maturitou
vysokoškolské I. stupňa
vysokoškolské II. stupňaVzdelanie v odboreIT, SW EngineeringJazykové znalostiAnglický jazyk - Stredne pokročilý (B2)Požadovaná praxIT Architect5Osobnostné predpoklady a zručnosti°           Kandidát musí mať bohaté profesionálne skúsenosti  s technickou architektúrou z pohľadu jej návrhu a kvality,  posudzovaním projektov z pohľadu vývoja architektúry v rámci rôznych aplikačných riešení a komponentov, pre Cloud/WEB/mobile aplikácie.
°          preferované sú skúsenosti s projektami, hodnotením kvality projektu z pohľadu nákladov, časového hľadiska, zdrojov, kvality kódu a celkovej architektúry. 
°           Profesionálne skúsenosti so Software delivery sú veľkou výhodou; Scrum/Kanban a podobné skúsenosti sú výhodou. 
°           Minimum 5 rokov profesionálnej skúsenosti v IT v pozícii Architect s riadením tímu do 10 ľudí.
°           Skúsenosti s projektami s dôrazom na Project Management.
Osobnostné zručnosti:
°	Vynikajúce komunikačné zručnosti, Proaktívny a iniciatívny
°	Schopnosť pracovať pod stresom, schopnosť nastaviť procesy tak aby minimalizovali tieto negatíva Inzerujúca spoločnosť Stručná charakteristika spoločnostiPro HR, s.r.o. je personálno-poradenská spoločnosť špecializujúca sa na oblasť služieb recruiting & selection, executive search a HR consulting. Svojim klientom poskytujeme individuálny prístup k riešeniu otázky zabezpečenia kvalifikovaných zamestnancov. Pro HR realizuje vyhľadávanie a výber kandidátov aktívnym a priamym spôsobom prostredníctvom služieb recruiting & selection a executive search. 
Konzultanti spoločnosti permanentne mapujú trh, poznajú aký typ zamestnancov sa nachádza v spoločnostiach s podobným zameraním klienta, príp. konkrétne vhodné pozície s ich náplňou a zodpovednosťami v iných spoločnostiach. Na základe ich znalosti je možné priamo osloviť potenciálne vhodného kandidáta s požadovaným súborom znalostí a skúsenosti. 
Spoločnosť Pro HR, s.r.o. sa v oblasti vyhladávania a výberu kandidátov špecializuje na cieľovú skupinu: 
1. nižší, stredný, vyšší manažment 
2. špecializované pozície – financie, predaj & marketing, logistika & nákup, procesy a kvalita, project management & stratégia + support, CRM 
3. IT/telco technické pozície, Help Desk pozície (IT a telco špecialisti, programátori, analytici, SW architekti, projektoví manažéri, atď.)Spoločnosť je držiteľ povolenia na sprostredkovanie práce. (AA/2009/4810/4232/OISS) Hlavná oblasť pôsobenia spoločnostiSprostredkovanie práce a personálne poradenstvo Počet zamestnancov10-19 zamestnancov Informácie o výberovom konaní* Podľa Zákona o službách zamestnanosti 5/2004 Z. z., § 62 ods. 2, sme povinní uvádzať sumu základnej zložky mzdy. Konečná výška Vašej skutočnej mzdy je odvodená od Vašich odborných skúseností, znalostí, zručností a toho ako zodpovedajú požiadavkám konkrétnej pozície.

Junior .NET Application DeveloperInformácie o pracovnom miesteMiesto práce: Bratislava, Slovensko (Pozícia umožňuje občasnú prácu z domu)Mzdové podmienky (brutto): Od 2 000 EUR/mesiacfinálna úroveň základnej zložky mzdy závisí od skúseností a znalostí kandidáta*Termín nástupu: dohodouDruh pracovného pomeru: plný úväzokNáplň práce, právomoci a zodpovednostiJunior .NET Application Developer pracuje v tíme, ktorý zodpovedá za vývoj a aplikačnú správu (systémy pre výrobu a sklad, napríklad pre skenovanie čiarových kódov atď).
Úlohy:
-	práca v aplikačnom tíme pri vývoji nových funkcionalít a následná údržba existujúceho riešenia
-	programovanie v jazyku C#  , MS SQL, .NET Core
-	návrh funkcionality, vývoj a jej integrácia do existujúceho systému
-	tvorba technickej špecifikácie
-	post-implementačná podpora zákazníkovi, bug fixing,  konfigurácia aplikácie, monitoring aplikácie, testovanie aplikácie, komunikácia s klientom Iné výhodyzázemie stabilnej spoločnosti
zaujímavý sociálny program
systém benefitov

Oracle Engineer Informácie o pracovnom miesteMiesto práce: Bratislava, Slovensko (Pozícia umožňuje občasnú prácu z domu)Mzdové podmienky (brutto): Od 2 900 EUR/mesiac(finálna úroveň základnej zložky mzdy závisí od skúseností a znalostí kandidáta)*Termín nástupu: dohodouDruh pracovného pomeru: plný úväzok, živnosťNáplň práce, právomoci a zodpovednosti•	Spolupráca na analýze požiadaviek -  presná špecifikácia a riešenie technických problémov vzniknutých počas komunikácie medzi jednotlivými systémami (aplikácia/databáza/cloud prostredie)
•	Vývoj, validácia, testovanie komplexnej funkcionality formou Oracle DB stored packages, object types, views, functions a procedures SQL a PLSQL
•      Detekcia bugov, optimalizácia queries a PL/SQL programov
•	Rozširovanie funkčnosti existujúcich častí systému, procesov a dostupnosť integrovaných aplikácií
•	Testovanie vybraných častí systému /testovať a nasadzovať nové verzie integračných procesov do integračnej platformy 
•	Integrácia riešenia s inými systémami/aplikáciami, 
•	Podpora a údržba existujúceho riešenia presne špecifikovať a riešiť prevádzkové problémy vzniknuté počas komunikácie medzi internými IS systémami
•	Mentoring menej skúsených vývojárov v tíme Iné výhody- stabilná medzinárodná spoločnosť pracujúca s najmodernejšími technológiami
- široká škála benefitov v oblasti zdravotnej starostlivosti, športu, kultúry voliteľných podľa vašich vlastných preferencií
- vzdelávacie centrum
- kompenzácia pri práceneschopnosti Spoločnosť, pre ktorú je pozícia obsadzovanáIné neuvedené oblastiStabilná medzinárodná spoločnosť. Požiadavky na zamestnanca Požadované vzdelaniestredoškolské s maturitou

•	schopnosť a ochota učiť sa nové technológie Inzerujúca spoločnosť Stručná charakteristika spoločnostiPro HR, s.r.o. je personálno-poradenská spoločnosť špecializujúca sa na oblasť služieb recruiting & selection, executive search a HR consulting. Svojim klientom poskytujeme individuálny prístup k riešeniu otázky zabezpečenia kvalifikovaných zamestnancov. Pro HR realizuje vyhľadávanie a výber kandidátov aktívnym a priamym spôsobom prostredníctvom služieb recruiting & selection a executive search. 
Konzultanti spoločnosti permanentne mapujú trh, poznajú aký typ zamestnancov sa nachádza v spoločnostiach s podobným zameraním klienta, príp. konkrétne vhodné pozície s ich náplňou a zodpovednosťami v iných spoločnostiach. 1. nižší, stredný, vyšší manažment

•	komunikačné zručnosti, schopnosť práce v tíme i samostatnosť, flexibilita, analytické myslenie, kreativita Inzerujúca spoločnosť Stručná charakteristika spoločnostiPro HR, s.r.o. je personálno-poradenská spoločnosť špecializujúca sa na oblasť služieb recruiting & selection, executive search a HR consulting. Svojim klientom poskytujeme individuálny prístup k riešeniu otázky zabezpečenia kvalifikovaných zamestnancov. Pro HR realizuje vyhľadávanie a výber kandidátov aktívnym a priamym spôsobom prostredníctvom služieb recruiting & selection a executive search. 
Konzultanti spoločnosti permanentne mapujú trh, poznajú aký typ zamestnancov sa nachádza v spoločnostiach s podobným zameraním klienta, príp. konkrétne vhodné pozície s ich náplňou a zodpovednosťami v iných spoločnostiach. Na základe ich znalosti je možné priamo osloviť potenciálne vhodného kandidáta s požadovaným súborom znalostí a skúsenosti.

1. nižší, stredný, vyšší manažment

Úvodná stránkaHľadanie práceJunior Apache Kafka Developer - BA, ZA, PD 
Junior Apache Kafka Developer - BA, ZA, PDSOFTEC
Miesto práce
Bratislava, Slovensko (Pozícia umožňuje občasnú prácu z domu)
Druh pracovného pomeru
plný úväzok, na dohodu (brigády)
Termín nástupu
Dohodou
Mzdové podmienky (brutto)
1 300 EUR/mesiacod 1 300,- €/mes. + variabilná zložka mzdy + ďalšie benefity. Výsledné mzdové ohodnotenie závisí od úrovne skúseností a výkonu.
Informácie o pracovnom mieste Náplň práce, právomoci a zodpovednostiDáta sú hnacím motorom digitalizácie a dátový streming ich umožňuje včas a efektívne spracovať, čím sa stáva kľúčovým predpokladom úspechu v rýchlo sa meniacom prostredí.Máš skúsenosti s vývojom riešení na báze Apache Kafka, alebo máš chuť svoje zručnosti v tejto oblasti rozvinúť? Chceš sa zúčastnit projektov adopcie datového streamingu a podielať sa na jeho zavedení do IT ecosytémov významných bánk, poisťovní a telekomunikačných operátorov?   V takom prípade nám pošli svoj životopis – SOFTEC hľadá vhodných kandidátov na posilnenie svojho Kafka tímu, ktorý za viac ako 5 rokov svojej existencie pre našich klientov vytvoril mnoho unikátnych riešení v oblasti digitálneho marketingu, integrácie dátových kanálov, real-time datovej integrácie a iných. Určite radi privítame do tímu aj teba. Tvojou náplňou práce bude teda samotný vývoj a podpora riešení na báze Apache Kafka. Neboj sa, nehodíme ťa do vody, aby si sám plával. Ako každý nováčik u nás, bude aj tebe pridelený tútor, ktorý ťa bude viesť a pomaháť ti so zadanými úlohami. Všetkým talentom vytvárame inšpiratívne podmienky pre profesionálny i osobnostný rozvoj a vzdelávanie.  Zamestnanecké výhody, benefityzaujímavú prácu na atraktívnych projektoch, ktorá posunie tvoj skill na vyšší levelhomeoffice penzijné      zabezpečenie/ 3. pilier DDSdni dovolenky navyše pre      všetkých podľa levelu      seniority           Kafetériapríspevok na technologickú      vychytávku (na pracovné vybavenie)podpora zdravotnej      starostlivostifinančný príspevok na      jazykové vzdelávanieprepracovaný systém odborného vzdelávania a rozvoja soft skillspôžička na riešenie bytovej      situáciereferral      programhome office (napriek tomu      chodí mnoho naších kolegov do práce pretože sa chce stretávať      s ostantými)rozsiahly benefitný systém (Multisport karta, príspevky na šport, kultúru, zdravie a pod.)letná a zimná Softecovica,      divízovice, detský Mikuláštematické týždne – nanukový,      ovocný, zdravý a pod.skupinové aktivity –      maratóny a bežecký klubvýučba angličtiny priamo na      pracovisku v Žilinev Bratislave joga      priamo na pracovisku Informácie o výberovom konaníAk ťa ponuka zaujala, neváhaj a pošli nám svoje CV.  Požiadavky na zamestnanca Pozícii vyhovujú uchádzači so vzdelanímvysokoškolské I. stupňa
vysokoškolské II. stupňa
vysokoškolské III. stupňaVzdelanie v odboreInformatika, SW vývojPozícia je vhodná pre absolventaÁnoOsobnostné predpoklady a zručnosti-  skúsenosti s technológiami Kafka, Kafka Streams, Kafka Connect, KSQL alebo skúsenosti v oblasti Java, BigData, DB - silný týmový hráč- ochota a schopnosť neustále sa učiť  - znalosť anglického jazyka výhodou  - proaktivný prístup  - VŠ/SŠ vzdelanie Inzerujúca spoločnosť Stručná charakteristika spoločnostiSme softvérovo-konzultačná spoločnosť, spolu nás je už vyše 400 a neustále rastieme. Určite radi privítame do tímu aj teba. Neboj sa, nehodíme ťa do vody, aby si sám plával. 
Ak si junior, tak ako každý nováčik u nás, budeš aj ty na začiatku zaradený do útvaru Akadémia a bude ti pridelený tútor, ktorý ťa bude viesť a pomáhať ti so zadanými úlohami. Následne, keď budeš na to pripravený, po mesiaci až dvoch, začneš pracovať na reálnom projekte. Mladým talentom vytvárame inšpiratívne podmienky pre profesionálny i osobnostný rozvoj a vzdelávanie. 
Pri medioroch a senioroch je priebeh zaškoľovania primeraný ich aktuálnym znalostiam a taktiež s podporou prideleného tútora. Pracujeme s technológiami ako napríklad Angular, Java, .NET, React ale aj vlastnými ako napr. JavaTec. 
Sídlo spoločnosti máme v Bratislave v budove Einpark - najzelenšej kancelárskej budove na Slovensku, ktorá vďaka svojim udržateľným princípom získala viacero certifikátov. Naše ďalšie pobočky máme v Prahe, Prievidzi a v Žiline.
Od iných firiem sa líšime hlavne tým, že pojmy rodinná a príjemná atmosféra nie sú pre nás iba prázdne slová, ale je to reálny motivátor našich zamestnancov. Dokazujú to aj naše interné prieskumy spokojnosti, fluktuácia nepresahujúca dvojciferné číslo, stabilné tímy, naši dlhoroční kolegovia a nakoniec aj samotné pravidelné umiestnenie medzi najlepšími zamestnávateľmi. Tento rok nás opäť neminulo ocenenie od Profesie a sme medzi top 10 najzamestnávateľmi na Slovensku v oblasti IT. Naša pobočka v Bratislave nedávno získala ocenenie Office roka 2021 – Zdravá kancelária, pričom k tomuto rozhodnutiu, ako uviedla samotná porota, prispela tiež rodinná atmosféra, ktorú v našich officoch cítili.  
Máme prepracovaný benefitný systém, ktorý ponúka množstvo zaujímavých výhod ako napríklad:
•	penzijné zabezpečenie/ 3. pilier DDS
•	dni dovolenky navyše pre všetkých podľa levelu seniority     
•	Kafetéria       
•	príspevok na technologickú vychytávku (na pracovné vybavenie)
•	podpora zdravotnej starostlivosti
•	finančný príspevok na jazykové vzdelávanie 
•	pôžička na riešenie bytovej situácie 
•	referral program
•	lifestyle aktivity - ranné cvičenia jogy, zdravý chrbát, webináre a pod.
•	oddychové zóny, cyklomiestnosť
•	parkovanie, auto na operatívny leasing
•	home office (napriek tomu chodí mnoho našich kolegov do práce pretože sa chce stretávať s ostantnými) 
•	letná a zimná Softecovica, divízovice, detský Mikuláš
•	tematické týždne – nanukový, ovocný, zdravý a pod.
•	skupinové športové aktivity – maratóny a bežecký klub, florbal, volejbal a ďalšie

Úvodná stránkaHľadanie práceMalware Researcher  Можливість для людей з України
Voľné pozície
O nás
Zamestnanecké výhody
Kontakt
Malware Researcher
                                Place of work
                            Bratislava, Slovakia (Job with occasional home office)
                                Contract type
                            full-time
                                Wage (gross)
From 2 000 EUR/monthPerformance bonus 2 times per year up to 16,67% of the basic salary paid for the evaluation period(usually 6 months).*The final basic wage component can be increased accordingly to individual skills and experience of the selected candidate.
Information about the position Job description, responsibilities and dutiesWe are looking for Malware Researcher who will join our Experimental Research & Detection team.
What does working as Malware Researcher entail?
Malware Researchers work under the Security Research Laboratory, which we refer to simply as VirusLab. This position is specifically suited for our Experimental Research and Detection team, where we are focused on threat detection on network level, botnet network monitoring, various exploit propagation research,  Internet of Things research (IOT botnets, IOT exploits…), and other interesting stuff. 
Our work consist on analyzing malicious activity, track entire operations, and figure out at how they function. Finally we develop proper detections to neutralize the threat. Employee perks, benefits• Support in personal and professional development - opportunities to attend various trainings, courses, conferences or meetups
• Attractive financial bonus paid twice a year based on your performance
• Financial support in case of life milestones (wedding, childbirth)
• Complementary retirement savings contributions
• Fully covered 7 EUR/per day meal vouchers
• Wide range of benefits in sport, healthcare, culture, education and other areas
• "Refer a friend" benefit - the opportunity to receive a financial bonus when referring a friend for an open vacancy
• Available home-office days - 12 days per month (in SR)
• Fully-paid 3 sickdays
• Loyalty program - extra vacation days and financial bonus after working at ESET for 5 and more years
• Mind & Soul program - free helpline and counselling in personal and professional development
• Sport activities support – possibility to participate in various races, bike cages, bikes for rent
• Fresh fruit, tea, coffee, non-alcoholic beverages - you can find them all in every kitchen
• Casual, friendly, open culture with no dress code
• Participating in company events
• Opportunity to use company common areas (terrace, relax zone, library) for a chill time and meetings with colleagues
• Volunteering and opportunity to participate in various CSR activities Requirements for the employee Candidates with education suit the positionSecondary with school-leaving examination
University education (Bachelor's degree)
University education (Master's degree)Language skillsEnglish - Upper intermediate (B2)Personality requirements and skills• good understanding of network protocols and principles: IP, TCP, UDP, HTTP, TLS, DNS, DHCP, ...
• ability to capture and analyze network traffic: Wireshark, Tcpdump, Snort, Suricata, Zeek, ...
• write scripts in Python
• create basic SQL queries
• basic Linux administration skills: install and configure SSH/HTTP/DHCP/VPN server, configure Iptables, log analysis, Bash, CRON, ...
• ability to read and understand programs written in various types of languages: ASM, C, C++, JS, PHP, Ruby, Perl, ...
• experience with reverse engineering and computer forensics is advantage: IDA, OllyDbg, WinDbg, ILSpy, Hiew, WinHex, Volatility, ...
• team work, reliability, ability to come with new ideas, critical thinking, patience
• good English
• good presentation skills is plus Advertiser Brief description of the companyThe beginnings of ESET date back to 1987, when two young programming enthusiasts, Peter Paško and Miroslav Trnka, wrote a program for the detection of one of the world’s first computer viruses. They did not know that they had created one of the most successful antivirus programs in the world – dubbing it NOD. In 1992, together with their mutual friend Rudolf Hrubý, they formally established ESET.
What started as the brainchild of a few friends has evolved into the most valuable international brand of any Slovak company. Today ESET’s NOD32 technology protects over 100 million users across the world.
This success did not come overnight. The company’s global success and growth was given a boost in 1998 with its first “VB100” award from the prestigious Virus Bulletin magazine. Since then, we’ve received this accolade more than 100 times.
Today, over 2,100 employees around the world drive the company’s success – a telling increase from 3 in 1987 and 135 in 2006. More than 1200 of them are based in Slovakia, the home of ESET headquarters.
Throughout the company’s expansion, we have stayed true to the principles on which we were founded, and we remain independent in order to continue to meet new challenges. Number of employees1000 and more employees ContactContact person: Marika FiamínováE-mail: send CV
Send CV to the company

From 2 600 EUR/monthPerformance bonus 2 times per year up to 25% of the basic salary paid for the evaluation period(usually 6 months).*The final basic wage component can be increased accordingly to individual skills and experience of the selected candidate.
Information about the position Job description, responsibilities and dutiesWe are looking for experienced Linux C++ Developer to join our agile team, which is responsible for developing anti-virus solution for Linux Servers.
Responsibilities:
• Designing and implementation of multi-threaded asynchronous microservices written in C++.
• Writing quality-oriented code including unit tests and developer documentation.
• Facilitating peer code reviews.
• Participating in Scrum ceremonies.
• Collaboration with other development teams.
Minimum qualifications:
• Bachelor ’s degree in Computer Science or similar technical field of study
• 5+ years of experience in software development using C++
• advanced knowledge about object-oriented design and programming
• worked with multi-threaded systems at 1+ projects
• user experience with Linux operating systems
• experience with Git
• English language B2 or higher
Preferred experience in:
• designing and implementation of complex object-oriented systems
• designing multi-threaded and/or multi-process systems
• complex algorithms and data structures
• designing protocols
• programming network services
• scripting languages (Python, Bash, etc.)
• CMake and Make-based build systems
• developing Linux applications and/or kernel modules Employee perks, benefits• Support in personal and professional development - opportunities to attend various trainings, courses, conferences or meetups
• Attractive financial bonus paid twice a year based on your performance
• Financial support in case of life milestones (wedding, childbirth)
• Complementary retirement savings contributions
• Fully covered 7 EUR/per day meal vouchers
• Wide range of benefits in sport, healthcare, culture, education and other areas
• "Refer a friend" benefit - the opportunity to receive a financial bonus when referring a friend for an open vacancy
• Available home-office days - 12 days per month (in SR)
• Fully-paid 3 sickdays
• Loyalty program - extra vacation days and financial bonus after working at ESET for 5 and more years
• Mind & Soul program - free helpline and counselling in personal and professional development
• Sport activities support – possibility to participate in various races, bike cages, bikes for rent
• Fresh fruit, tea, coffee, non-alcoholic beverages - you can find them all in every kitchen
• Casual, friendly, open culture with no dress code
• Participating in company events
• Opportunity to use company common areas (terrace, relax zone, library) for a chill time and meetings with colleagues
• Volunteering and opportunity to participate in various CSR activities Requirements for the employee Candidates with education suit the positionUniversity education (Bachelor's degree)
University education (Master's degree)
Postgraduate (Doctorate)Language skillsEnglish - Intermediate (B1) Advertiser Brief description of the companyThe beginnings of ESET date back to 1987, when two young programming enthusiasts, Peter Paško and Miroslav Trnka, wrote a program for the detection of one of the world’s first computer viruses. They did not know that they had created one of the most successful antivirus programs in the world – dubbing it NOD. In 1992, together with their mutual friend Rudolf Hrubý, they formally established ESET.
What started as the brainchild of a few friends has evolved into the most valuable international brand of any Slovak company. Today ESET’s NOD32 technology protects over 100 million users across the world.
This success did not come overnight. The company’s global success and growth was given a boost in 1998 with its first “VB100” award from the prestigious Virus Bulletin magazine. Since then, we’ve received this accolade more than 100 times.
Today, over 2,100 employees around the world drive the company’s success – a telling increase from 3 in 1987 and 135 in 2006. More than 1200 of them are based in Slovakia, the home of ESET headquarters.
Throughout the company’s expansion, we have stayed true to the principles on which we were founded, and we remain independent in order to continue to meet new challenges. Number of employees1000 and more employees ContactContact person: Marika FiamínováE-mail: send CV

KONTAKT
IT Analyst (EA/draw.io/MS Visio)Informácie o pracovnom miesteMiesto práce: Bratislava, Slovensko (Pozícia umožňuje občasnú prácu z domu)Mzdové podmienky (brutto): Od 2 300 EUR/mesiac*finálna úroveň základnej zložky mzdy závisí od skúseností a znalostí kandidátaTermín nástupu: dohodouDruh pracovného pomeru: plný úväzok, živnosťNáplň práce, právomoci a zodpovednostiIT Analyst je súčasťou tímu, ktorý navrhuje a vyvíja aplikácie pre celú grupu. Zodpovedá za návrh front-end aj back-end časti systému (jedná sa o aplikácie- webové aj mobilné). Hľadáme kandidátov rôznej úrovne skúseností.
Úlohy:
- Komunikácia so zákazníkom , získavanie a spracovanie požiadaviek na novú funkcionalitu IS, zmeny funkcionalít, návrh vylepšení systému 
- Zhodnotenie vplyvu novej funkcionality na existujúci IS
- Zodpovednosť za realizáciu funkčnej analýzy, technickej analýzy, tvorba funkčnej a technickej špecifikácie
- Návrh riešenia/novej business logiky, tvorba novej špecifikácie pre potreby programátorov, tvorba aktivity/integračných diagramov, modelovanie pomocou Enterprise Architect (príp. MS Visio, draw.io)
- Návrh front-endu /obrazoviek IS z pohľadu UI a UX.
- Koordinácia úloh týkajúcich sa prispôsobeniu a zmien implementovanej aplikácie
- Návrh testovacích prípadov
- Spolupráca s celým realizačným tímom (analytici, FE a BE programátori, architekt, solution manažér, testeri, projektový manažér) Iné výhody-	zázemie globálnej spoločnosti
-	dynamicky rozvíjajúci sa tím
-	odborný a osobnostný rast 
-	zaujímavý benefitný program Spoločnosť, pre ktorú je pozícia obsadzovanáInformačné technológieMedzinárodná spoločnosť pôsobiaca v oblasti informačných technológií. Požiadavky na zamestnanca Požadované vzdelaniestredoškolské s maturitou

- Skúsenosti s analýzou SW, modelovanie (UML)
