Benefits with * are applicable also to part-time positions.This information may be subject to changes and other internal rules. Requirements for the employee Candidates with education suit the positionUniversity education (Bachelor's degree)
University education (Master's degree)Language skillsEnglish - Advanced (C1)Personality requirements and skillsSpecial technical skills
•	programming languages (Python,R, Scala_
•	Cloud PaaS solution with BigData area (Azure, or AWS)
•	application engineering & Linux OS,
•	Knowledge of data processing methods (Hadoop, Kafka, Spark)
•	Overview of distributed file systems, SQL and NoSQL Databases
•	Knowledge about Data streaming, Data warehousing
•	Background about cloud products in range of data processing
•	Capability of communicating effectively with business and data science leaders on project status, timeline and technical results

•	 German  - advantage
Others
•	Strong presentation skills,
•	Project leadership skills
•	Valid certification in given technology Advertiser Brief description of the companyDeutsche Telekom Systems Solutions Slovakia s.r.o.
Deutsche Telekom Systems Solutions Slovakia s.r.o. is one of the two legal entities promoted under one brand Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions Slovakia. Our parent company Deutsche Telekom AG decided to take strategic steps towards structural change, which resulted in the splitting of T-Systems Slovakia into two legal entities, operating, as of July 1, 2020.
Our original brand T-Systems Slovakia has been inextricably linked with Kosice region since January 2006. We proved this the very next year, when we became one of the founding members of Košice IT Valley association.
Over the last decade, we have managed to grow from scratch to being the second largest employer in the eastern part of the country. At the same time, with more than 3,900 employees, we are one of the top fifteen largest employers in Slovakia. Thanks to our highly qualified and motivated employees, we are the company with the fastest growth in added value within the IT industry in Slovakia. Our goal is to proactively find new ways to improve and continuously transform into the type of company providing innovative services. Úvodná stránkaHľadanie práceSenior Salesforce Developer 
                                Define your career today.
                                Explore opportunities now.
                                Primary job category
                            IT Specialist, Software Development & Support
                                Place of work
                            Bratislava, Banská Bystrica, Košice
                                Contract type
                            full-time
                                Salary (gross)
From 2 800 EUR/monthSalary starting from 2800-3600 EUR gross, depending on relevant experience and language proficiency
Senior Salesforce Developer
Senior Salesforce Developer
As part of our continuous transformation IBM Global Business Services (GBS) has established a Global Cloud Services Practice to meet the consulting demands of today’s rapidly changing market. We are a world leading strategy consultancy with deep industry and market CRM consulting and Salesforce.com expertise and we are looking for developers in the Salesforce space.
Salesforce.com is the world's leading CRM software and enterprise cloud ecosystem. Salesforce empowers companies to connect with their customers
in a whole new way. They are the fastest growing of the top 10 enterprise software companies, the World's Most Innovative Company according to Forbes,
and one of Fortune's 100 Best Companies to Work For six years running.
The developers in this role use their background in IT (administration, consulting or development) to work on a specific client project or solution.
They will ensure that the custom solution is integrated into the overall program, and provide fixes to defects identified by the quality assurance team
during the software development life cycle.
The position can be based in Bratislava, Banska Bystrica, and Košice.
What would be your responsibilities?
• Requirements gathering and analysis
• Configuration and development of business solutions based on the Force.com platform
• Test, documentation and deployment
• Support and maintenance
• Active communication with the customers, business analysts and other service delivery teams in order to perform regular operations tasks as well as solve
the application issues
What do you need for your success?
Required:
• IT related education / IT Background (Application developer, IT Consultant role)
• Communication skills, written and verbal
• Fluent English
• Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills
• Ability to work independently and as a team player
• Some experience with one or more of the following:
• Force.com development experience with a strong focus on APEX and Visualforce development Web application development experience XML, SQL,
  Eclipse, (HTML, PHP, JavaScript and CSS), Web Services (SOAP, REST, HTTP)
• Previous experience as software developer with OOP (Apex, Java, .NET or similar)
Desirable:
• Fundamental understanding of CRM space is a huge plus
• Salesforce certifications and trainings (APP BUILDER / Platform Developer I-II or other)
• Experience with agile development practices / version controlled environments
• Knowledge of Data migration and ETL tools
• German language
What can you expect of us?
• Salary starting from 2800-3600 EUR gross, depending on relevant experience  and language proficiency
• Annual performance bonus payment
• Performance evaluation on regular basis
• Subsidized meal-tickets
• Flexible working time and home office
• Three additional vacation days
• Up to three self-recovery days
• 100% sick leave compensation
• Life insurance and supplementary pension savings program
• Private medical sanatorium
• Long term career development and possibility of internal rotation
• Classroom based trainings and 5000 e-learning courses – both internal and external
• Recommend-a-Friend – get a bonus in the employee referral program
• MultiSport card
• Special IBM discounts
Additional information
            IBM is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or veteran status.

Informácie o pracovnom mieste Náplň práce, právomoci a zodpovednosti_____________________________________________________________________For English version please visit our website:https://job.brose.com/job/Prievidza-Embedded-C-C%2B%2B-Software-Developer-Junior-971-01/749828402/_____________________________________________________________________Ako developer budete členom tímu pracujúcom na vývoji softweru pre mechatronické systémy v automobiloch (aktuátory, senzory, funkčná bezpečnosť). Príležitosť naučiť sa špecifiká vývoja softweru pre automobilový priemysel.• Vývoj produktu• Ladenie softweru na HW vývojovej doske• Vývoj softweru pre elektronickú riadiacu jednotku• Údržba Unit testov a softwaru pre EMC testy Zamestnanecké výhody, benefityBude nám potešením s Vami zdieľať široké know-how automotive vývoja medzinárodnej spoločnosti, ktorá je na trhu už od roku 1908. Kvalitné zaškolenie bude zabezpečené lokálne alebo priamo od našich expertov na centrále v Nemecku.Zložky mzdy:• Mzda sa skladá zo základnej zložky od 1500 Eur + 10% variabilných zložiek, ktoré sú vyplácané na základe internej smernice.• Po splnení interných kritérií je možné získať letný a zimný bonus (maximálne do výšky 2 x 700 Eur).Finančné príspevky a bonusy• Bonus pri pracovnom výročí po odpracovaní 5 rokov• Príspevok na relokáciu podľa interných predpisov• Finančná odmena za odporučenie známeho• Finančná odmena za zlepšovacie návrhy• Ročná odmena za splnenie cieľov• Príspevok na dopravu (do výšky max. 80 Eur/mesiac v závislosti miesta bydliska od sídla spoločnosti)Nefinančné benefity• Úplne flexibilný pracovný čas – podpora zdravej rovnováhy pracovného a súkromného života• Veľmi flexibilná politika práce z domu až 100 dní v roku• Sociálny program benefit plus – doplnkový príspevok na voľnočasové aktivity a zdravie• Príjemné, moderné pracovné prostredie a podporujúca firemná kultúra• Široké možnosti kariérneho rastuVzdelávanie• E-learningové vzdelávacie programy – mylearning, linkedIn learning• Interné jazykové kurzy anglického, nemeckého jazyka a slovenského jazyka• Odborné školenia na Slovensku a aj v zahraničí• Školenia zamerané na jemné zručnosti a ľudský rozvoj Informácie o výberovom konaníPozícia je vhodná pre muža i ženu.Úspešný kandidát získa profesijnú podporu v podobe zaškolenia v Nemecku podľa potreby až do výšky 6 mesiacov.Prosím o zasielanie CV v anglickom jazyku. Požiadavky na zamestnanca Pozícii vyhovujú uchádzači so vzdelanímvysokoškolské I. stupňa
vysokoškolské II. stupňa
vysokoškolské III. stupňaVzdelanie v odboreElektronikaJazykové znalostiAnglický jazyk - Mierne pokročilý (B1)Ostatné znalostiC - PokročilýVodičský preukazB Pozícia je vhodná pre absolventaÁnoOsobnostné predpoklady a zručnosti• Pozícia je vhodná aj pre absolventa univerzity s diplomom v oblasti elektro inžinierstva, informatiky• Znalosť programovacieho jazyka C/C++• Schopnosť čítať elektrické schémy• Práca s meracími prístrojmi: Osciloskop, Logický analyzátor, Multimeter• Prax v  oblasti vývoja embedded systémov výhodou• Otvorenosť novým výzvam• Samostatnosť• Komunikatívnosť• Anglický jazyk na úrovni B2 Inzerujúca spoločnosť Stručná charakteristika spoločnostiBrose je štvrtým najväčším dodávateľom automobilového priemyslu v rodinnom vlastníctve. Každé druhé nové auto na svete je vybavené aspoň jedným produktom Brose. Inteligentné riešenia spoločnosti pre prístup do vozidiel a interiérov poskytujú vyšší komfort a flexibilitu. Inovatívne koncepcie tepelného manažmentu zvyšujú efektivitu a prispievajú k ochrane životného prostredia a klímy. Brose systémové riešenie umožňuje nové funkcie vo všetkých druhoch vozidiel – či už na štyroch alebo dvoch kolesách.  Medior Java Developer
                                Place of work
                            Remote work

POSITIONDESCRIPTIONAccenture Advanced Technology center is looking for technology enthusiasts.We offer challenging IT career with focus on application development, promoting work-life balance and encouraging you to be your best.Develop applications with a cloud-first mindset, experience end-to-end project delivery using Agile and DevOps and help shaping innovative technologies in our state-of-the-art Accenture Labs.Most of our projects are based on modern technology stacks; for more details read further. WHAT WILLYOU DO• Work in a team to design and code custom-build solutions based on Java-based solutions (mainly Spring, occasionally Java EE)• Write and execute unit tests necessary to ensure that an application or technical environment meets requirements• Integrate technical and application components (microservices, containerization, cloud)• Follow defined methodology and standards to create a software of high quality• Guide and coach your colleagues• Likely: Apply modern development trends (reactive approaches, cloud-native, machine learning)• Likely: Work with modern technologies (Artificial Intelligence, Blockchain, Biometrics) WHAT WEEXPECT• 2+ years of experience with Java development• Experience with SQL/NoSQL databases• Ability to communicate in English• Willingness to learn and be among the bestNice to haves:• Experience with application frameworks (Spring, Java EE)• Experience with web development (JavaScript)• Experience with continuous integration/deployment• Experience with containerization WHAT WEOFFERSalary2 000 - 3 000 EUR/monthAccenture offers a competitive compensation package. As required by the Slovak law we state, that the legal monthly minimum gross base pay starting from 2 000 € to 3 000 € depending on your professional and personal qualifications in the required areas.Technical and soft-skills development: • Trainings on architectural and technology trends• Trainings on presentational and communication skills• Language courses• Certifications: (paid by company) Java, Spring Framework AWS / Google Cloud / Azure Scrum Artificial Intelligence / Blockchain … and others• Large network of experts throughout the world• Support in attending conferences• Discount on buying Accenture sharesRecognition: • Guaranteed paid overtime or overtime vacation• German language bonus up to 400€ monthly/gross depending on language proficiency and level of seniority• Flexible Benefit System - budget to be spent on services of your choice• Competitive bonus structure• Refer-a-Friend – get a bonus in the employee referral program• Loyalty rewardsFlexibility: • Flexible working arrangements (time & place of work)Future: • Wide range of trainings and expert lectures• Regular performance review and career growth possibilities• Ongoing career guidance and mentoring (Global Mentoring Program, Lean In)• Employee share purchase planFamily & Health: • 3 extra days off• Sick leave salary compensation (up to 100%)• Home-office equipment• Family oriented benefits (Wedding, Parental and Baby days-off and bonuses)• Employee assistance services (professional psychological, financial and legal help)• Multisport card Interested?Apply for this job

As required by the Slovak law we state, that the legal monthly minimum gross base pay starting from 2 000 € to 3 000 € depending on your professional and personal qualifications in the required areas.Technical and soft-skills development: • Trainings on architectural and technology trends• Trainings on presentational and communication skills• Language courses• Certifications: (paid by company) Java, Spring Framework AWS / Google Cloud / Azure Scrum Artificial Intelligence / Blockchain … and others• Large network of experts throughout the world• Support in attending conferences• Discount on buying Accenture sharesRecognition: • Guaranteed paid overtime or overtime vacation• German language bonus up to 400€ monthly/gross depending on language proficiency and level of seniority• Flexible Benefit System - budget to be spent on services of your choice• Competitive bonus structure• Refer-a-Friend – get a bonus in the employee referral program• Loyalty rewardsFlexibility: • Flexible working arrangements (time & place of work)Future: • Wide range of trainings and expert lectures• Regular performance review and career growth possibilities• Ongoing career guidance and mentoring (Global Mentoring Program, Lean In)• Employee share purchase planFamily & Health: • 3 extra days off• Sick leave salary compensation (up to 100%)• Home-office equipment• Family oriented benefits (Wedding, Parental and Baby days-off and bonuses)• Employee assistance services (professional psychological, financial and legal help)• Multisport card Interested?Apply for this job

POSITIONDESCRIPTIONAccenture Advanced Technology center is looking for technology enthusiasts ready for a challenging IT career and focus on application development, systems administration work, and software maintenance providing practical programming and technology implementation for business.You could have the opportunity to help clients develop applications with a cloud-first, digital- first mindset, generate the next wave of innovative technology in our state-of-the-art Accenture Labs, and provide end-to-end service and project delivery across all our Accenture Delivery Center engagements using rapid development principles such as Agile and DevOps to make software faster, flexible and more liquid. WHAT WILLYOU DOAs a SAP Consultant you will participate on SAP implementation & rollout projects or support & maintenance projects. IT Trainee
        Have you not graduated yet? Get to know our Internships! Apply for IT Trainee position and start you career here! Your future can be made with IBM!  
You can work in Bratislava or Kosice.
Your Role and Responsibilities :
What can we offer?
You’ll begin your career learning the basics of IBM, working alongside experienced experts on client engagements.
Our aim is to help you move as quickly as possible. Your experience duration will be up to 6 months with subsequent chance to convert into regular job.
Once you have mastered the basics, you’ll develop skills in other IBM process such as IT solution delivery & design, project management and methodology, while working with big-name clients where IBM have a significant presence.
You will have the opportunity to:
- Become part of our diverse and multinational community and collaborate within global and local teams
- Work on real world-class IT projects for leading companies
- Gain knowledge and develop skills through on-the-job training
- Balance your work with your study and enjoy flexible working
What do you need for your success?
- Bachelor’s or expected Master degree (Mathematics, Computer science, Information Technology, Engineering) (the Trainee program is aimed for students of 1st and 2nd year of Master's degree)
- Attitude and interest in an IT Engineer/ Specialist / Consultant career
- Adaptability, Communication, Creative, Problem Solving, Taking - Ownership, Teamwork and Collaboration
- Ability to make decisions, take on responsibilities and have the ability to adapt, change and re-prioritize your plans in a dynamic and fast paced environment
- English is a must
- Communicative German is a huge advantage
Additional information
            IBM is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or veteran status.

Úvodná stránkaHľadanie práceSalesforce Developer 
Salesforce DeveloperFluido Oy
Miesto práce
Banská Bystrica, Slovensko (Pozícia umožňuje občasnú prácu z domu)
Druh pracovného pomeru
plný úväzok, živnosť
Termín nástupu
01.05.2023
Mzdové podmienky (brutto)
2 500 EUR/mesiacmesačný bonus za projektové hodiny (k hrubej mesacnej mzde sa pripocitava cca od 500 do 1000 eur )
Informácie o pracovnom mieste Náplň práce, právomoci a zodpovednostiChcel by si pracovať v uvoľnenej atmosfére a priateľskom kolektíve? Máš záujem pracovať pre zahraničnú firmu za výhodných platových podmienok, využívať prácu z domu, flexibilnú pracovnú dobu, spoločné teambuildingy a iné pracovné benefity? Tak potom si náš človek!
Hľadáme nových kolegov, ktorí majú chuť pracovať s technológiou Salesforce na zaujímavých projektoch v multikultúrnej atmosfére. Táto pozícia je vhodná pre proaktívneho programátora, ktorý má skúsenosť buď s Java, .NET alebo Web technológiami. 
Pracujeme s cloudovou technológiou Salesforce.com, ktorá je #1 medzi CRM systémami. Vo veľkej miere sú zastúpené frontend technológie JavaScript, CSS a HTML. Backend je založený na jazyku Apex, ktorý je objektovo-orientovaným programovacím jazykom.
Nie je dôležité, aby si mal priamu skúsenosť so Salesforce – poskytneme ti dostatok času na zaškolenie a vždy u nás nájdeš výraznú podporu kolegov. Zamestnanecké výhody, benefityČo ti môžeme ponúknuť:
•	Príjemné a priateľské pracovné prostredie, otvorená komunikácia
•	Zaujímavé projekty pre zahraničnú klientelu
•	Flexibilný pracovný čas
•	Možnosť práce z domu 
•	Byť súčasťou zahraničného tímu a pracovať v multikultúrnom prostredí
•	Možnosť dočasnej relokácie do jednej z našich pobočiek v Európe
•	Angličtina ako business language
•	3 tzv. sick days
•	Stravné lístky alebo finančný príspevok na stravu
•	Multisport cards
•	Príspevok do 3. piliera
•	Teambuildingové aktivity
•	Zaujímavé platové ohodnotenie Informácie o výberovom konaníAj keď je miesto práce uvedená kancelária v Banskej Bystrici, je u nás možnosť pracovať aj online, z ktorejkoľvek lokality na SlovenskuPredpokladaný termín ukončenia výberového konania1.10.2023 (ostáva ešte 202 dní) Požiadavky na zamestnanca Pozícii vyhovujú uchádzači so vzdelanímstredoškolské s maturitou
vysokoškolské I. stupňa
vysokoškolské II. stupňa

Táto pozícia je vhodná pre kandidátov, ktorí majú dlhodobejšiu skúsenosť buď s Java, .NET alebo Web technológiami. 
Osobnostné predpoklady:
•	Chuť, ochota a schopnosť učiť sa nové technológie a prístupy
•	Dobré komunikačné schopnosti
•	Samostatnosť a proaktívny prístup
•	Priateľské vystupovanie, zodpovednosť, tímový hráč
•	Porozumenie cloud technológií je výhodou
Jazykové znalosti
Je potrebné vedieť komunikovať v anglickom jazyku – úroveň B1. Zároveň však vieme ponúknuť platený konverzačný kurz a každodenná prax ťa rýchlo posunie o úroveň vyššie. Inzerujúca spoločnosť Stručná charakteristika spoločnostiIn 10 years, FLUIDO, the company with headquarters in Helsinki, has grown to become the leading Salesforce partner in Europe employing over 400 experts and serving over 300 customers. We bring customer data to life. From marketing and sales to customer service, we can help the customers transform how they engage with customers, partners and employees.
Fluido customers include KONE Corporation, YIT, Wärtsilä and Stokke as well as several other major globally operating enterprises. We work using agile and iterative methods to ensure rapid results, and our customers appreciate our ability to challenge them on their journey becoming customer value driven in sales, customer service and marketing.
Fluido values are the core of our actions and describe who we are. Our values are: We trust, We believe in Superheroes, Actions speak clouder than words, Friends don’t let friends down, Work must be fun.
We are proud to receive the Future Workplace Certification 2021 which is already for the 3rd year in a row.
The core in our success lies in commitment to customer success and our people. Our experienced staff works in 7 locations across Europe – in Helsinki, Stockholm, Gothenburg, Oslo, Copenhagen, London, Dublin, Muenchen, Amsterdam and Banska Bystrica. Even though our team is built of over 35 different nationalities and is working in eight countries, we are a tight and friendly community.

Place of work
Remote work
Contract type
full-time, trade licence
Start date
Immediately
Wage (gross)
From 2 500 EUR/month(depending on your skills and contract type)
Information about the position Job description, responsibilities and duties‎
✅ We are looking for a new member of our team. Our ideal candidate is a skilled senior developer looking for a stable, long-term job with a career perspective to help us to develop QTAKE and its supporting iOS/macOS applications or our Swift-based cloud infrastructure.
✅ There are several projects you can pick from, depending on your skillset and preferences.
___ Employee perks, benefits‎
* Work/life balance, flexible working hours, no overtime, remote work possible
* Casual open spaces for up to 5 people, stacked with latest AV equipment
* Knowledgeable colleagues mentoring you through the first months
* Industry-competitive salary and end-of-year bonuses
* You name it. You know what makes you happy — let's talk about it.
___ Information about the selection process‎
Please send your CV and a brief presentation of the most interesting projects you have worked on to [email protected] If your skills and experience match our job requirements and profile, you will be invited for a job interview with our CTO. Selected candidates will be given a fictional test assignment. Requirements for the employee Candidates with education suit the positionSecondary with school-leaving examination
Follow-up/Higher Professional Education
University student
University education (Bachelor's degree)
University education (Master's degree)
Postgraduate (Doctorate)Personality requirements and skills‎
REQUIRED SKILLS
*Swift or Objective-C - advanced level
*Foundation, Cocoa – advanced level
*VCS (e.g. Git) – working knowledge
*Audio/video framework – basic knowledge
*English – advanced level
PREFERRED OPTIONAL SKILLS
*Server-Side Swift
*C++
*OpenGL, Metal Advertiser Brief description of the company‎
✅  Founded in 2008, IN2CORE focuses on the development of QTAKE software, its supporting applications (QTAKE Cloud, QTAKE Monitor, QTAKE Server), and hardware (ScreenPort SDI, QOD, MetaCoder) for professional filmmakers. A technology partner of: AJA, Apple, ARRI, Avid, AWS, BlackMagic Design, Canon, Deltacast, Dolby, MRMC, Ovide, Panasonic, RED, Sony, Stype, Tangent, Teradek, and more. 
✅  Our solutions are made for VFX-heavy film productions and have been used to shoot James Bond, Top Gun, Avatar 2, Mandalorian, Joker, Batman, and other blockbusters. In 2020, the integration of QTAKE and Moxion systems received the Engineering Excellence Award from the Hollywood Professionals Association.

Úvodná stránkaHľadanie práceMainframe (ASO) Developer 
×Ľutujeme, spoločnosť ponúkajúca danú pracovnú pozíciu ukončila zverejnenie ponuky na stránke.Ďakujeme za porozumenie.Zobraziť podobné ponuky
                                Define your career today.
                                Explore opportunities now.
                                Primary job category
                            IT Specialist
                                Place of work
                            Bratislava
                                Contract type
                            full-time
                                Salary (gross)
2 500 EUR/monthSalary depends on skills and relevant experience.
Mainframe (ASO) Developer
Responsibilities: 
In this position, you will be part of a team of Software Engineers in Identity and Access Management who are engaged in a large-scale effort to maintain an internal mainframe-based identity services. You will provide support for an existing range of services and design innovative solutions that integrate into the existing platform and to automate business processes used by internal and external partners. We're cultivating a blame-free culture, with a focus on growth and collaboration. We love pair-programming and learning from each other. And while we're remote, we find opportunities to get to know one another on a more personal level. If you've got creative solutions and a positive attitude, we'd love to hear from you!
IBM is looking for a talented and motivated individual to join our team of expert Identity and Access Management (IAM) engineers. The role will be reporting directly to the Identity Engineering Services Business Manager and will be responsible for implementing innovative IAM solutions that integrate our existing identity services.
Required Experience
• Advanced knowledge of RACF Mainframe roles modification, etc.., security software, configuration, reporting
• Experience with command Mainframe batch and reporting languages such as: JCL, REXX, CLIST, ISPF, PLI
• Should have knowledge on  OREXX, HTML, JavaScript, Java
• Knowledge on TSO/ISPF development and usage of VM and MVS
• Encryption/Certification handling in Windows/Server for Web/FTP-Certificates and FTP over TLS
• Knowledge on windows server/IIH
• Investigate and fix if any problem is in coding on Z/OS, Z/VM, OREXX or Windows
• Good understanding on ITIL standards
• Good knowledge on Z/OS  and Z/VM environments
Preferred Experience
• Work experience in agile environment
• Access management experience
• Excellent written and verbal communication skills  
• Analytic, creative, and business focused problem solver  
• Strong communication/customer service skills.  
• Communication, analysis, customer management, records management, and routing cases for support and resolution
Minimum salary starts at 2.500 EUR/Month based on relevant experience.
Additional information
            IBM is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. Bratislava, Slovensko (Pozícia umožňuje občasnú prácu z domu)

živnosť
Termín nástupu
ASAP
Mzdové podmienky (brutto)
2 000 - 3 700 EUR/mesiacVýška mzdy závisí od skúsenosti a ďalších faktorov.
Informácie o pracovnom mieste Náplň práce, právomoci a zodpovednostiHľadáme niekoho, kto vezme malé štúdio ako výhodu, vďaka ktorej sa bude môcť naplno a v pokoji realizovať a nebude brzdený procesmi, manažmentom alebo klientmi. Budeš vedený/á našim špičkovým iOS developerom, ktorý je zároveň CTO a potrebuje k sebe parťáka, pretože doteraz ťahal celý iOS vývoj sám. Tech team máme primárne v Brne, avšak môžeš pracovať aj z našej kancelárie v Bratislave.
Tvoja práca bude zameraná na:
- 55% programovanie novej funkcionality natívnych iOS aplikácií
- 15% implementáciu API
- 10% UI testy
- 10% technickú stránku cenovej a jazykovej lokalizácie aplikácií
- 5% experimenty s novými Apple technológiami
- 5% experimenty s A/B testingom a dátami
Náš stack tvorí:
- Swift, Xcode
- Alamofire, Core Data, NSLayoutConstraints, Storyboards, Firebase, - CocoaPods, JSON, REST API
- Git, Jira, Confluence, Slack, Google Workspace Zamestnanecké výhody, benefityČím sa líšime:
- všetky deadliny sú naše vlastné, nerobíme žiadnu klientsku prácu
- všetci sa podieľame na chode firmy, každý task má zmysel
- väčšina kolegov sú skôr introverti, nefotíme sa na sociálne siete
- rešpektujeme tvoj osobný život a flexibilný pracovný čas či HO sú samozrejmosťou
- zaujímajú nás nové nápady a nebojíme sa kritiky, ak vidíš, že sa veci dajú robiť lepšie
- od prvého dňa ti dávame dôveru a očakávame prevzatie zodpovednosti, nemikromanažujeme
- vzdelávanie a sebarozvoj aktívne podporujeme a chceme byť súčasťou tvojej kariérnej cesty
- byrokraciu a procesy držíme na minime
- 25 dní platenej dovolenky, 3 sick days, občerstvenie v office podľa tvojich preferencií Požiadavky na zamestnanca Pozícii vyhovujú uchádzači so vzdelanímstredoškolské s maturitou

Naše portfólio tvorí 16 rôznych aplikácií, ktoré majú používateľov z rôznych kútov sveta, sú lokalizované v desiatkach jazykov a promované Applom po celom svete. Úvodná stránkaHľadanie prácePython Developer in data science team 
Python Developer in data science teamU. S. Steel Košice, s.r.o.
Place of work
U. S. Steel Košice, s.r.o., Šaca, Slovakia (Job with occasional home office)
Contract type
full-time
Wage (gross)
2 000 EUR/monthCompetitive salary starting from 2.000 EUR gross, depending on relevant experience
Information about the position Job description, responsibilities and dutiesU. S. Steel will welcome a Python Developer in its ranks to develop scalable Python-based applications that will improve process efficiencies and plant operations in line with the overarching strategic and tactical objectives of the company. 
As a Python Developer in U. S. Steel, you will collaborate with data scientists, other software developers, project managers and other internal business partners on multiple projects to implement software solutions with measurable business value. The technology stack that we use is based on Python, Docker, JavaScript and SQL databases, however, being an excellent developer with strong analytical thinking is more important than having experience with all technologies listed.
Duties and responsibilities
• Collaborate with internal stakeholders across the organization to understand requirements and convert them to solutions
• Develop, maintain and support our product portfolio by writing quality, clean and maintainable Python code, using programming best practices
• Build new features and design new applications and ML (Machine Learning) models in Python
• Implement proof of concept, prototypes, and production-grade software
• Trouble-shoot software issues and implement bug fixes Employee perks, benefitsWe offer:
U. S. Steel is committed to creating rewarding work environments. As an employee, you will have the opportunity to participate in several of our competitive programs, including:
• Competitive salary starting from 2.000 EUR gross, depending on relevant experience
• A Total Rewards package with competitive salaries and benefits with incentive opportunities for all employees:
- 13th and 14th salary or yearly bonus program
- Variable wage payment
- Subsidy for additional pension insurance (The 3rd pension pillar). 
- Benefit for culture and sport (RELAXPASS vouchers)
- Award for employees who considerably participate in the results achieved by the company 
• A focus on career growth and employee development that will establish not just a job, but a career.
• Ongoing training and education to enhance your career opportunities
• Flexible or modified working time
• Home office/ Work from home
• Participation in company activities organized by USSK 
• Paid time off on significant life occasions
• Comprehensive Health Care Information about the selection processIn case of interest, please visit: https://www.usske.sk/sk/spolupraca/kariera/aktualne-pozicie/230 Requirements for the employee Candidates with education suit the positionUniversity student
University education (Bachelor's degree)
University education (Master's degree)Personality requirements and skills2+ years experience in Python programming
• Upper intermediate (B2) English
• Machine learning expertise
• Frontend development expertise (html/CSS/JavaScript)
• Experience with developing automated tests
• DevOps experience – containerization (Docker), Kubernetes
• Code review skills
• Strong database design skills and fluency in SQL statements Advertiser Brief description of the companySteel is essential to advancing modern society. In fact, countless aspects of our lives wouldn’t be possible without it. From state-of-the-art household appliances and safer, more fuel-efficient automobiles — to steel framing that makes our homes stronger and tubular products that support the development of our nation’s energy resources — our products build quality of life for people around the world. 
U. S. Steel is on an exciting transformational journey to become the iconic corporation — a company set apart from the competition through the talent of our people, the quality of our product, and the strength of our performance. 
We are seeking talented, motivated people to help us create the next generation of U. S. Steel, known for consistently out-performing the competition, delivering superior returns, and creating value for our customers as a world-class supplier of innovative steel products and solutions.
U. S. Steel Košice (USSK) is the largest producer of flat rolled steel products in Central Europe. In response to market demands, it supplies a wide product mix: hot and cold rolled coils, plates and strips, hot-dip galvanized sheets, coated and packaging sheets as well as electro-technical sheets. The company also produces spiral welded pipes and radiators from own materials. ContactE-mail: send CV Send CV to the company

Úvodná stránkaHľadanie práceIT/ERP Analyst 
IT/ERP AnalystESA LOGISTIKA, s.r.o.
Miesto práce
Diaľničná cesta 12, Senec, okres Senec
Druh pracovného pomeru
plný úväzok, živnosť
Termín nástupu
dohodou
Mzdové podmienky (brutto)
2 600 - 3 800 EUR/mesiaczákladná zložka mzdy od 2600 € + kvartálne odmeny. Možnosť zárobku až do 3800 € podľa  skúseností a seniority kandidáta.
Informácie o pracovnom mieste Náplň práce, právomoci a zodpovednostiV našom tíme privítame ostrieľaného nadšenca s IT skúsenosťami, ktorý nám pomôže s modernizáciou spoločnosti (po software stránke). Zúročíte u nás svoje skúsenosti v oblasti dopravných alebo aj skladových služieb. Sme otvorení či už spolupráci na HPP, prípadne živnosť. Ponúkame možnosť práce z domu.     
V rámci spomínanej modernizácii spoločnosti prevádzame všetky zákazky do Warehouse management systému LFS, implementujeme Transport management systém Soloplan. Zároveň v horizonte 2 rokov budeme prechádzať na nový ERP, a to MS Dynamics 365. Aktuálne sme zaviedli cloudové riešenie AZURE.
Popis práce
Ako bolo naznačené, náplň práce bude závisieť od skúseností a oblasti záujmu nového kolegu. 
Všeobecne sa jedná o: 
-	60 % návrh a vývoj interface medzi zákazníkom a WMS/TMS/ERP; nastavenie integrácie dát od klienta alebo medzi ESA internými systémami
-	20 % podpora interných zákazníkov  
-	20 % komunikácia s klientami
Technológie, s ktorými bude pracovať: ORACLE, INGRES, DB2, LINUX, Node.js, BASH, PERL, CSV, XML, EDIFACT, ALTOVA, AZURE, MS Dynamics 365 Zamestnanecké výhody, benefity- zamestnanecké nákupy
- bezúročné pôžičky 
- finančný príspevok na stravu vo výške 4,20 €
- deň zdravia 
- darček pri narodení dieťaťa
- odmena za zlepšovacie návrhy 
- osobný a profesijný rozvoj , vzdelávanie Informácie o výberovom konaníV  prípade, že Vás naša ponuka zaujala, zašlite svoj štruktúrovaný životopis na našu adresu mailom, faxom, príp. poštou. Do predmetu správy napíšte názov pozície "IT/ERP Analyst".
Kontaktovať budeme len kandidátov, ktorí spĺňajú uvedené požiadavky.
Uchádzač zaslaním osobných údajov, uvedených v životopise dáva súhlas spoločnosti ESA LOGISTIKA s.r.o. so správou, spracovaním a uchovaním osobných údajov v súlade so zákonom č.122/2013 Z.z., a to po dobu 1 roka. Uchádzač zároveň vyhlasuje, že všetky uvedené informácie sú pravdivé a poskytnutie údajov je dobrovoľné a bez dôsledkov s tým, že tieto údaje môžu byť spracované výlučne pre účely evidencie uchádzačov o zamestnanie.
Po vypršaní doby 1 roka budú údaje zlikvidované v súlade s uvedeným zákonom. Požiadavky na zamestnanca Pozícii vyhovujú uchádzači so vzdelanímstredoškolské s maturitou

Úvodná stránkaHľadanie práceTechnical Expert for Databricks (all genders) #python #scala 
           We are part of Erste Group – the largest banking group in Central and Eastern Europe with more than 2,500 branches and over 45,000 employees. Our more than 2,000 IT experts and enthusiasts are the bank's Digital Muscle. 
Technical Expert for Databricks (all genders) #python #scala
Location: Košice
Working-Hours: Full-time
Occupation Area: IT
Company:  Erste Digital
            With top notch technology, we drive the realization offers the Group’s vision: To provide human banking in digital times, and to build Financial Health for over 16 million customers in the CEE region. 
We aim to attract and develop the best talent and aspire to be an IT employer beyond compare.
Erste Digital is working on a harmonized Data Science workbench- and collaboration platform across all entities of the group on the databricks cloud environment. We are running currently an implementation project that should cover Target Architecture, Platform implementation, Governance Model, Data Integration and Rollout & Training.
To support us in this challenging project we are looking for a databricks Technical Expert. In this position you will:
work on the technical integration of databricks to our environment based technical requirements and design and architecture patterns
evaluate and propose the technical feasable solutions for enabling data analytics within databricks on GCP cloud environment
manage all technical operation activities
solve raised problems within the team and the vendors
You check these boxes:
Experience working with Big data analytics platforms and tools on a deep technical level and with cloud infrastructure components
Very good knowledge of Python and/or Scala
Expertise in implementing end-to-end Monitoring and Alerting solutions to deliver high quality and fast services
Good communication skills (also in English) and capacity to interact directly with analysts and other business clients
Why you will like us:
Possibility to benefit and learn from our international, talented and passionate community at Erste 
Great learning curve through ownership and creative freedom
Interest groups and clubs: Take part in discussions and get involved in projects. Numerous interest groups invite you to engage with a topic
Culinary delights – Healthy nutrition and good food are important for our quality of life. Whether lunch, breakfast or snacks – everything is within reach. As an employee, you receive a meal allowance per day. 
Health Care – Taking care of your health is important. That’s why we contribute to your above standard medical examination and provide a helpline in case of hard lifetime situations. You also receive a salary compensation during sick leave
Work-Life-Balance – Sabbatical, paternity leave, contribution to marriage & childbirth, 4 days of extra holiday per year, contribution to the 3rd pillar and MultiSport card. This is how we promote a balance between work, leisure, and family
New way of work: With our flexible working hours model we want to make your life less complicated. Combing the best of both worlds, remote and office time
Employee Referral Program – Become a talent scout for career opportunities in IT. We are rewarding every successful referral for Erste Digital
Language courses for German & English – Learning a new language unites
Visa Sponsoring – We support our employees with all the formalities associated with a relocation to Slovakia and also advise them on choosing a suitable residential area
A competitive and performance-related salary dependent on your professional and personal qualifications is granted - we are obliged by law to quote the minimum wage of EUR 2800€ gross per month for this full time position. But this is just a formality, we are more than happy to discuss your actual expectations.
The way we are
Erste Group considers the diversity of its employees as key to innovation and success. As employer we are proud to offer everyone equal chances, irrespective of age, skin colour, religious belief, gender, sexual orientation or origin.

           We are part of Erste Group – the largest banking group in Central and Eastern Europe with more than 2,500 branches and over 45,000 employees. Our more than 2,000 IT experts and enthusiasts are the bank's Digital Muscle. 
Technical Expert for Databricks (all genders) #python #scala
Location: Bratislava
Working-Hours: Full-time
Occupation Area: IT
Company:  Erste Digital
            With top notch technology, we drive the realization offers the Group’s vision: To provide human banking in digital times, and to build Financial Health for over 16 million customers in the CEE region. 
We aim to attract and develop the best talent and aspire to be an IT employer beyond compare.
Erste Digital is working on a harmonized Data Science workbench- and collaboration platform across all entities of the group on the databricks cloud environment. We are running currently an implementation project that should cover Target Architecture, Platform implementation, Governance Model, Data Integration and Rollout & Training.
To support us in this challenging project we are looking for a databricks Technical Expert. In this position you will:
work on the technical integration of databricks to our environment based technical requirements and design and architecture patterns
evaluate and propose the technical feasable solutions for enabling data analytics within databricks on GCP cloud environment
manage all technical operation activities
solve raised problems within the team and the vendors
You check these boxes:
Experience working with Big data analytics platforms and tools on a deep technical level and with cloud infrastructure components
Very good knowledge of Python and/or Scala
Expertise in implementing end-to-end Monitoring and Alerting solutions to deliver high quality and fast services
Good communication skills (also in English) and capacity to interact directly with analysts and other business clients
Why you will like us:
Possibility to benefit and learn from our international, talented and passionate community at Erste 
Great learning curve through ownership and creative freedom
Interest groups and clubs: Take part in discussions and get involved in projects. Numerous interest groups invite you to engage with a topic
Culinary delights – Healthy nutrition and good food are important for our quality of life. Whether lunch, breakfast or snacks – everything is within reach. As an employee, you receive a meal allowance per day. 
Health Care – Taking care of your health is important. That’s why we contribute to your above standard medical examination and provide a helpline in case of hard lifetime situations. You also receive a salary compensation during sick leave
Work-Life-Balance – Sabbatical, paternity leave, contribution to marriage & childbirth, 4 days of extra holiday per year, contribution to the 3rd pillar and MultiSport card. This is how we promote a balance between work, leisure, and family
New way of work: With our flexible working hours model we want to make your life less complicated. Combing the best of both worlds, remote and office time
Employee Referral Program – Become a talent scout for career opportunities in IT. We are rewarding every successful referral for Erste Digital
Language courses for German & English – Learning a new language unites
Visa Sponsoring – We support our employees with all the formalities associated with a relocation to Slovakia and also advise them on choosing a suitable residential area
A competitive and performance-related salary dependent on your professional and personal qualifications is granted - we are obliged by law to quote the minimum wage of EUR 2800€ gross per month for this full time position. But this is just a formality, we are more than happy to discuss your actual expectations.
The way we are
Erste Group considers the diversity of its employees as key to innovation and success. As employer we are proud to offer everyone equal chances, irrespective of age, skin colour, religious belief, gender, sexual orientation or origin.

Informácie o pracovnom mieste Náplň práce, právomoci a zodpovednostiStaň sa novým členom nášho Natuvion tímu!
Sme inovatívnym poskytovateľom SAP riešení a jednou z najrýchlejšie rastúcich IT spoločností v Európe. Ako SAP Gold partner disponujeme rozsiahlym Know-How v SAP projektoch. Centrála spoločnosti je v Nemecku – Walldorfe, no máme pobočky v Berlíne, Mníchove, Viedni, Bratislave, Švajčiarsku, Austrálii a Spojených Štátoch.
Do našej bratislavskej / zvolenskej pobočky hľadáme šikovného kolegu, ktorého náplňou práce bude:
- účasť na zákazníckych projektoch
- analýza požiadaviek klienta
- konfigurácia a prispôsobovanie modulov na základe klientských požiadaviek
- navrhovanie, programovanie, implementácia nových riešení a ich testovanie
- vývoj riešení v oblasti SAP (IS-U / S4 HANA / HCM / BW / ILM / ...)
- možnosť participácie na rôznorodých projektoch a venovať sa oblasti ktorá je pre zamestnanca najzaujímavejšia Zamestnanecké výhody, benefity- príležitosť pre kariérny rozvoj v medzinárodnej spoločnosti 
- plochá organizačná štruktúra, krátke komunikačné kanály, open door policy
- vzdelávanie a odborná príprava prostredníctvom pravidelných školení, workshopov a firemných meetingov
- možnosť proaktívne sa zapojiť do Vami preferovaných projektov
- výber notebooku a smartphone podľa vlastných preferencií aj na súkromné účely
- zaujímavé SAP projekty a profesionálny tím kolegov
- flexibilná pracovná doba
- možnosť využitia home-office po zapracovaní
- nápoje & snack na pracovisku
- plne hradená multisport karta
- finančný príspevok pri narodení dieťaťa & svadbe
- finančný príspevok na podporu ekologickej mobility (bicykel / e-bicykel / e-kolobežka)
- príspevok na stravovanaie nad rámec uvedený v zákone
- referal program - finančná odmena za odporučenie zamestnanca
- firemné zľavy - prístup ku Corporate Benefits Platform (zľavy na produkty a služby od viac ako 800 poskytovateľov) Požiadavky na zamestnanca Pozícii vyhovujú uchádzači so vzdelanímstredoškolské s maturitou

Taktiež vďaka rozsiahlym kompetenciám zo všeobecného strojárstva spolupracujeme s významnými Európskymi spoločnosťami z viacerých priemyselných odvetví, ktorým dodávame precízne opracované a na kľúč zhotovené výrobky.Jednou z hlavných kompetencií spoločnosti je aktívne podieľanie sa na výskume a vývoji nových produkčných technológií, sofistikovaného spájania a implementácie nových materiálov pre automobilový  a iný priemysel. Informácie o pracovnom mieste Náplň práce, právomoci a zodpovednostiAk ťa nebaví tvoja súčasná práca alebo si hľadáš niečo popri škole, poď k nám a nakopni svoju kariéru v zábavnom priemysle ešte dnes.
Hľadáme šikovného programátora, ktorý sa stane súčasťou našich existujúcich tímov. Tvojou úlohou bude podieľať sa na vývoji našich hier v niektorej z nasledujúcich oblastí:
- programovanie herných mechaník
- programovanie UI
- programovanie multiplayer prepojení
- programovanie AI mechaník
- atď.
Naše projekty vyvíjame v C# Unity3D s napojením na ďalšie systémy (na základe požiadaviek projektu, napr. PhotonEngine, Playfab, ...).
Výber projektu a náplne práce budú závisieť od tvojích skúseností a od oblasti tvojho záujmu.

o	Obrazovky/formuláre renderovené server side (Java FE vývoj) alebo client side (Java FE + React) spôsobom
o	Prezentačnú logiku, mapovanie dát na BE API, orchestráciu volaní BE API a Java FE API pre React aplikácie

Poskytuje komplexné portfólio fixných hlasových a dátových služieb, mobilných služieb a profesionálnych ICT riešení. Spoločnosť Seiteq, s.r.o., je poskytovateľom komplexných služieb v oblasti ľudských zdrojov a informačných technológií.
Naša spoločnosť Seiteq, s.r.o., bola založená v roku 2009 na Slovensku. Rokmi sme sa vyprofilovali na špecializovanú personálnu spoločnosť v oblasti recruitingu, outsourcingu a podpory projektov. V súčasnosti poskytujeme riešenia pre mnohých našich klientov z IT, technických a technologických oblastí, pre ktorých sme sa stali dôveryhodným partnerom a poradcom v podnikaní. Za našimi výsledkami sú pevné vzťahy a tvrdá práca, ktorá viedla Seiteq k rozšíreniu pôsobenia v ďalších krajinách Európy.Spoločnosť je držiteľ povolenia na sprostredkovanie práce. Úvodná stránkaHľadanie práceQA Engineer for George (all genders) 
QA Engineer for George (all genders)
Bratislava, Slovakia
Banking has a name. And we create it.
            With 9 million customers across Europe, George stands for a digital banking experience that combines design and technology on an open platform. At the George Labs, we strive for everyone. We achieve this by empowering people to understand, manage and, last but not least, enjoy one of their most personal things: their money. Join us in our agile environment and make banking simple, intelligent and personal again!
            We understand your pain. QA Engineers and Testers do not get the respect they deserve! But with us, your scripting knowledge and testing abilities is as much valued as the cool designs that come out of the creative team. You will work closely with our developers along the full user story, working together on the same code towards the same goal of providing market-ready software at the end of each Sprint. You will create well-structured and well-considered test cases, executing automation scripts using open source tools, all while keeping the nasty bugs away.
What you’ll bring with you
A toolkit full of software development and QA experience
Curiosity about object-oriented programming (Kotlin or Java preferred)
The ability to write clean and readable code with documentation
Experience with web and/or mobile testing (both manual and automated)
Hands-on experience with automated testing tools (e.g. Cypress, Appium) and deep insight of software QA methodologies
A natural confidence with your communication skills, while being fluent in English
Living the agile mindset, testing in a scrum team while collaborating with developers and business analysts
You will impress us by
Being able to independently solve problems and make decisions about testing results
Confidently wearing T-shirts with the slogan ‘TDD & BDD are not diseases!’
Being proactive and self-motivated without the ego to go with it
Having the ability to see the big picture and have a strong quality awareness
Knowing that variety, changing trends, and constantly upgrading your skills is better than any alternative
Why you will like us
We’re a team of experienced testers who love to exchange ideas and push the boundaries
We provide everything you need to work (e.g., MacBook Pro, mobile device, licenses) and lots of additional benefits
We are open minded, and always keen to stand up and go the extra mile for the correct solution
New Work is not just another buzz word to us. We proactively adapt to the ever-changing work environment of today
A competitive and performance-related salary dependent on your professional and personal qualifications is granted - we are obliged by law to quote the minimum wage of EUR 2.000,- gross per month for this full time position.
The way we are
           As an employee of Erste Digital, the success of our people is more than a motto, it’s our manifest. We nurture a work environment where age, skin colour, gender, sexual orientation and cultural background are seen as the key to our success – we live diversity!
If you’ve got this far
         It seems we have your interest. If you think you are a good fit for this position, please get in touch with us, we’d love to catch up.

Software Engineer for George (all genders)
Bratislava, Slovakia
Banking has a name. And we create it.
            For 9 million customers across Europe, George stands for a digital banking experience that combines design and technology on an open platform. At Erste Digital, we strive for everyone. We achieve this by empowering people to understand, manage and, last but not least, enjoy one of their most personal things: their money.
            Join us in our agile environment and make banking simple, intelligent and personal again!
            Above all else, you are a believer in the craft of Software Engineering and your ability to push the boundaries of what is possible on the web. You’ll collaborate closely with colleagues from the ideation of features through to the conceptual and planning phases, and bring innovative and delightful designs to life. Our team is the gatekeeper for the central JSON over HTTP API development, so we deal with all kinds of clients, handle stacks of data, but you will take these details in your stride, and make George shine for the user.
What you’ll bring with you
A good grip of building and designing HTTP APIs written in Java
Clear understanding of Spring ecosystem and the way Spring applications are written
Knowledge working with search technology and/or distributed systems in general
Some experience with Elasticsearch or other distributed search and analytic engines
A love for code quality and testing
We like you because
You iterate fast, without compromising quality, while taking care of detail
Clean code is your mantra as you look to improve what is existing
Respectfully challenging your colleagues, and being challenged in return is welcomed by you
You are passionate about learning, and want to help others learn too
You can stand heat, noise and criticism without losing your smile
You have values and opinions and can articulate them in fluent English

We’re a team of experienced developers who love to exchange ideas and push the boundaries

Software SQL Developer (all genders) #SQL #PL/SQL #Oracle
Location: Bratislava
Working-Hours: Full-time
Occupation Area: IT
Company:  Erste Digital
            With top notch technology, we drive the realization offers the Group’s vision: To provide human banking in digital times, and to build Financial Health for over 16 million customers in the CEE region.We aim to attract and develop the best talent and aspire to be an IT employer beyond compare.
The divisions Data and Data2Business together provide data, reporting and analytics solutions to steer and grow Erste Group. Our department is responsible for building and maintaining Reporting solutions and approaches for Controlling and support the data exploration and analytical needs of the business users. Our agile team provides our business partners with consulting services in data-driven projects where learning from data and getting added value from data-derived insights has a significant part.
What to do:
Integrate and implement ETL process for the reporting systems
Identify areas of improvements e.g. performance optimization and trigger relevant initiatives
Enable the users with optimal access to the data stored on Oracle for reporting purposes.
Collaborate with business partners and IT users in the area of BI and DWH following agile principles.
You check these boxes:
Possess a knowledge of Oracle database technology
Experience with Jira and Confluence
Passion for teamwork in a multicultural environment and desire for continuous learning
Why you will like us:
Possibility to benefit and learn from our international, talented and passionate community at Erste 
Great learning curve through ownership and creative freedom
Interest groups and clubs: Take part in discussions and get involved in projects. Numerous interest groups invite you to engage with a topic
Culinary delights – Healthy nutrition and good food are important for our quality of life. Whether lunch, breakfast or snacks – everything is within reach. As an employee, you receive a meal allowance per day. 
Health Care – Taking care of your health is important. That’s why we contribute to your above standard medical examination and provide a helpline in case of hard lifetime situations. You also receive a salary compensation during sick leave
Work-Life-Balance – Sabbatical, paternity leave, contribution to marriage & childbirth, 4 days of extra holiday per year, contribution to the 3rd pillar and MultiSport card. This is how we promote a balance between work, leisure, and family
New way of work: With our flexible working hours model we want to make your life less complicated. Combining the best of both worlds, remote and office time
Employee Referral Program – Become a talent scout for career opportunities in IT. We are rewarding every successful referral for Erste Digital
Language courses for German & English – Learning a new language unites. We support you with appropriate language courses where you participate together with your colleagues.
Visa Sponsoring – We support our employees with all the formalities associated with a relocation to Slovakia and also advise them on choosing a suitable residential area
Thanks to our corporate benefits partners, you can also receive a whole bunch of discounts in different areas
A competitive and performance-related salary dependent on your professional and personal qualifications is granted - we are obliged by law to quote the minimum wage of EUR 2500 gross per month for this full time position. But this is just a formality, we are more than happy to discuss your actual expectations.
Erste Group considers the diversity of its employees as key to innovation and success. As employer we are proud to offer everyone equal chances, irrespective of age, skin colour, religious belief, gender, sexual orientation or origin.

Information about the position Job description, responsibilities and dutiesWe are searching for an enthusiastic Data Warehouse Developer to join our HR Analytics team. This role offers the unique opportunity to work within the Microsoft Azure cloud environment and utilize the cutting-edge Data Vault 2.0 methodology. Whether you have prior experience in this area or are eager to expand your knowledge, this position will challenge you to grow professionally and tackle complex data warehousing projects in HR area. With the option for remote work from anywhere in Slovakia, this role offers the perfect blend of work-life balance and career advancement. If you are a self-motivated and results-driven professional with a passion for data warehousing / modeling and the Microsoft Azure environment and are eager to learn Data Vault 2.0 data modeling methodology, we would love to hear from you.
Responsibilities:
    • Design and implement data warehousing solutions for HR data within the Microsoft Azure cloud environment using the Data Vault 2.0 data modeling methodology
    • Develop and maintain data integration processes to ensure the accuracy and completeness of data in the data warehouse
    • Collaborate with the HR analytics team, which operates in a Scrum, to understand their data requirements and develop data solutions to meet those requirements
    • Monitor data warehousing performance and identify opportunities for improvement
    • Develop and maintain data dictionaries, metadata, and other documentation
    • Troubleshoot issues and perform root cause analysis to identify and resolve problems
    • Develop and maintain automated processes to ensure data quality, consistency, and completeness Wage (gross)2 000 - 2 650 EUR/monthFinal salary is negotiable.
We are offering base salary depending on seniority level and previous experience of candidate. In addition to base salary we provide variable part and other financial benefits. Base salary will not be lower than 2000€/brutto.  Employee perks, benefits
We believe in balance between work and personal life. An attractive and extensive work-life balance portfolio guarantees lasting motivation for employees and thus a better quality of life, promotes physical and mental well-being and contributes to a positive work environment. All this with the aim of providing more freedom in reconciling work, career growth, private life and individual lifestyle. Therefore we offer to our employees over 25 different benefits to improve their personal and professional life in these areas:
Financial benefits

    • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or related field
Skills
    • 2-5 years of experience in data warehousing and data integration. Familiarity with Microsoft Azure and Data Vault 2.0 methodology is preferred, but not mandatory.
    • Strong knowledge of SQL and experience with data warehousing and ETL tools. Knowledge of Microsoft Azure Cloud technology and its related services, such as Azure Data Factory and Azure Databricks is a plus.
    • Ability to analyze and interpret complex data and translate business requirements into technical solutions.
    • Strong verbal and written communication skills.
    • Experience working in a Scrum environment.
    • Ability to identify and resolve technical issues and propose and implement effective solutions.
    • A desire to stay current with new technologies, methodologies, and best practices in data warehousing.
    • Ability to work well in a team environment and collaborate effectively with colleagues and stakeholders.
    • Knowledge and experience with Data Vault 2.0 methodology is a plus, but not mandatory. The company is willing to provide training for the right candidate who is eager to learn and expand their skills. We have managed to grow from scratch to the second largest employer in the eastern part of the country with more than 3900 employees. Information about the position Job description, responsibilities and dutiesPurpose
We are seeking a skilled and experienced Power BI Developer with an innovative mindset to join our Finance International Business Intelligence Team working in a Scrum environment. The ideal candidate will have the opportunity to work remotely from anywhere in Slovakia and will be responsible for designing and implementing data-driven solutions in a Microsoft BI cloud environment to support business intelligence needs across multiple foreign countries, with a focus on automation and implementing predictions, artificial intelligence and self-service BI in the future. If you have a passion for data analysis and visualization, are comfortable working in a Scrum environment, have an innovative mindset, and possess the required skills and experience, we would love to hear from you! Join our Finance International BI Team and work from the comfort of your own home in Slovakia.
Key accountabilities
    • Develop and maintain Power BI reports, dashboards, and data models within the Microsoft Azure cloud environment, using Power BI Desktop and Power BI Service
    • Collaborate with stakeholders to gather requirements and provide insights and recommendations based on data analysis, using SQL, data warehousing concepts, and data modeling techniques
    • Implement data visualization techniques to effectively communicate complex data concepts, using DAX language and advanced Power BI visualizations such as tables, matrices, pie charts, bar charts, line charts, scatter plots, maps, and more
    • Ensure data accuracy, integrity, and security in all Power BI solutions by implementing data validation and data quality checks
    • Develop and maintain technical documentation and training materials, including user guides, process flows, and training presentations
    • Stay current on new Power BI features and updates and apply them to ongoing projects in a Scrum environment, while adhering to project timelines, budgets, and quality standards
    • Support automation of processes and contribute to the implementation of predictions and artificial intelligence in future projects, using machine learning algorithms and predictive analytics Wage (gross)From 2 000 EUR/monthFinal salary is negotiable.

Úvodná stránkaHľadanie prácePython developer - more projects to choose from (Bratislava or remote) 
    Reagujte bez životopisu
Python developer - more projects to choose from (Bratislava or remote)Infinit, s.r.o.
Place of work
Remote work
Contract type
full-time, trade licence
Wage (gross)
2 500 - 5 000 EUR/monthtrade licence (junior up to 2.500 EUR, medior 2.500 - 5.000 EUR, senior 5.000+ EUR) employment contract starting at 1.800 EUR
Information about the position Job description, responsibilities and dutiesWe offer positions to developers with 2+ years of programming experience on a commercial project. Our projects and assignments are long term. We make sure to participate only in projects which are great for developers in these ways:
   - Developer friendly technologies and processes, your effort has a significant, visible impact on the project
   - Opportunity to grow via challenging tasks, cooperation with excellent colleagues, taking responsibility for a component or a team
   - Software solving real need, large user base
   - Relaxed, friendly atmosphere
   - Significant effort to keep the code base maintainable
REQUIREMENTS
   - Strong programming skills
   - Experience or willingness to learn the project tech stack (Python or Python + 
     React/Vue.js)
   - English at least upper intermediate / level B2+
BONUS REQUIREMENTS 
   - Understanding of web development paradigms and concepts
   - Python and/or JavaScript development experience
   - Experience writing automated unit tests, using unit testing frameworks
   - Experience with Computer Science fundamentals (data representation, data structures, algorithms)
CURRENTLY OPEN POSITIONS
TESTMON
Testmon is a product which accelerates test suite execution by selecting only tests affected by recent code changes. 
At the moment we’re developing execution data sharing across the CI and the whole team
   - A lot of of intellectual and technical challenges - caching is one of the hardest CS problems
   - Opportunity to think about fundamentals of programming language and the process of creating software within teams
   - Work on a global product which can forever improve the work of fellow developers, almost from inception.
SCANDINAVIAN MOBILE OPERATOR 
We develop key internal and customer facing web applications and APIs for a mobile operator. The technologies were chosen by the programmers themselves, taking into account the joy of work and productivity. The result is a stack built on Python, Django, Vue.js and Typescript. Other important technologies you will encounter are Docker, GraphQL, SQL, noSQL databases and many more. The project offers an interesting combination of stability and scale while using productive, enjoyable technologies and practices. Employee perks, benefits- develop your skills
- a relaxed, young, professional and diverse work community.
- freedom, flexibility, autonomy and responsibility.
- an office in Bratislava where, after corona, you’ll have the chance to interact with your colleague on the project and 8 other Python developers on different projects. Requirements for the employee Candidates with education suit the positionFollow-up/Higher Professional Education
University student
University education (Bachelor's degree)
University education (Master's degree)
Postgraduate (Doctorate)Language skillsEnglish - Upper intermediate (B2)Other knowledgePython - Advanced Advertiser Brief description of the companySince 2007 we have been a mainly Python oriented company working on interesting international projects. We also work on our own internal project called Testmon. We concentrate the best local talent in Bratislava. Most of us meet daily in our office with a fun, creative and productive atmosphere. Úvodná stránkaHľadanie práceHľadáme vývojára, ktorý sa nebojí C++ ! 
HĽADÁME VÝVOJÁRA, KTORÝ SA NEBOJÍ C++ !
Košice, Slovenská republika
                Základná mzda od €3000 brutto/mesiac (zodpovedá nástupnej úrovni na Mid level pozíciu a ďalej sa odvíja v závislosti od znalostí a skúseností)
            Zohnať kvalitného C++ programátora je v dnešnej dobe neľahká úloha - nielenže sa firmy predbiehajú v platoch a benefitoch, ale kto dnes ešte v C++ robí rád(a), tak to znamená, že týmto jazykom a technológiami naň naviazanými doslova žije.
            My, vývojári v Bohemia Interactive Simulations, sa za takýchto nadšencov považujeme. Mnohí z nás stáli pri zrode nášho hlavného produktu - Virtual Battle Space (VBS) - od čias, kedy sa objavilo C++98 a niektorí pamätajú časy ARMA či dokonca Operation Flashpoint, kde to celé začalo.
            Ako firma sa BISim za 20 rokov rozrástla z pár členného tímu nadšencov na medzinárodnú spoločnosť - najväčšia pobočka je v Prahe, najnovšia tu v Košiciach. Naši hlavní zákazníci sú členské krajiny NATO, ktoré na našich produktoch trénujú vojakov, čím šetria nielen prostriedky na výcvik, ale aj chránia životy samotných vojakov a životné prostredie vôkol nás.
Hľadáme do nášho tímu vývojára/ku, ktorý/á má programovanie predovšetkým ako hobby a až potom ako profesiu. Robíme na fakt zaujímavých veciach, od 3D renderingu cez AR/VR až po simuláciu celých svetov v cloude, takže naše projekty a úlohy preveria aj tie najdrsnejšie povahy 
            Na druhej strane uprednostňujeme motivovaných a spokojných zamestnancov, takže žiadne šibeničné deadliny alebo ťahanie nadčasov - my naše produkty dodávame, keď sú naozaj hotové.
Ak sa ti pozdáva, čo si si práve prečítal(a) a zároveň ti niečo hovorí:
C++ (nečakané!) - dedičnosť, STL, algoritmy, šablóny
dangling pointers, double free, memory leaks, zlé poradie inicializácii objektov, … áno, všetky tie problémy, kde si treba vyhrnúť rukávy
trpezlivosť pri analyzovaní záhadných problémov (viď predošlý bod)
lineárna algebra
princípy 3D renderovania (nie nutnosť, ale poteší)
máš apoň 2 roky praxe (buď s C++ alebo s počítačovou grafikou)
a vieš sa dohovoriť po anglicky na úrovni B2 (väčšinou čítanie/písanie, občas telefonát), tak nám určite napíš, budeme sa mať o čom porozprávať
Z takých štandardných vecí ponúkame:
pohodové pracovné prostredie - nie je nás tu v KE ani dvadsať, máme prakticky plochú riadiacu štruktúru, sídlime v pekných priestoroch hneď pri Hlavnej ulici
stabilnú prácu - nie je to len taký personalistický BS, jednak máme minimálnu fluktuáciu ľudí, ale hlavne máme dlhodobé zákazky a zákazníkov
možnosť reálnej zodpovednosti a rastu - nehľadáme len robotov na programovanie, ale aj ľudí, ktorí vedia svoje vedomosti odovzdávať ďalej
keďže armáda do vývoja investuje nemalé prostriedky, tak máš možnosť pracovať s najmodernejším (niekedy aj najexotickejším) hardvérom, aký sa dá kúpiť
25 dní dovolenky (bežne je 20) + 3 dni osobného voľna
stravenky, ktoré ti v pohode vystačia na obed a plne hradená Multisport karta
Prihásiť sa

Konkrétna mzda bude dohodnutá na základe kvalifikácie a relevantných pracovných skúseností.Termín nástupu: podľa dohodyDruh pracovného pomeru: plný úväzokNáplň práce, právomoci a zodpovednostiVašou úlohou bude:
- programovanie IT aplikácii a nástrojov pre potreby oddelenia elektrika/elektronika v pilotnej hale,
- programovanie a návrh štatistických a reportovacích nástrojov za účelom sledovania výsledkov elektrických skúšok vozidla,
- systémové sledovanie a zabezpečenie relevantných procesov potrebných na správne oživenie elektronických systémov vozidla,

- analýza funkčnosti vozidla z pohľadu procesu, produktu a skúšobných zariadení,
- všetky činnosti pokrývajú fázu predsérie aj série. Iné výhody- dovolenkový príspevok (13. plat), 
- vianočný príspevok (14.plat), 
- príspevok na zahraničnú rekreáciu do výšky max. 700 EUR pre celú rodinu,
- odmena pri pracovnom jubileu,
- príspevok pri narodení dieťaťa,
- príspevok na starostlivosť o dieťa do veku 4 rokov v súkromnom zariadení,
- zamestnanecký úver, bezúročná pôžička na bývanie,
- doplnkové dôchodkové sporenie,
- výber zo širokej ponuky benefitov. Požiadavky na zamestnanca Požadované vzdelanievysokoškolské I. stupňa

Mám záujem
                        Volkswagen Slovakia vyrobil na Slovensku od roku 1991 viac ako 6,5 miliónov vozidiel. Je pilierom slovenského exportu, jedným z najväčších súkromných zamestnávateľov v krajine a spolu so svojimi zamestnancami najväčším prispievateľom do verejných rozpočtov. V Bratislave vyrába automobily Volkswagen Touareg, Audi Q7, Audi Q8, Porsche Cayenne, Porsche Cayenne Coupé, Volkswagen up!, Volkswagen e-up! a ŠKODA KAROQ. Spoločnosť sa aktuálne pripravuje na nábeh nových produktov Volkswagen Passat a ŠKODA SUPERB. Okrem vozidiel produkuje aj komponenty v martinskom závode.

SAP ABAP developer (medior)Mlynská 31/837, KošiceInformácie o pracovnom mieste  Toto je tvoja príležitosťDo nášho tímu na odbor Vývoj a prevádzka SAP hľadáme šikovného kolegu, ktorý nás podporí v zaujímavých projektoch v oblasti rozvoja systému SAP. Ponúkame pracovné miesto, ktorého hlavným účelom je SAP konzultačná činnosť a ABAP programovanie v systéme IS-U (zákaznícky informačný systém).Čo bude tvojou úlohoupodpora a aplikačná prevádzka SAP systémucustomizácia systému SAPmodifikácia existujúceho a vývoj nového softvéru prostriedkami ABAP workbenchkonzultačná činnosť a účasť na projektochtestovanie aplikačného softvérudokumentovanie vývoja, customizácií a testovaniazaškolenie a preškolenie užívateľov SAPPredpoklady pre tvoj úspechVysokoškolské vzdelanie so zameraním na informačné technológie – podmienkouAktívna znalosť aspoň jedného programovacieho jazyka – podmienkouZnalosť programovania v ABAP výhodouPraktické skúsenosti na podobnej pracovnej pozícii – min.5 rokovInovatívny prístup a kreativita v kombinácii s analytickým myslenímVeľmi dobré komunikačné schopnosti, logické myslenie a cit pre detailTímový duch, záujem o vec a ochota učiť saZnalosť anglického jazyka – úroveň B2, výhodouBenefity, na ktoré sa môžeš tešiť alebo ďalšie skvelé dôvody, prečo prísť k námRátaj s 5 dňami voľna navyše, či s vyššou náhradou príjmu počas PN. Dňa 1. októbra nepracuješ – vtedy energetici oslavujú svoj sviatokKu Dňu energetiky ťa určite poteší finančná odmena. Stravné lístky budeš mať aj za čas svojej neprítomnosti. Tešiť sa môžeš i na doplnkové dôchodkové sporenie, jubilejný bonus  a príspevok na detské letné táboryVzdelávanie a rozvoj sú pre nás samozrejmosťou, „šijeme ich na mieru“ pre každého. Senior Frontend / Fullstack Developer for eMobilityPlace of workRemote work Basic wage component (gross) and other rewards2500 € + variable component (senior) (base salary depends on seniority, experiences and qualification of the candidate)ProjectFor our prominent customer Compleo, we are looking for senior candidates to join our core team established in 2011. E-Mobility project is platform for management, operations, monitoring and integration of charging stations for electric vehicles into company operation landscape. Electric vehicles are gaining massive momentum recently and all major automotive companies are drawing their focus there. Successful candidate will be working on microservice architecture based on Spring Boot on AWS Cloud.Your roleYou will join our Agile team of senior developers and testers located in Germany or Kosice (upon preferrence) and can contribute to regular features development as well as to architectural changes, improvements and system evolution.   The role also includes:  analysis of the customer requirements development, testing and reviewing core features of microservice applications estimation and planning detail tasks based upon the requirement from customer development of software for charging stations ecosystem (for e-cars) development of unit and system integration tests based on acceptance criteria, bug analysis cooperation with developers and other project members from Germany and Vietnam Tech stack Angular TypeScript, Webpack, Redux / Akita Java 8 AWS What do we expect? you have at least 2 years of experience in Frontend development you are familiar with Angular, TypeScript, Webpack and Redux (or Akita) you are able to design REST APIs you speak English, German will be an advantage Benefits Variable component in amount of 13. salary Company social benefit up to 2 000 € Extra project bonus Company bonus Referral bonus up to 3 000 € Unlimited, fully equipped home office Flexible working hours Hard and soft skills trainings Unlimited access to all Udemy for Business e-learning trainings Language course Contribution on your own hardware  ContactContact person: Šarlota PiroškováTel.: +421556101600E-mail: send CV

Information about the position Job description, responsibilities and dutiesOur Client is a global healthcare company dedicated to providing a suite of innovative hematology products and solutions for customers, to help them improve patient care and reduce the cost of healthcare. Our technology addresses important medical markets: blood and plasma component collection, the surgical suite, and hospital transfusion services.
