Informácie o pracovnom mieste Náplň práce, právomoci a zodpovednostiHľadáme skúseného Senior Backend Developera, ktorý má schopnosť rozumieť vzťahu medzi technológiou a hodnotou pre podnikanie a komunikovať ho efektívne medzi juniornejších developerov a zákazníkov. Zameriava sa na vývoj webových e-commerce riešení a prezentačných webových stránok, aplikácií alebo portálov, vrátane integrácie s aplikáciami tretích strán s použitím Python, Djanga, Elasticsearch a SQL. 
Vyvíjame vlastné platformové E- commerce riešenia (pre obchod, sklady, B2C a B2B e-shop...). Sú postavené na ostrieľaných a rapídne rastúcich technológiách Python v kombinácii s Django frameworkom a ElasticSearch-om. Buildy a deployment na staging alebo produkciu za nás automaticky rieši Gitlab CI a Docker. O zachovanie kvality kódu sa postará Sonar. 
Náplň práce:
•	implementácia modulov webových aplikácií
•	implementácia zmenových požiadaviek na klientskych aplikáciách
•	implementácia integrácií so systémami tretích strán (ERP systémy, platobné brány, 
        systémy dopravcov a pod.)
•      tvorba, návrh, testovanie a vyvoj softvérových ​​komponentov, ktoré spĺňajú 
        definované požiadavky a najnovšie technológie
•      podieľanie sa na vedení menej skúsených kolegov
•      optimalizujte existujúci kód a píšte ho prehľadný, dobre dokumenotvaný a 
        udržiavateľný 
•      tvarujte, navrhujte, budujte a udržiavajte jadro e-shopu
•      buďte proaktívny na tímových poradách, diskusiách, stand-upoch a code reviews.
•      automatizujte opakujúce sa úlohy a udržiavajte si prehľad o najnovšch technologiách 
        a knižniciach.
•      komunikujte a spolupracujte s Product Ownerom, UX/UI dizajnérom a zákazníkmi
Technológie, ktoré potrebujete minimálne vedieť:
•	Python (4/5)
•	Django (4/5)
•	Verzionovací systém (GIT, SVN) (3/5)
1.	Nikdy som nepoužíval
2.	Viem základné príkazy
3.	Základná pracovná skúsenosť
4.	Pokročilá pracovná skúsenosť
5.	Expert, profesionál
Technológie, ktoré používame a ich znalosť bude výhodou:
• Elasticsearch
• PostgreSQL, MariaDB

Ak hľadáte dlhodobé, stabilné zamestnanie a zaujali Vás technológie s ktorými pracujeme a chcete sa dozvedieť viac, určite nám napíšte. Prosím pošlite nám svoje CV a radi si s Vami dohodneme rozhovor. Zamestnanecké výhody, benefityKvalitná a zodpovedná práca predsa musí človeka aj baviť a my pracovný život dôsledne striedame s relaxom, či už športovým alebo pasívnym. Ak o to budete stáť, naučíme Vás aj oddychovať a zdravšie žiť. K dispozícií je náš bufet kde okrem kávy či čaju máme aj ovocie, či niečo nutričné pod zub. 
Ďalšie benefity:
• nadštandardné pravidelné platové ohodnotenie a interný systém odmeňovania
• flexibilný pracovný čas
• možnosť homeoffice
• kariérny rast a sebarealizácie
• káva, čaj, ovocie, občerstvenie
• šípky, xbox, stolný futbal, stolný tenis, stolové hry
• Žiadna byrokracia
• firemný hardware
• podpora športových aktivít
• event kalendár firemných akcií a teambuildingov

• firemná knižnica s odbornou literatúrou
• účasť na odborných konferenciách a fórach
• sick days
• poradenstvo v oblasti wellbeing Informácie o výberovom konaníŽiadne strachy s pohovorom, predvýber robíme testíkom, kde si oprášiš svoje vedomosti. Následne pokračujú priateľské pohovory, kde by sme si radi vypočuli aj tvoje predstavy o našej budúcej spolupráci.
Veľmi pekne ďakujeme za každý poslaný životopis a záujem o nás. Každý si dôkladne prejdeme a kontaktovať budeme len vybraných uchádzačov. Ďakujeme za pochopenie.
Zaslaním životopisu dáva uchádzač svoj súhlas spoločnosti SmartBase, s.r.o. so spracovaním jeho osobných údajov pre účely databázy uchádzačov o zamestnanie v zmysle Zák. č. 122/2013 Zb. o ochrane osobných údajov. Požiadavky na zamestnanca Pozícii vyhovujú uchádzači so vzdelanímštudent vysokej školy

Microsoft si nás vybral ako jedného z partnerov pre „Enterprise e-commerce“. Zároveň sme dostali ocenenie na prestížnej súťaži Microsoft Awards 2018 za naše riešenie „Virtuálna a rozšírená realita v retail e-commerce“
Tak, ako kvalitu našich riešení si vážime aj našich zamestnancov a v prípade problému za nimi pevne stojíme. Staviame na pevných morálnych princípoch aj s našimi zákazníkmi, ktorí sa na nás môžu vždy spoľahnúť. Poctivá tvrdá práca a osobitý prístup ku každému zamestnancovi a klientovi sú tým, čo nás charakterizuje. Každoročný rast spoločnosti vo všetkých smeroch stojí na poctivej práci každého z nás. Chceme robiť veci lepšie a nemáme radi priemernosť. Unikátnosť v každom smere je naším cieľom. Počet zamestnancov20-24 zamestnancov

Náplň práceHľadáš prácu a máš skúsenosti s automatizovaným testingom? Tak to hľadáme práve TEBA!  Momentálne obsadzujeme viacero pozícií pre automatizovaných testerov. Môžeš si vybrať spomedzi zaujímavých projektov presne podľa tvojich preferencií. Našimi klientmi sú medzinárodné ale i menšie slovenské firmy špecializujúce sa na IT riešenia v rôznych oblastiach, napr. bankovníctvo, poisťovníctvo, plynový či automobilový priemysel a i. 
Náplň práce: 
- príprava a vývoj testovacích skriptov
- spúšťanie automatizovaných testov
- identifikácia bugov a retesting
- zodpovednosť za technickú dokumentáciu a špecifikácie
- integrácia skriptov a podpora kontinuálnej integrácie PožadujemeČo požadujeme: 
- Predchádzajúca pracovná skúsenosť s automatizovaným testingom minimálne 1 rok
- Znalosť aspoň jedného programovacieho jazyka (Java/Python/Javascript/C#) 
- Skúsenosť s aspoň jedným frameworkom na automatizáciu testov(Selenium/Selenide/Cypress/Cucumber/RobotFW/iné) 
- Anglický jazyk na komunikačnej úrovni Benefity- možnosť full remote práce 
- finančné bonusy (polročné/ročné) 
- dovolenka navyše

Informácie o pracovnom mieste Náplň práce, právomoci a zodpovednostiMáš záujem pracovať s expertmi v oblasti SAP poradenstva? Spoločnosť LL CONSULTING Ti ponúka možnosť byť súčasťou dynamického tímu konzultantov a vývojárov, ktorí majú dlhoročné skúsenosti a know-how v rámci komplexných riešení pre podnikové informačné systémy. Tvojou náplňou práce bude:
- aktívna účasť na medzinárodných SAP projektoch
- konzultačná činnosť, customizácia, podpora a poradenstvo kľúčovým a koncovým používateľom
- vývoj a testovanie nových funkcií, kontrola a ladenie produktov za účelom klientovej spokojnosti
- programovanie v ABAP/4 (OOP)
- vývoj aplikácii v prostredí SAP R/3
- branžové riešenia: IS-U, IS-IS a Public Sector Zamestnanecké výhody, benefity- malá slovenská spoločnosť (do 30 kolegov) s plochou organizačnou štruktúrou,  krátkymi komunikačnými kanálmi & open door policy
- školenia, certifikácie a vzdelávanie v SAP
- jazykové kurzy v rámci pracovnej doby
- firemné akcie, športové aktivity a teambuildingy
- multisport karta (plne hradená)
- nápoje a sladkosti
- flexibilná pracovná doba
- príspevok na stravovanie nad rámec zákona
- atraktívne mzdové ohodnotenie
- odmeny podľa výkonu na mesačnej báze
- príspevok pri životnej udalosti (napr. svadba, narodenie dieťata, a pod.)
- bonus pri odporučení nového kolegu
- notebook a mobil podľa vlastných preferencií Požiadavky na zamestnanca Pozícii vyhovujú uchádzači so vzdelanímvysokoškolské I. stupňa

Information about the position Job description, responsibilities and dutiesWe are currently looking for an experienced software engineer, who could have ambition/potential to become developer lead, to join our team that builds one of these cloud based systems that enhance the travel experience for general public in major European metropolitan areas. You will be working with the team to deliver high quality, cloud based fare collection backend system that's responsible for processing thousands of credit card payments for journeys every day.
Our teams work in the state of the art cloud native environment and technologies such as AWS SQS, ECS, CloudWatch, CodePipeline, S3, RDS and many more.

-	Backend C# and .NET Framework (Entity MEF).

In the area of software engineering, it is our top-quality services, individual customer approach and ability to achieve targets which are most highly valued by our clients. Thanks to these, Ness Kosice enjoys long-term business relationships with its customers. Our teams of professionals first process and analyze client’s requirements; then, through cooperation with the client, they use the newest technology to fulfil these requirements in an “agile” environment.

Informácie o pracovnom mieste Náplň práce, právomoci a zodpovednostiČaká ťa celý ekosystém technológií, vďaka ktorému pretvárame bežné výrobné podniky na smart factory. Budeš sa aktívne podieľať na nových prepojeniach SW sveta so svetom automatizácie a výroby (Naše EMANS projekty - https://www.anasoft.com/emans/sk/home/Referencie).V EMANS tíme veríme tomu čo robíme.Sme hrdí na to, že náš kód dokáže poskladať auto, bezchybne vyskladňovať, doručiť na správne miesto...Čo bude tvoja zodpovednosť? Vývoj a návrh nových logických celkov pre platformu EMANS (https://www.anasoft.com/emans/sk/). Overovanie si týchto nových konceptov EMANSu v reálnych projektoch.V rámci implementácie u zákazníkov: Analyzovanie procesov, technických podmienok a požiadaviek užívateľov. Navrhovanie a konfigurácia počítačových aplikácií a technických riešení. Návrh a optimalizácia výrobných procesov, implementácia návrhu prostredníctvom riadiacich systémov a ostatných prvkov priemyselnej automatizácie. Implementácia aplikačného a technického vybavenia v prostredí priemyselnej výroby. Vytváranie systémovej a používateľskej dokumentácie. Do nášho tímu neustále hľadáme šikovných developerov, ktorí vedia nielen napísať dobrý kód pre webové riešenie, ale tiež ho ideovo rozvíjať. Pretože v práci strávime väčšinu dňa, je pre nás dôležitá povaha a charakter človeka. Myšlienková zhoda je základ. 
Si zvedavý ako to u  nás funguje? Prečítaj si rozhovor s našou programátorkou Gabikou.

Information about the position Job description, responsibilities and dutiesAt Revalize, we build the software and technology that powers sales of manufactured, complex products. Our customers rely on our software to select and sell everything from commercial ovens, to specialized pumps and valves, to grain elevators, and more. We are the global leader in sector-specific software solutions that help manufacturers optimize revenue operations through design applications, engineering simulations, product selection, CPQ, PIM, visualization, and data analytics.
Headquartered in Jacksonville, FL, we serve over 20,000 customers across the globe.
Revalize is a portfolio company of TA Associates and Hg.
Job Description:
•	Create technical designs for new features 
•	Produce and review estimates for work, ensuring estimates are realistic and achievable 
•	Adherence to design standards, design patterns and best practices 
•	Participate in maintaining, tuning, and repairing applications to ensure they perform to technical and functional specifications 
•	Create and document tests necessary to ensure that an application or technical environment meets performance requirements 
•	Write and review supporting documents for features developed 
Other responsibilities: 
•	Cooperate closely with other departments - project management / development 
•	Collaborate and provide input for IT support team 
Qualifications
•	University education (Bachelor's degree), preferably in IT 
•	C# - Advanced 
•	ASP .NET MVC, HTML, JS, CSS – Advanced 
•	.NET Core – Intermediate 
•	SQL – Intermediate Requirements for the employee Candidates with education suit the positionUniversity education (Bachelor's degree)
University education (Master's degree)
Postgraduate (Doctorate)Educational SpecializationPreferably ITLanguage skillsEnglish - Upper intermediate (B2)Other knowledgeC# - AdvancedASP.NET Core MVC - Advanced.NET - SkillfulSQL - Skillful Advertiser Brief description of the company• Based in Jacksonville, Florida, Revalize was formed in 2021 through the merger of five software companies - each with extensive experience in providing software solutions for manufacturing enterprises and each specialized in their own sector.
• Customers approach us to help them optimize revenue operations through design applications, engineering simulations, product selection, CPQ, PIM, visualization, and data analytics.
• We serve over 20 000 customers across the globe.
• Since its foundation, the company has grown and currently includes 17 global brands, making Revalize one of the global leaders in the software solutions sector for the manufacturing industry.
• One of these 17 companies is SpecPage, for which we are looking for new colleagues.
• SpecPage provides services to customers mainly from the food and beverage industry.
• We are looking for a person who can identify with our values. #Humility, #Integrity, #Grit, #ResultOrientation, #WinningAttitude, #DriveToExcellence
• Take advantage of the opportunity to work for customers such as Bahlsen, Dr. Oetker, Granini, Hipp, Kraft, Manner, Mondelez, Nestlé, Lindt, L’Oréal, Subway, Teekanne and many others. Number of employees50-99 employees

Úvodná stránkaHľadanie práceCloud Developer 
                                Define your career today.
                                Explore opportunities now.
                                Primary job category
                            IT Specialist
                                Place of work
                            Bratislava, Banská Bystrica, Košice
                                Contract type
                            full-time
                                Salary (gross)
2 300 - 3 500 EUR/month
Cloud Developer
Your Role and Responsibilities :
•          You will be responsible for design and implementation of the cloud-native software that solves actual business problems using cloud technology
•          You will develop workflows and process following the best practices and cloud architecture
•          You will support monitoring and maintenance activities
•          You will document developed solutions
Required Professional and Technical Expertise :
•          Hands-on experience with software development and Cloud services
•          Good knowledge and experience with development in at least one of the following cloud: AWS, Google Cloud, Azure
•          Knowledge of Object-Oriented Programming and Design Patterns
•          Knowledge of Microservice architecture and Serverless solutions
•          Knowledge of container technologies (Docker, Kubernetes, OpenShift)
Preferred Professional and Technical Expertise :
•          Knowledge of Java 8 (or above), Python, NodeJS
•          Knowledge of Spring Framework, Spring Boot, Hibernate/JPA
•          Knowledge of RDBMS (Oracle, MySQL or PostgreSQL) and/or NoSQL Databases (e.g. MongoDB)
•          Knowledge of network communication/integration solutions (SOAP, REST API, JSON)
•          Basic knowledge of Front-end Frameworks (Angular, React or Vue.js)
•          Basic knowledge of MQ frameworks, Event Streaming platforms (Kafka)
•          Basic knowledge of CI/CD concept and tools (e.g. Jenkins)
•          Basic Knowledge of Git, Maven/Gradle
•          Linux OS background
•          Experience with Agile/DevOps
What benefits do we offer?
• Salary starting from 2300 - 3500 EUR gross, depending on relevant experience and language proficiency
• Stable job in a reputable and well-performing company
• Almost endless learning & growth opportunities (classroom based trainings and 5000 e-learning courses)
• Subsidized meal-tickets
• Flexible working time and home office 
• Three additional vacation days
• Up to three self-recovery days
• 100% sick leave compensation
• Life insurance and supplementary pension savings program
• Private medical sanatorium
• Long term career development and possibility of internal rotation
• Recommend-a-Friend – get a bonus in the employee referral program
Additional information
            IBM is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or veteran status.

C# Test Automation Developer
Place of work
Košice Region, Slovakia, Košice region (Job with occasional home office)
Contract type
full-time
Salary
1 900 EUR/monthFrom 1900€  + VAR*
Job description, responsibilities and duties C# Test Automation Developer Are You passionate about testing and automation? Do you want to be part of creation something new, share Your knowledge and learn new one together with young team? In case Your answer to previous questions is yes, we offer You opportunity to use your knowledge and passion in our team in creating new solutions in area of deployment of medical software. As a C# Test Automation Engineer you  will: Create test scenarios according to the requirement specification Develop the automated tests, regular test run and test result evaluation Install  and operate of test environment in virtual machines Develop and maintain internal test automation framework written in C#   Required skills: Experience in software engineering in C# Understand and apply  the OOD, OOP principles, and design patterns Investigation skills, analytical and logical thinking    Personality and other requirements: You are proactively driving your professional growth You are team player You can speak and write in English    Basic wage component (gross) and other rewards : starting from 1900EUR brutto /month + VAR* *We are required by law to disclose basic wage component (minimum salary) for the advertised positions. We carefully consider your professional qualifications and experience in our compensation package and/or when offering you other positions. Our goal is to pay our employee's fairly, with regard to the market situation and we are ready to welcome high-quality candidates in our team.

×Ľutujeme, spoločnosť ponúkajúca danú pracovnú pozíciu ukončila zverejnenie ponuky na stránke.Ďakujeme za porozumenie.Zobraziť podobné ponukySCADA Programátor
Miesto práce
Lamačská cesta, Bratislava
Termín nástupu
ASAP/dohodou
Druh pracovného pomeru
plný úväzok
Platové ohodnotenie
1 500 EUR/mesiacOd 1 500 €  brutto/mesiac + variabilná odmena**Máme zákonnú povinnosť zverejniť v inzerovanej pozícii základnú zložku mzdy (minimálnu mzdu). Na pohovore starostlivo posúdime Vašu kvaliﬁkáciu ,predpoklady a skúsenosti a kandidátom s vyššou úrovňou skúseností, bude samozrejme seniorita zohľadnená v platovej ponuke. Našim cieľom je odmeňovať zamestnancov férovo s prihliadnutím na situáciu na trhu a tak, aby sme vedeli v našom tíme privítať kvalitných kandidátov.
O nás
SIPRINSpoločnosť Siprin bola založená v marci 1999. Medzi jej hlavné činnosti patrí poradenstvo a tvorba riešení v oblasti priemyselnej automatizácie či technická údržba výrobných liniek a zariadení priemyselných podnikov. Popis pracovnej pozicie a zodpovednostiHľadáme nových kolegov na oddelenie Engineering Department (ED) na pozíciu programátor SCADA systémov Siemens (WinCC, WinCC OA) v oblasti priemyselnej automatizácie a mestskej a dopravnej infraštruktúry.Pozície otvárame tak pre skúsených programátorov ako aj pre absolventov.Vašou úlohou bude:•	technická podpora pri analýze požiadaviek zákazníkov•	technická podpora pri návrhu SW riešení•	vývoj a test SW v kancelárii v Bratislave alebo formou Home office (podľa vzájomnej dohody)•	nasadzovanie a test SW u zákazníkov v SK alebo zahraničí•	zaškoľovanie užívateľov SW•	analýza a odstraňovanie SW chýb po uvedení do prevádzkyOdborné predpoklady•	vzdelanie s technickým alebo matematickým zameraním•	skúsenosti so štandardným programovaním (C++, C#, Visual Basic, a p .)>   prax s vývojom aplikácií v štandardných programovacích jazykoch  a/alebo prax s vývojom v SCADA aplikáciách WinCC a/alebo WinCC OA (prípadne iných) sú výhodouOsobnostné predpoklady a zručnosti:samostatnosť•	zodpovednosť•	nadštandardná schopnosť logického uvažovania•	zápal pre tvorivú prácu•	ﬂexibilita•	schopnosť práce v kolektíve
            Potrebné vzdelanie, zručnosti a osobnostné predpoklady
Vzdelaniestredoškolské s maturitouJazykové znalostiAnglický jazyk - Stredne pokročilý (B2) alebo Nemecký jazyk - Stredne pokročilý (B2)
Čo ponúkame
                •	Prácu v spoločnosti s dlhoročnou skúsennosťou vo vývoji riešení v oblasti priemyselnej automatizácie a infraštruktúr so zákazkami v rôznch odvetviach•	Možnosť práce na slovenských aj zahraničných projektoch•	Možnosť práce formou Home office aj po ukončení obmedzení vyplývajúcich z pandémie Covid19•	Vlastné školiace stredisko•	Nadštandardnú vnútrofiremná atmosféruDodatočné sociálne benefity:•	Bonus za odporúčanie nového zamestnanca•	Doplnkové dôchodkové sporenie – príspevok od zamestnávateľa•	Príspevok pri pracovnom výročí vo výške 1 mesačnej mzdy•	Rodinný program (príspevok pri narodení dieťaťa, odchode na materskú dovolenku, pri pracovnom jubileu)•	Zvýhodnené zamestnanecké pôžičky•	Vianočný večierok•	Príspevok na kultúru a šport•	Zvýhodnený zamestnanecký mobilný paušál pre rodinných príslušníkov•	Plná náhrada príjmu počas prvých 10 dní PN

Úvodná stránkaHľadanie práceJunior Nuclear Verification & Validation /Test Engineer 
Framatome Controls s. r. o. – a wholly-owned subsidiary of Framatome S.A.S. – is providing engineering services, system solutions, projects, software support and related services for nuclear power plants all over the world. The company focuses mainly on software and hardware designs for automation technology, electrical systems design and support activities by commissioning of nuclear components and devices.About 60 employees of Framatome Controls s. r. o. in Bratislava are part of 14,000 Framatome´s employees family worldwide. Every day Framatome´s expertise helps its customers improve the safety and performance of their nuclear plants and achieve their economic and societal goals.
For our site in Bratislava we are looking for:
Junior Nuclear Verification & Validation /Test Engineer
Your role
Framatome Controls s. r. o. is continuing to develop and grow and will hire a further 20 people at its Bratislava site in 2023.In your role as Verification & Validation (V&V) Engineer Junior, you will be a member of the local V&V team as a part of an international V&V team. Our V&V section is in charge of verification and validation of software and hardware of safety automation systems used on nuclear power plant. Our role is to check the technical correctness, completeness and consistency of design deliverables according to regulations required for nuclear power plants worldwide.As a V&V Engineer, you will have a project abroad assigned to you.In collaboration with an international small team, your missions will be the participation on: preparation of test procedures development of test automation software and automatic test scripts performance of test simulations (using software tools and simulators), test performance on Test Bay or during Commissioning Phase on the power plant analysis and presentation of test results (by written form) contribution to design reviewsThis position is  also suitable for fresh graduate candidates, or someone with short professional experience
Your profile
 University degree in Technical Engineering (Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Physics or Mechanical Engineering) Basic experience in Linux and usage of command line Basic experience with programming (e. g. C/C++, Python) Professional experience in the field of software testing, safety related system or any kind of simulation is an advantage Ability to communicate in English - mainly in written form. Slovak is not mandatory. Experience with elaboration of technical documents in English is an advantage Analytical mind: ability to identify, describe and resolve the problems as well as to report the results independently Ability to learn by yourself supported by a know-how transfer, curiosity Technical rigorousness and focus on details Desire to be invested sustainably and to grow professionally Willingness to travel (upon personal preferences)
We’re looking forward to receiving your application.
We offer:
                    Joining Framatome Controls s.r.o. means... The opportunity to work on exciting projects, Being part of a dynamic team, in a global and market-leading company, Having access to a wide range of professional and personal development opportunities: we will offer you on-the-job training and  you will be accompanied by your manager and your team to develop your competencies. You will also have the possibility to develop specific skills by going on business trips to Germany or France or by going on expatriation within a power plant. You will also receive a language training allowance (English, French or German language).Financial rewards: Basic wage: starting from 1500 EUR gross/month* 13th month’s salary Yearly salary review Annual performance bonus Meal vouchers fully paid by the company You can benefit from a bonus for successful referral of new employee Business trips fully paid by the company, with larger mobility aidAnd because the well-being at work of our collaborators is essential for us: We will give you recognition for your work, We will take care of your work-life balance by offering flexible working time (freedom to choose when to start and end your work, between 6 AM and 8 PM, by respecting core hours from 9 AM to 3 PM) Possibility to work from home up to 3 days per week We also organize social programs: teambuilding, Christmas party... Free parking slots nearby (we are also accessible by tram line 4 - 25 minutes from Bratislava city center)*We are required by law to disclose basic wage component (minimum salary) for the advertised positions. We carefully consider your professional qualifications and experience in our compensation package and/or when offering you other positions. The above mentioned basic wage is defined for candidates with junior experiences.Our goal is to pay our employee's fairly, with regard to the market situation and we are ready to welcome high-quality candidates in our team.
Please send your CV in English  or questions about this position to Mathilde FRAYSSE
                E-mail: [email protected], Framatome Controls s. r. o., Vajnorská 137, 831 04 Bratislava
www.framatome.com

Úvodná stránkaHľadanie práceSenior Nuclear Verification & Validation / Test Engineer 
Framatome Controls s. r. o. – a wholly-owned subsidiary of Framatome S.A.S. – is providing engineering services, system solutions, projects, software support and related services for nuclear power plants all over the world. The company focuses mainly on software and hardware designs for automation technology, electrical systems design and support activities by commissioning of nuclear components and devices.About 60 employees of Framatome Controls s. r. o. in Bratislava are part of 14,000 Framatome´s employees family worldwide. Every day Framatome´s expertise helps its customers improve the safety and performance of their nuclear plants and achieve their economic and societal goals.
For our site in Bratislava we are looking for:
Senior Nuclear Verification & Validation / Test Engineer
Your role
Framatome Controls s. r. o. is continuing to develop and grow and will hire a further 20 people at its Bratislava site in 2023.In your role as Verification & Validation (V&V) Engineer Senior you will be a member of the local V&V team as a part of an international V&V team. Our V&V section is in charge of verification and validation of software and hardware of safety automation systems used on nuclear power plant. Our role is to check the technical correctness, completeness and consistency of design deliverables according to regulations required for nuclear power plants worldwide.As a V&V Engineer, you will have a project abroad assigned to you.In collaboration with an international small team, your missions will be : verification of technical correctness, completeness and consistency of design deliverables in any phase of the project, preparation of test plans and test procedures (development of test automation software and automatic test scripts), elaboration of change impact analysis of the design changes in relation with tests performance of test simulations (using software tools and simulators), test performance on Test Bay or during Commissioning Phase on the power plant analysis and presentation of test results (elaboration of test reports) and contribution to design and phase reviews reporting of the budget and schedule adherenceAfter developing the skills in different V&V activities there is a high potential to become a V&V team leader for a small team and a V&V system leader for all V&V activities.
Your profile
 University degree in Technical Engineering (Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Physics or Mechanical Engineering) Fluent technical English. Slovak is not mandatory Basic experience in Linux and usage of command line Basic experience with Python, C, C++ or other object-oriented programming language Knowledge about Instrumentation & Control Systems is an advantage Professional experience in the field of software testing, safety related system or any kind of simulation at least 3 years Elaboration of technical documents in English Experience with technical review of documents is an advantage Ability to learn by yourself supported by a know-how transfer, and share your knowledge Analytical mind: ability to identify, describe and resolve the problems, and to present clear information verbally and in written form Initiative spirit and creative spirit Technical rigorousness and focus on details Ability to take technical responsibilities, lead people and help them to grow professionally Desire to invest in yourself sustainably Willingness to travel for business trips (< 3 months)
We’re looking forward to receiving your application.
We offer:
                    Joining Framatome Controls s.r.o. means... The opportunity to work on exciting projects, Being part of a dynamic team, in a global and market-leading company, Having access to a wide range of professional and personal development opportunities: we will offer you on-the-job training and you will be accompanied by your manager and your team to develop your competencies. You will also have the possibility to develop specific skills by going on business trips to Germany or France or by going on expatriation within a power plant. You will also receive a language training allowance (English, French or German language).Financial rewards: Basic wage: starting from 1800 EUR gross/month* 13th month’s salary Yearly salary review Annual performance bonus Meal vouchers fully paid by the company You can benefit from a bonus for successful referral of new employee Business trips fully paid by the company, with larger mobility aidAnd because the well-being at work of our collaborators is essential for us: We will give you recognition for your work, We will take care of your work-life balance by offering flexible working time (freedom to choose when to start and end your work, between 6 AM and 8 PM, by respecting core hours from 9 AM to 3 PM) Possibility to work from home up to 3 days per week We also organize social programs: teambuilding, Christmas party... Free parking slots nearby (we are also accessible by tram line 4 - 25 minutes from Bratislava city center)*We are required by law to disclose basic wage component (minimum salary) for the advertised positions. We carefully consider your professional qualifications and experience in our compensation package and/or when offering you other positions. The above mentioned basic wage is defined for candidates with junior experiences.Our goal is to pay our employee's fairly, with regard to the market situation and we are ready to welcome high-quality candidates in our team.

Úvodná stránkaHľadanie práceInfrastructure Security Engineer   Можливість для людей з України
We harness the power of tech to increase sustainability.
How do you want to use technology?
 Infrastructure Security Engineer 
                                Place of work
                            Košice, Slovakia (Job with occasional home office)
                                Contract type
                            full-time
POSITIONDESCRIPTIONInfrastructure Projects Delivery Unit is responsible for design and deployment security solutions protecting and managing the client network. An L3 resource is expected to function as the highest level of technical support and escalation for security related issues, incidents and initiatives. The person should be able to take the role of Subject Matter Expert in technical project deliverables and be responsible for end-to-end solution implementation. Network Security engineer should have sufficient networking experience to tightly cooperate with communications network team engineers to deliver the solutions on a wide scale covering all the networking aspects. WHAT WILLYOU DO•	Due-diligence of existing client’s solution, analyzing physical topology, logical interconnectivity, service dependency, application flows and security constraints.•	Attending meetings and workshops with the client to understand requirements, challenges and risks.•	Successfully presenting and backing complex designs for critical infrastructure to senior client resources at formal review boards•	Developing security solution in cooperation with Network and Application projects team for solid end-to-end secure communication using existing industry standards, best practices and know-hows fitting it into existing infrastructure and operations framework.•	Creating designs and support documentation for the delivered infrastructure. Raising change records and executing activity while adhering to client’s processes and procedures.•	Support and trouble-shooting of network security devices and systems delivered by the project to the client during transition/handover period. That includes firewalls, intrusion detection systems, virtual private networks (VPN), security device management platforms, etc.•	Vulnerability management, platform selection, software production-feature set and load- testing for chosen platform. WHAT WEEXPECT•	Have 1+ year(s) of infrastructure security experience working with major firewall platforms (Palo Alto, Juniper, Cisco, Fortinet, etc.). Certificate for any of the platform is a plus.•	Alternatively have 1+ year(s) experience in Data Centre Security and micro-segmentation (zero-trust model and core segmentation, NSX, ACI, Tetration, etc.)•	Alternatively have 1+ year experience with Cloud Security platforms – either cloud edge IaaS firewall or Cloud SaaS solution (Cisco CSR/vMX, Cisco AMP/SIG, CheckPoint, zScaler, PRISMA, etc.)•	Have a good knowledge of networking – either classic (switching, dynamic routing protocols, static and rule-based routing, etc.) or cloud (VPC, peering, gateways, SD-WAN secure fabric). Certificate in any networking area is a plus.•	Have a good knowledge of encryption and tunneling protocols (PKI, IPSec, SSL VPN, TLS, IKE, IKEv2, etc.)•	Understand application protocols in context of OSI network layers and content inspection (Load-balancing, WAF, IPS, IDS, etc.)•	Understand cloud technologies and infrastructure virtualization (IaaS, PaaS, SaaS, NFV, SDN, SD-WAN)•	Understand baseline security requirements and platform hardening principles.•	Be flexible for international business trips to attend client meetings or workshops or perform remote site installation and configuration.•	Have good verbal communication skills (English) in both technical and non-technical communications.•	Have good experience creating design documents (HLD, LLD) diagrams (Visio) and presentations (PPT)•	Have good analytical mindset for problem solving under stress and time pressure. WHAT WEOFFERSalary1 800 - 3 000 EUR/monthAccenture offers a competitive compensation package. As required by the Slovak law we state, that the legal monthly minimum gross base pay starting from 1 800 € to 3 000 €. Base salary is likely to be higher depending on your professional and personal qualifications in the required areas.Recognition: • Guaranteed paid overtime or overtime vacation• German language bonus up to 400€ monthly/gross depending on language proficiency and level of seniority• Flexible Benefit System - budget to be spent on services of your choice• Competitive bonus structure• Refer-a-Friend – get a bonus in the employee referral program• Loyalty rewardsFlexibility: • Flexible working arrangements (time & place of work)Future: • Wide range of trainings and expert lectures• Regular performance review and career growth possibilities• Ongoing career guidance and mentoring (Global Mentoring Program, Lean In)• Employee share purchase planFamily & Health: • 3 extra days off• Sick leave salary compensation (up to 100%)• Home-office equipment• Family oriented benefits (Wedding, Parental and Baby days-off and bonuses)• Employee assistance services (professional psychological, financial and legal help)• Multisport card• 24/7 Telehealth support• Bereavement Leave (up to 4 weeks) Interested?Apply for this job

Úvodná stránkaHľadanie práceInfrastructure Security Senior Engineer   Можливість для людей з України
We harness the power of tech to increase sustainability.
How do you want to use technology?
 Infrastructure Security Senior Engineer 
                                Place of work
                            Košice, Slovakia (Job with occasional home office)
                                Contract type
                            full-time
POSITIONDESCRIPTIONInfrastructure Engineering Security team is responsible for design and deployment security solutions protecting and managing the client network. An L3/L4 resource is expected to function as the highest level of technical support and escalation for security related issues, incidents and initiatives. The person should be able to take the role of Subject Matter Expert in technical project deliverables and be responsible for end-to-end solution delivery. Network Security engineer should have sufficient infrastructure experience to have holistic view on security solution and application of security-in-depth principles. WHAT WILLYOU DO•	Due-diligence of existing client’s infrastructure, analyzing physical topology, logical interconnectivity, service dependency, application flows and security constraints.•	Organising and attending meetings and workshops with the client to understand requirements, challenges and risks.•	Creating and successfully presenting and backing complex designs for critical infrastructure to senior client resources at formal review boards•	Developing security solution in cooperation with other teams for secure infrastructure using existing industry standards, best practices and know-hows fitting it into existing infrastructure and operations framework.•	Creating designs and support documentation for the delivered infrastructure. Driving change governance-documentation in accordance to client’s processes and procedures.•	Act as SME and technical escalation point for security incidents in the scope of project delivery and systems delivered by the project to the client during transition/handover period.•	Vulnerability and risk management, platform selection, software production-feature set and load- testing for chosen platform. WHAT WEEXPECT•	Have 4+ year(s) of infrastructure security experience working with major firewall platforms (Palo Alto, Juniper, Cisco, Fortinet, etc.). Certificate for any of the platform is a plus.•	Have 2+ year(s) experience in Data Centre Security and micro-segmentation (zero-trust model and core segmentation, NSX, ACI, Tetration, etc.) or•	Have 2+ year experience with Cloud Security platforms – either cloud edge IaaS firewall or Cloud SaaS solution (Cisco CSR/vMX, Cisco AMP/SIG, CheckPoint, zScaler, PRISMA, etc.)•	Have a good knowledge of networking – both classic (switching, dynamic routing protocols, static and rule-based routing, etc.) and cloud (VPC, peering, gateways, SD-WAN secure fabric). Certificate in any networking area is a plus.•	Have a good knowledge of encryption and tunneling protocols (PKI, IPSec, SSL VPN, TLS, IKE, IKEv2, etc.) and cryptography in general (KEX, DH, HMAC, etc.)•	Understand application protocols in context of OSI network layers and content inspection (Load-balancing, WAF, IPS, IDS, etc.), full stack engineer is a strong plus.•	Understand cloud technologies and infrastructure virtualization (IaaS, PaaS, SaaS, NFV, SDN, SD-WAN)•	Understand baseline security requirements and platform hardening principles.•	Be flexible for international business trips to attend client meetings or workshops or perform remote site installation and configuration.•	Have good verbal communication skills (English) in both technical and non-technical communications.•	Have strong experience creating design documents (HLD, LLD) diagrams (Visio) and presentations (PPT)•	Have good analytical mindset for problem solving under stress and time pressure. WHAT WEOFFERSalaryFrom 2 800 EUR/monthAccenture offers a competitive compensation package. As required by the Slovak law we state, that the legal monthly minimum gross base pay starting from 2 800 €. Base salary is likely to be higher depending on your professional and personal qualifications in the required areas.Recognition: • Guaranteed paid overtime or overtime vacation• German language bonus up to 400€ monthly/gross depending on language proficiency and level of seniority• Flexible Benefit System - budget to be spent on services of your choice• Competitive bonus structure• Refer-a-Friend – get a bonus in the employee referral program• Loyalty rewardsFlexibility: • Flexible working arrangements (time & place of work)Future: • Wide range of trainings and expert lectures• Regular performance review and career growth possibilities• Ongoing career guidance and mentoring (Global Mentoring Program, Lean In)• Employee share purchase planFamily & Health: • 3 extra days off• Sick leave salary compensation (up to 100%)• Home-office equipment• Family oriented benefits (Wedding, Parental and Baby days-off and bonuses)• Employee assistance services (professional psychological, financial and legal help)• Multisport card• 24/7 Telehealth support• Bereavement Leave (up to 4 weeks) Interested?Apply for this job

Úvodná stránkaHľadanie práceInfrastructure Automation Engineer   Можливість для людей з України
We harness the power of tech to increase sustainability.
How do you want to use technology?
 Infrastructure Automation Engineer 
                                Place of work
                            Košice, Slovakia (Job with occasional home office)
                                Contract type
                            full-time
POSITIONDESCRIPTIONInfrastructure Projects Delivery Unit is responsible for design and deployment of network infrastructure solutions for external clients. An L3 resource is expected to function as the highest level of technical support and escalation for automation related issues, incidents and initiatives. The person should be able to take the role of Subject Matter Expert in technical project deliverables and be responsible for end-to-end solution implementation. Infrastructure Automation engineer should have sufficient networking experience to tightly cooperate with Infrastructure Network and Security team engineers to deliver the solutions on a wide scale covering all the infrastructure management aspects. WHAT WILLYOU DO•	Due-diligence of existing client’s solution, analyzing infrastructure in scope, logical interconnectivity, service dependency, integration options and security constraints.•	Attending meetings and workshops with the client to understand requirements, challenges and risks.•	Successfully presenting and defending complex designs for critical infrastructure to senior client resources at formal review boards•	Developing and integrating solution in cooperation with Infrastructure and Application project teams for solid infrastructure automation using existing industry standards, best practices and know-hows fitting it into existing infrastructure and operations framework.•	Creating designs and support documentation for the delivered solution. Raising change records and executing activity while adhering to client’s processes and procedures.•	Support and trouble-shooting of automation infrastructure and components delivered by the project to the client during transition/handover period.•	Vulnerability management, platform selection, software production-feature set and load- testing for chosen platform. WHAT WEEXPECT•	Have 1+ year(s) of working with enterprise infrastructure automation platforms such as HP/Microfocus, SPLUNK, BMC, etc. Certificate for any of the platform is a plus.•	Alternatively have 1+ year(s) experience with OpenSource automation IaaC platforms such as CFEngine, Chef, Puppet, Spacewalk, etc.•	Alternatively have 1+ year(s) experience of using generic automation and orchestration platforms for Infrastructure Automation tasks (e.g. Jenkins + Scripts/Ansible).•	Understand of DevOps process and Agile development cycle with Continuous Integration / Delivery (CI/CD). Experience with CI/CD platforms is a plus.•	Have a deep and strong knowledge of scripting and programming in any scripting language (Python, Perl, Shell + AWK, TCL, etc.) and communication protocols (REST, SNMP, SOAP, etc.)•	Have a good understanding of infrastructure topologies, including legacy networking (switching, static, dynamic and rule-based routing, etc.) and modern cloud infrastructure (Subnets, Gateways, Load-Balancers, Peering, etc.)•	Understand cloud technologies and infrastructure virtualization (IaaS, PaaS, SaaS, NFV, SDN)•	Be flexible for international business trips to attend client meetings or workshops; or perform remote site installation and configuration.•	Have good verbal communication skills (English) in both technical and non-technical communications.•	Have good experience creating design documents (HLD, LLD) diagrams (Vision) and presentations (PPT)•	Have good analytical mindset for problem solving under stress and time pressure. WHAT WEOFFERSalary1 800 - 3 000 EUR/monthAccenture offers a competitive compensation package. As required by the Slovak law we state, that the legal monthly minimum gross base pay starting from 1 800 € to 3 000 €. Base salary is likely to be higher depending on your professional and personal qualifications in the required areas.Recognition: • Guaranteed paid overtime or overtime vacation• German language bonus up to 400€ monthly/gross depending on language proficiency and level of seniority• Flexible Benefit System - budget to be spent on services of your choice• Competitive bonus structure• Refer-a-Friend – get a bonus in the employee referral program• Loyalty rewardsFlexibility: • Flexible working arrangements (time & place of work)Future: • Wide range of trainings and expert lectures• Regular performance review and career growth possibilities• Ongoing career guidance and mentoring (Global Mentoring Program, Lean In)• Employee share purchase planFamily & Health: • 3 extra days off• Sick leave salary compensation (up to 100%)• Home-office equipment• Family oriented benefits (Wedding, Parental and Baby days-off and bonuses)• Employee assistance services (professional psychological, financial and legal help)• Multisport card• 24/7 Telehealth support• Bereavement Leave (up to 4 weeks) Interested?Apply for this job

Úvodná stránkaHľadanie práceC++ Developer with experience (Remote)  Можливість для людей з України
C++ Developer with experience (Remote)ACEQES, s.r.o.
Miesto práce
Práca z domu
Druh pracovného pomeru
plný úväzok, skrátený úväzok, živnosť
Termín nástupu
Ihneď alebo dohodou
Mzdové podmienky (brutto)
Od 20 EUR/hod.Uvedená odmena je základná/minimálna ponúkaná suma odmeny, skutočná výška odmeny ako aj horná hranica je závislá iba na znalostiach a skúsenostiach uchádzača.
Informácie o pracovnom mieste Náplň práce, právomoci a zodpovednostiSpoločnosť ACEQES hľadá skúseného Senior C++ developera na dlhodobú spoluprácu, ideálne FULL-TIME (po dohode možnosť napr. 75%-ného úväzku). 
Požiadavky:
- viacročné skúsenosti s C++ (C11 / C14)
- písanie čistého kódu
- preferencia objektového programovania
- schopnosť refaktorovať už existujúci kód
- znalosť SQL
- Git, Gitlab, Gitlab CI
- práca s automatickými testami
- základná znalosť AJ (zadanie a písomná komunikácia v AJ)
Výhodou:
- znalosť Boost knižníc
- predchádzajúca skúsenosť s prácou v tíme
- skúsenosti s prácou remote
Náplň práce
Vývoj nových funkcionalít systému, rozširovanie a prevádzka dlhoročného projektu. Konzultácie zadaní, architektúry a refactoringov s existujúcim tímom. Dôraz a rozširovanie pokrytia automatickými testami.
Vyžadujú sa:
- ideálne aspoň 3-4 roky praxe na projektoch s C++ a príslušnými technológiami
- otvorená komunikácia & spoľahlivosť Zamestnanecké výhody, benefityPonúkame:
- spolupráca na zaujímavých projektoch - interných, alebo ako súčasť tímu klienta
- možnosť 100%-nej spolupráce na diaľku
- IČO alebo iná forma spolupráce
- hradené vzdelávanie / kurzy (podľa projektu, aj podľa vlastného výberu)
- flexibilné pracovné podmienky, pohyblivá pracovná doba
- technologický a kariérny rast

Náplň práceDo globálnej spoločnosti hľadáme SAP ABAP senior developera s nemeckým jazykom, ktorého nnáplňou práce bude:
- komplexný ABAP vývoj
- testovanie a "debugging" funkcií súvisiacich s implementáciou SAP modulov
- porozumenie a transformácia požiadaviek do technických riešení 
- úzka komunikácia s developermi a budovanie vzťahov s klientmi PožadujemeÚspešný kandidát by mal spĺňať tieto kritériá:
- skúsenosti so SAP ABAP dizajnom a vývojom
- porozumenie SAP ABAP konceptom vývoja, smerníc a SAP architektúry
-  znalosť ERP systémov 
- ochota príležitostne cestovať (po uvoľnení situácie)
- komunikatívnu znalosť anglického (B2) a nemeckého jazyka (B2) BenefityBenefity:
- preplatené nadčasy/ extra dovolenka za odpracované nadčasy
- 3dni extra dovolenky
- flexibilná pracovná doba a možnosť pracovať z home office
- kontinuálny mentoring a poradenstvo v kariérnom vývoji
- poskytovanie pravidelných hodnotení a podpory pracovného výkonu
- vzdelávanie, tréningy a školenia
- kafeteria- s možnosťou vytvoriť si budget na základe vašich preferencií
- odmeny za znalosť/využívanie nemeckého jazyka (až do 400€ mesačne)
- referal program- odmeny za lojalitu
- transparentnosť štruktúry bonusov
- možnosť pracovať na projektoch v zahraničí
- multisport karta
- sick days
- rodinné bonusy InformácieZašlite nám svoj životopis v slovenskom jazyku a ak máte aj v anglickom jazyku. Viac podobných pozícií nájdete na https://www.grafton.sk/sk/job-search

Voľné pracovné pozície
Profil firmy
Prečo Scheidt & Bachmann 
Kde nás nájdete
Web Portal Developer
Miesto práce: Žilina, Slovensko (Pozícia umožňuje občasnú prácu z domu)
Plat: Od 2 300 EUR/mesiac
Medior - od 1 900 € brutto, Senior - od 2 300 € brutto; + variabilná odmena (finálna výška mzdy závisí od skúseností kandidáta)
Profil spoločnosti
                    Firma Scheidt & Bachmann, Mönchengladbach vznikla v roku 1872 a v súčasnosti sa prezentuje ako inovatívna spoločnosť s dlhodobou tradíciou. V celkovo štyroch do značnej miery samostatných divíziách sa vyvíjajú, produkujú a distribuujú systémy pre parkoviská a centrá voľného času, systémy pre železničnú zabezpečovaciu techniku, systémy vybavenia cestujúcich a systémy pre čerpacie stanice. Firma Scheidt & Bachmann Slovensko s.r.o. vznikla v roku 1995 na podnet spoločnosti Scheidt & Bachmann pričom významnou mierou k tomu prispela aj úspešná spolupráca so Žilinskou univerzitou.
Fare Collection Systems
ponúka širokú škálu produktov rôzneho technického vybavenia podľa požiadaviek zákazníka. Táto oblasť pokrýva moderné, komplexné systémy vybavenia cestujúcich mestskej, prímestskej a metropolitnej dopravy so zariadeniami pre tlač a kódovanie cestovných lístkov.
Ponúkame Perspektívna práca v stabilnej firme s adekvátnym finančným ohodnotením a potenciálom osobného rozvoja (školenia, jazykové kurzy). Bohatý sociálny program pre zamestnancov: teambuildingové aktivity, firemné akcie, podpora športových a kultúrnych podujatí. Flexibilný pracovný čas, dovolenka navyše, dodatočné dni pracovného voľna. Práca v skúsenom medzinárodnom kolektíve. Možnosť služobných ciest do zahraničia.
Vaše povinnostiNávrh, vývoj a nasadzovanie softvérových aplikácií.Podpora existujúcich portálových riešení.Dokumentácia a prezentácia implementovaného riešenia funkcionality.Práca na zaujímavých projektoch v oblasti vývoja systémov vybavenia cestujúcich.
Váš profilÚspešne ukončené bakalárske alebo inžinierske štúdium v oblasti informatiky alebo elektrotechniky.Skúsenosť so scrum metódou agilného vývoja SW výhodou.Skúsenosti s integráciou SW.Ochota vzdelávať sa v oblasti webových technológií.Aktívna znalosť anglického jazyka.Analytické myslenie, tvorivosť.Zodpovednosť, spoľahlivosť, samostatnosť.Komunikatívnosť a prezentačné schopnosti.Schopnosť pracovať v tíme.Potrebné znalosti:Vue.js 2, Vue.js 3JavaScriptHTML, CSSPostgreSQLPHPGitOvládanie následovných technológií výhodou:SASS/LESSQuasar frameworkSymfony frameworkKongGitlab CI/CDDockerKubernetesSkúsenosť s UX/UI dizajnom

From 2 300 EUR/monthPerformance bonus 2 times per year up to 16,67% of the basic salary paid for the evaluation period(usually 6 months).*The final basic wage component can be increased accordingly to individual skills and experience of the selected candidate.
Information about the position Job description, responsibilities and dutiesWe are looking for a Frontend Developer with experiences in SPA & web applications development to join our Connected home team. 
You will work on consumer projects which consists of ESET HOME portals and multiple backend services / portals that provide functionalities for ESET consumer products.
We mainly use React to power our largest ESET HOME portals while gradually integrating other existing portals into this ecosystem.
What does working as Frontend Developer entail?
- Design and development of SPA & web applications based on React & various Javascript frameworks
- Participation in code reviews as a member of an agile team
- Cooperation with multiple development teams Employee perks, benefits• Support in personal and professional development - opportunities to attend various trainings, courses, conferences or meetups 
• Attractive financial bonus paid twice a year based on your performance
• Financial support in case of life milestones (wedding, childbirth)
• Complementary retirement savings contributions
• Fully covered 7 EUR/per day meal vouchers
•  Wide range of benefits in sport, healthcare, culture, education and other areas
• "Refer a friend" benefit - the opportunity to receive a financial bonus when referring a friend for an open vacancy
• Available home-office days - 12 days per month (in SR)
• Fully-paid 3 sickdays 
• Loyalty program - extra vacation days and financial bonus after working at ESET for 5 and more years
• Mind & Soul program - free helpline and counselling in personal and professional development 
• Sport activities support – possibility to participate in various races, bike cages, bikes for rent
• Fresh fruit, tea, coffee, non-alcoholic beverages - you can find them all in every kitchen
• Casual, friendly, open culture with no dress code
• Participating in company events
• Opportunity to use company common areas (terrace, relax zone, library) for a chill time and meetings with colleagues
• Volunteering and opportunity to participate in various CSR activities Requirements for the employee Candidates with education suit the positionFollow-up/Higher Professional Education
University education (Bachelor's degree)
University education (Master's degree)Language skillsEnglish - Upper intermediate (B2)Other knowledgeReact Hooks - BasicThe position is suitable for a fresh graduateYesPersonality requirements and skillsOur Requirements:
- High School/University education
- React skills (React Hooks & State management etc) (other UI frameworks acceptable)
- Javascript, ES6+
- Typescript / jQuery
- HTML & CSS
- Basic knowledge of any major UI design library (Bootstrap/Material UI/AntD)
- English language
Nice to have:
- Experience with Redux/Redux Toolkit
- Experience with ASP.NET MVC, C#, EF6
- Experience with OpenId & Oauth2 Advertiser Brief description of the companyThe beginnings of ESET date back to 1987, when two young programming enthusiasts, Peter Paško and Miroslav Trnka, wrote a program for the detection of one of the world’s first computer viruses. They did not know that they had created one of the most successful antivirus programs in the world – dubbing it NOD. In 1992, together with their mutual friend Rudolf Hrubý, they formally established ESET.
What started as the brainchild of a few friends has evolved into the most valuable international brand of any Slovak company. Today ESET’s NOD32 technology protects over 100 million users across the world.
This success did not come overnight. The company’s global success and growth was given a boost in 1998 with its first “VB100” award from the prestigious Virus Bulletin magazine. Since then, we’ve received this accolade more than 100 times.
Today, over 2,100 employees around the world drive the company’s success – a telling increase from 3 in 1987 and 135 in 2006. More than 1200 of them are based in Slovakia, the home of ESET headquarters.
Throughout the company’s expansion, we have stayed true to the principles on which we were founded, and we remain independent in order to continue to meet new challenges. Number of employees1000 and more employees ContactContact person: Eva Kvasničková VerbichE-mail: send CV

Úvodná stránkaHľadanie práceJava Software Engineer in Public Safety 
    Reagujte bez životopisu
Java Software Engineer in Public SafetyFREQUENTIS Solutions & Services s. r. o.
Place of work
Remote work
Contract type
full-time, trade licence
Wage (gross)
From 2 500 EUR/monthMinimum 2 500 EUR brutto. Freelancer´s hourly rate upon agreement. The final basic wage component will be adjusted to individual skills and experience of selected candidate.
Information about the position Job description, responsibilities and dutiesWe provide communication and information systems for control centers with safety-critical tasks. Control Centre Solutions’ are developed and distributed by Frequentis in the business segments Air Traffic Management (civil and military air traffic control, aeronautical information management, air defence) and Public Safety & Transport (police, fire and rescue services, emergency medical services, vessel traffic and railways).If you wish to apply your experience and enthusiasm to the backend development of an innovative audio and communication system, used by the Police and Health services, and accompany your product from conception and development, all the way through to the deployment, then the LifeX team is for you!We develop a highly reliable system for professional applications in the field of public safety, based on a microservice architecture written in Java 11. Our product, LifeX, communicates with external APIs (SOAP to the TETRA network for mobiles and Radio communication, Web socket to web-client, XMPP protocol to chat communication…).High quality of safety critical systems, personal and professional fulfillment and growth of our team members are our key values. If you share these values with us, become one of us!Main Tasks :•	As part of the team of enthusiastic developers, you will contribute to the development of SW solutions for safety-critical applications in an exciting area of the Public Safety (police, rescue services).•	You will analyze requirements, design and development of SW solutions for telecommunication systems.•	You will use the tools for code analysis and automated testing procedures (Test Driven Development).•	You will document SW solutions in accordance with the international quality standards.•	You will contribute to the safer SW solutions using agile development, automated testing, and continuous integrations.Used Software & Technologies :•	Project Support: Git, Jira, Confluence, Jama, Jenkins, Maven, Intellij IDEA•	Testing: JUNIT tests, FitNesse, CATS•	Code Quality: checkstyle, PMD, Findbugs, CPD•	SQL, Websocket, Webserver / Webclient, SPRING, SIP, XML, JSON, SOAP, AnsibleEducation :•	Technical education in ITKnow-how and experience :•	Experience with the operations systems Windows, UNIX/Linux.•	Experience with JAVA – advanced•	English & Slovak language - proficient in spoken and written communication. Employee perks, benefits•	Training and development program (professional internal & external trainings, language course)•	Flexible working hours, home office•	Refreshments, company & team events•	Meal vouchers fully reimbursed by the company•	Multisport card, company contribution to pension savings (DDS)•	The opportunity to participate in shaping innovations and projects with your knowledge and skills from the very beginning•	Exciting projects and challenges with innovative software systems that help save lives•	Teamwork in a highly motivated, multidisciplinary team of experts•	Promotion of your personal and professional development Requirements for the employee Candidates with education suit the positionUniversity education (Bachelor's degree)
University education (Master's degree)
Postgraduate (Doctorate)Educational SpecializationTelecommunications, Information TechnologiesLanguage skillsEnglish - Intermediate (B1)Other knowledgeJava - AdvancedUNIX/Linux - SkillfulPersonality requirements and skills•	Communicative and sensitive for different work cultures (we have customers all over the world)•	Be an active listener and able to reflect on other people´s inputs and opinions•	Ability to think fast and come up with creative solutions Advertiser Brief description of the companyOur Bratislava-based company FREQUENTIS Solutions & Services belongs to the Austrian group FREQUENIS AG (www.frequentis.com), specialized in safety-critical voice communications, for example for air traffic control towers, public safety control rooms (112) or air defense forces. Our mission critical solutions cover diverse areas, such as telephony and radio communication, Geographical Information Systems (GIS), incident and resource management, video surveillance and automatic video analytics. 
In the last couple of years this business has evolved from hardware- to software-centric solutions and Frequentis has also increasingly provided mission-critical IT solutions beyond voice communication to our customers. We follow the Scrum methodology and our applications are mostly developed in Java to the highest quality standards. 
From an engineering perspective we deploy state-of-the-art technologies and design patterns. Our solutions use JAVA and Microsoft .NET foundations, distributed architectures, low-latency telecommunications processing, real time web applications, integration platforms and high availability. Each of our solutions contains their own unique and challenging problems to solve.
For our customers, lives may be at stake and seconds count. Our products thus need to be developed to the highest standards when it comes to usability and reliability. Safety is what guides us from the first designs till the final tests of any of our product. If those are the kinds of challenges that excite you, then you have come to the right place! - účasť na projektoch,
- vytváranie nových aplikácii, údržba prevádzkovaných modulov SAP,

- zodpovednosť za riešenie špecifických požiadaviek zákazníka,
- spolupráca s ostatnými aplikačnými konzultantmi,

Inzerujúca spoločnosť Stručná charakteristika spoločnostiSpoločnosť SYNCHRONIX, a.s. úspešne pôsobí na slovenskom trhu informačných technológií a služieb od roku 1994 so zámerom realizovať  projekty a vývoj softwarových systémov na báze nových technológií. 
Poslaním spoločnosti je poskytovanie služieb v oblasti informačných technológií so zameraním na podnikové a manažérske informačné systémy, systémovú integráciu a na analyticko-konzultačnú činnosť. Ponúkame progresívne riešenia s využitím nových znalostí a technológií, ktoré používateľom umožnia rýchly a pružný prístup k riešeniu zložitých problémov vo výrobe, obchode a službách. Cieľom je podporiť trvalé zlepšovanie business procesov, výkonnosti organizácií a efektívne rozhodovanie manažérov na všetkých úrovniach riadenia. 
Počas svojho pôsobenia na slovenskom trhu si spoločnosť SYNCHRONIX, a.s. vybudovala významné partnerstvá s najvýznamnejšími svetovými výrobcami informačných technológií, ako sú SAP, MS, HP a IBM. Úvodná stránkaHľadanie práceF# Developer | Skvelá komunita, veľa zábavy, vedomostí a zaujímavých projektov 
F# Developer | Skvelá komunita, veľa zábavy, vedomostí a zaujímavých projektovCN Group CZ a.s., organizačná zložka SK
Miesto práce
Obchodná 2, Bratislava, Slovensko (Pozícia umožňuje občasnú prácu z domu)
Druh pracovného pomeru
plný úväzok, živnosť
Termín nástupu
Dohodou
Mzdové podmienky (brutto)
2 500 EUR/mesiacFinálna výška mzdy závisí od doterajších skúseností a odborných vedomostí kandidáta.
Informácie o pracovnom mieste Náplň práce, právomoci a zodpovednostiPredstavte si, že budete súčasťou tímu zanietených F# vývojárov, v ktorom sa od seba učíme, pomáhame si a hlavne sa zabávame na zaujímavých medzinárodných projektoch z rôznych oblastí podnikania (predpovede počasia, doprava, rezervácie, móda, ...). 
Zvyčajne pokrývame celý životný cyklus vývoja softvéru, takže sa dostanete do kontaktu s automatizáciou, Infrastructure-as-a-code, monitorovaním a ďalšími skvelými vecami.
TECHNOLÓGIE na našich projektoch: 
BE: .Net, F#
FE: Fable
API: Rest API, GraphQL
DB: Azure Cosmos DB, MS SQL Server
Ďalšie technológie: CI/CD, Azure Cloud, Microservices
Vašou úlohou bude: 
•	vývoj nových funkcií
•	účasť na návrhu systému
•	údržba existujúcich častí systému
Čo v CN Group získate? 
• Prostredie, ktoré intenzívne podporuje vzdelávanie a odborný rast (interné a externé školenia, workshopy, konferencie, hackathony, codingdojo, prednášky)
• Kolegov, ktorí sú ochotní Vám kedykoľvek pomôcť a radi zdieľajú svoje znalosti
• Nadriadených, ktorí svojim ľuďom rozumejú - sami bývali vývojármi, takže vedia, čo ich ľudia potrebujú
• Firemnú kultúru, ktorá je založená na priateľskom a neformálnom prostredí. Nechávame kolegom voľnosť a všetko staviame na dôvere.
• Prácu na rôznorodých zahraničných IT projektoch bez potreby sa niekam sťahovať, bez nutnosti zmeny firmy a kolegov. Nezamrznete tak na dlhšiu dobu len na jednom projekte.
• Výhodu produktovej firmy (stálych kolegov, Scrum Mastrov, šéfa aj svoj stôl...) s meniacimi sa projektmi od našich stálych aj nových zahraničných zákazníkov Zamestnanecké výhody, benefityAké benefity pre Vás máme?
+ Podporujeme work-life balance (home-office, flexibilná pracovná doba, dovolenka navyše)
+ Možnosť práce z domu - či už na jednorazové udalosti alebo ak bývate ďaleko na denné dochádzanie
+ Každý týždeň organizujeme spoločné raňajky, kde preberieme novinky pri dobrom jedle a káve
+ 5 týždňov dovolenky pre všetkých zamestnancov
+ 2 dni Sickdays
+ Možnosť neplatenej dovolenky môžete využiť napríklad na cestovanie
+ Preferujete MacBook alebo Dell? U nás máte možnosť výberu
+ Ak sa potrebujete odreagovať, môžete si zahrať PlayStation, Xbox, stolný futbal alebo relaxovať v našom Social roome
+ Program pre duševné zdravie Soulmio (prevencia duševného zdravia, živé prenosy alebo videá so psychológmi, články o duševnej pohode, osobné stretnutia so psychológom atď.)
+ Cvičenie jogy priamo na pracovisku
+ Možnosť jazykového vzdelávania - online angličtina a nemčina
+ Pekný office v centre Bratislavy so super dopravnou dostupnosťou a so skvelou kávou
+ Môžete si užiť spoločné akcie, ktoré už majú tradíciu (Outdoor, Vianočný večierok, lyžovačka atď.) Informácie o výberovom konaníSme radi, že Vás pri hľadaní práce zaujala naša ponuka. Cloud Transformation EngineerThe Capital Markets Company Slovakia, s. r. o.
Place of work
Bratislava, Slovakia (Job with occasional home office)
Contract type
full-time
Wage (gross)
2 200 EUR/monthfrom 2200 EUR + annual bonus (regarding previous experience salary can be modified)
Information about the position Job description, responsibilities and duties• Analyse issues and drive solutions to keep our client's cloud environments healthy
• Define and execute various migration strategies
• Design, setup, migrate or maintain cloud solutions to achieve defined business goals
• You are part of challenging agile consulting projects within the cloud transformations and you will be involved in various subjects; from Business Analysis through Requirement Gathering and Design to implementation and testing
• In addition to project work, you have the opportunity to contribute to various internal topics and implement your own ideas Employee perks, benefits•  The opportunity to work with experienced colleagues for prestigious banks
•  The opportunity to work on different projects, no routine
•  Technical training, professional certifications, as well as training focused on the development of soft skills, full access to the Udemy online learning platform
•  Private health care, sick days, employee’s vacation – 25 days per year, regardless of the age
•  Cafeteria provided by the Benefits plus services (50 EUR monthly)
•  Fully paid meal vouchers, per diems, above prescribed government level
•  Smartphone and internet with 20 GB of data, laptop
•  Flexibility to work remotely from the home office, as well as from our new office in Bratislava - Nivy Tower (Fresh fruit, relaxing zone, game room – table football, PS4)
•  We care: we support well-being of our employees (Yoga lessons available, mental health webinars, team sport activities – e.g. running challenges) as well as participation on the volunteering days
You are important to us! That's why you get a personal coach at our side who supports you individually. With our start-up mentality and our flat hierarchy, you have every opportunity to place your ideas and to put them into practice. In addition, after work, you have numerous opportunities to expand your internal network and get to know new faces through joint sports activities and team events. Postgraduate (Doctorate)Language skillsEnglish - Upper intermediate (B2)Personality requirements and skills• A successfully completed a university degree, preferably within a focus in informatics
• Hands-on experience migrating on-premise infrastructure to one of the major public cloud providers
• Hands-on experience with public cloud provides (e.g. GCP, Azure or AWS, SCP), ideally with relevant certification
• Strong agile mindset and first-hand experiences within DevOps
• Experience with modern commodity DevOps tooling & services (e.g. GitHub, CircleCI, Datadog and Hashicorp technologies like Terraform or Vault)
• Ideally, knowledge with relevant architectures, technologies, and operations like:
   - Cloud-native architectures, hybrid systems
   - Serverless-architectures, microservice and API
   - Container, Kubernetes, OpenShift and OpenTracing
   - Automatization of CI/CD-Pipelines (e.g. Jenkins, Ansible)
• You can work in a team and have above-average analytical and conceptual skills as well as assertiveness
• Good English language knowledge

Informácie o pracovnom mieste Náplň práce, právomoci a zodpovednostiPridaj sa do tímu ľudí, ktorí posuvajú dopredu digitálnu komunikáciu občana so štátom. Naše vývojové tímy vyvíjajú aplikáciu Slovensko v Mobile (backend a mobilná appka pre Android a iOS). Aplikácia Slovensko v mobile zjednoduší a urýchli komunikáciu občana so štátom.
Viac informacií o projekte nájdeš v priloženom odkaze:
https://ep.slovensko.sk/titulna-stranka
Tvoj bežný pracovný deň bude zahŕňať činnosti ako:
• Analýza požiadaviek, návrh a implementácia softvérových komponentov
• Jednotkové a integračné testovanie
• Support a bug fixing
• Kontrola kódu
• Podieľanie sa na tvorbe softvérovej architektúry a dizajnu
Nevyhnutné technické zručnosti/znalosti:
• Znalosť OOP a SOLID princípov
• Skúsenosti s programovaním v C#
• Znalosť .NET frameworku, REST, SQL
Vítané technické zručnost/znalosti:
• Skúsenosti s OAuth2, Kafka /Avro, Swagger (OpenAPI 3), Elastic Search, Firebase, Oracle, Firebase
• Skúsenosti s microservice architecture
• Skúsenosti s Linux shell scripting, Docker/Kubernetes
• Skúsenosť s agilným vývojom softvéru v roli softvérového inžiniera
• Technické vedenie tímu (platí pre rolu seniora)
Ak si osoba, ktorej záleží na tom ako digitálne služby pre občanov fungujú, vyzerajú, akú majú pridanú hodnotu a čo všetko dokážu občanom uľahčiť neváhaj nám poslať svoje CV.

Poskytujeme komplexné IT služby, inovácie a cloudové riešenia v prospech občanov a podnikateľov Slovenskej republiky, ako aj štátnych podnikov a inštitúcií.
Primárnym cieľom nášho tímu špičkových odborníkov z oblasti IT je zabezpečenie štátneho IT centra s dôrazom na kvalitu a dostupnosť služieb pre občanov. Navrhujeme a vytvárame stabilné informačné systémy, mobilné aplikácie a weby, ktoré umožňujú posunúť Slovensko vpred.  Všetky ponuky
Náplň práce- Vytváranie prehľadu zákazníckych špecifikácii, interných špecifikácií, worst case analýz
- Návrh schém a layoutov
- Definovanie komponentov a kontrola ich parametrov, komunikuácia s dodávateľmi komponentov
- Vytváranie matematických simulácií a analýz elektrických obvodov
- Vytváranie test plánov a matematických procesov na vyhodnotenie dát
- Testovanie a návrh zlepšenia v HW
- Vytváranie EMC analýz
- Vytváranie dokumentácie pre sériovú výrobu a definícia limitov
- Vytváranie a údržba HW FMEA Požadujeme- Vysokoškolské vzdelanie v odbore elektrotechnika/elektronika
- Samostatné čítanie a tvorba schém, dobrú znalosť návrhu elektronických obvodov a simulácie obvodov
- Znalosti CAD programov pre design
- Znalosť elektro komponentov na pokročilej úrovni
- Čítanie datasheetov a tvorba schém na ich základe
- EMC/ESD znalosti a ich vplyv na schému a komponenty
- Ovládanie špecializovaných prístrojov ako O Scope, Generator, DMM, PS, Logicky analyzer Benefity- Ročný bonus
- Možnosť pracovať na home office
- školenia
- jazykové kurzy
- systém soc. benefitov InformácieZašlite nám svoj životopis v slovenskom jazyku a ak máte aj v anglickom jazyku. Viac podobných pozícií nájdete na https://www.grafton.sk/sk/job-search

Úvodná stránkaHľadanie práceUX/UI Designers with French language.  
UX/UI Designers with French language. NESS KE, s.r.o.
Place of work
Remote work
Contract type
full-time, trade licence
Start date
asap
Wage (gross)
2 200 EUR/monthfrom 2200 € gross plus Benefits, the FINAL OFFER depends on the candidate's skills and experience
Information about the position Job description, responsibilities and dutiesWe are searching for a UX/UI Designer to become a new valuable team member for our important European client with long-lasting history on the market. 
More about client:
https://nesskosice.sk/telematics/
As UX / UI designer you will measure and optimize applications to improve ease of use (usability) and create the best user experience by exploring many different approaches to solve end-user problems. One way that a UX designer might do this is by conducting in-person user tests to observe behavior. They then refine and tweak apps, software and websites to create products that people like and find easy to use.
Responsibilities
★ considering existing applications and evaluating their UX (user experience) effectiveness
★ considering the human-computer interaction (HCI) element of a design
★ using online tools, such as screen readers, to aid their research
running user testing of applications, software and websites
★ defining interaction models, user task flows, and UI (user interface) specifications
★ communicating scenarios (hypothetical users), end-to-end experiences, interaction models, and screen designs to other people working on a product
★ Keep the interface beautiful and easy to use
★ Manage the visual appearance of all new features and enhancements on our software and mobile applications
★ Initiate, suggest, and spearhead major UI re-factoring for a more intuitive user experience
★ Design elegant solutions to complex workflows and things that people will talk about Employee perks, benefits• Flexible working hours
• Home Office
• Extra Vacation days
• Homeoffice & Holiday allowance
• Relax rooms
• Multisport card
• Technical courses, Certifications
• Worldwide IT Conferences
• Commercial partners discounts
• Ness Summer club – full-day summer program for children of our employees
• Diners club credit card
• High-standard working conditions
• Geeky Fridays
• Massages Requirements for the employee Candidates with education suit the positionSecondary with school-leaving examination
University education (Master's degree)Educational SpecializationITLanguage skillsEnglish - Intermediate (B1) or French - Upper intermediate (B2)Other knowledgeUX design - SkillfulUX/UI Design - SkillfulWireframing - SkillfulHTML - SkillfulCSS - SkillfulPersonality requirements and skills★ 4+ years of UX/UI experience for web and mobile applications
★ User research and usability testing
★ User Experience skills in wireframes, workflows, prototypes, and personas
★ User Centred Design process and usability principles
★ User Interface skills (design patterns, iconography, imagery production, etc)
★ Design tools (Adobe Creative Suite, Visio, Axure, etc)
★ User Experience solutions for a given problem
★ web technologies (HTML, CSS, jQuery, JavaScript, DHTML, etc…) Advertiser Brief description of the companyNess KDC was established in 2005 and is the flagship Software Delivery and Innovations Center of the Ness Digital Engineering corporation.
In the area of software engineering, it is our top-quality services, individual customer approach and ability to achieve targets which are most highly valued by our clients. Thanks to these, Ness Kosice enjoys long-term business relationships with its customers. Our teams of professionals first process and analyze client’s requirements; then, through cooperation with the client, they use the newest technology to fulfil these requirements in an “agile” environment.
Our glowing references and strong corporate background continuously attract the interest of new clients. As a result, Ness KDC is now one of the most important employers in the region with a workforce of more than 600 people. Number of employees500-999 employees ContactContact person: Ing. Informácie o pracovnom mieste Náplň práce, právomoci a zodpovednostiVytváranie obrábacích programov pre CNC stroje elumatec SBZ 122/75, SBZ 151, SBZ 628 z programu Logikal do programu EluCAD. Kontrola pracovných príprav, oprava pracovných príprav a programovanie obrábacích operácií pre príslušné typy hliníkových profilov systémov heroal, WICONA, HUECK pre CNC stroje. Informácie o výberovom konaníPráca vhodná pre ľudí so skúsenosťou s projektovaním stavebných výplní (okien, dverí, fasádových konštrukcií) a praxou/skúsenosťou s obsluhou CNC strojov na obrábanie hliníkových profilov.Predpokladaný termín ukončenia výberového konania31.3.2023 (ostáva ešte 18 dní) Požiadavky na zamestnanca Pozícii vyhovujú uchádzači so vzdelanímzákladné vzdelanie
